title: Masibonge iNkosi
lyrics:
1 Yizanini, siyibong' İNkosi, Masihlabelele phambi kwayo, Ngoba yona inguMlondolozi, Isiphethe ngawo um'sa wayo. Uma kungayanga ngom'sa wodwa, Ngabesilahliwe ekufeni. Kepha manje ubukhosi bodwa, Noma sizomuka emhlabeni.

2
Luph' ulimi olungadumisa Loluthando esithandwa ngalo? Uph' umlomo ongaluphimisa Loludumo, lungapheli njalo? Shono njengoDavid', wathi yena: "Ukubonga akuyikuphela Emlonyeni wami, ngobatshena Nabonay' eyonayon' indlela."

3
Lowo munt' ubusisiw' impela Olibele eyibong' İNkosi, Ebabaz' İMvan' eyasifela, Umhlatshelo olihlabahlosi. Lonk' ibandla elisezulwini, Limdumis' uJesu, uSomuhle, Nathi masivum' esixukwini, Simkhulis' osipha konk' okuhle.

title: Ukumbonga uJesu
lyrics:
1
Mawuthi, Nkos', ukwamukele Ukukubonga kwami-ke. Lapho ngalahlw' icala lami, Wawuse ungimela, he. Wawuse ungimela, he.

2
Kungangibonge ngezilimi Ez'izinkulungwane la: Nakhona le, kumbe ngipheze, Kuze kube nanini na? Kuze kube nanini na?

3
Sengahluliw' uthando Iwakho, Yathamba inhliziyo yam'. Ngiyanxanel' ukub' owakho, Sekuphelil' ukwala kwam'. Sekuphelil' ukwala kwam'.

4
Uma uhlala kimi, Nkosi, Angisafis' okunye, qha. Ngithand' u'ba ungenz' esakho Isitsha esimhlophe, pha. Isitsha esimhlophe, pha.

5
Mangimi nawe, umi nami, Ngize ngimuke emhlabeni'. Ikhona wonyenyeza, uthi: "Ngizoba nawe ekufeni" "Ngizoba nawe ekufeni"

title: Umhlobo wami
lyrics:
1
Sewakhile enhliz'weni, Umhlobo wam'. Nguy' omkhul' ezihlotsheni, Umhlobo wam'. Ngoba nguy' owangimela, La' ngilahlwe ngokwempela, Ngal' uthando wangifela, Lomhlobo wam'.

2
Wabe kad' engithandile, Umhlobo wam'. Ngisenguye omdelile, Umhlobo wam. Nxa ukona kwami kwanda, Weza yena wanginqanda, Ngisemubi wangithanda, Umhlobo wam'.

3
Wazisus' izono zami, Umhlobo wam'. Naz' izinyembezi zami, Umhlobo wam'. Nxa ngiduka endleleni, Unyenyeza enhliz'weni, Ungivusa emoyeni, Umhlobo wam'.

4
Uyathwala umthwalo wami, Umhlobo wam'. Uthi wongithwala nami, Umhlobo wam'. Wayehlatshwa njengemvana, Az' angenz' owakh' umntwana, Yek' inhlanhla yokwazana, Nomhlobo wam'.

5
Bonke-ke bangamfumana, Umhlobo wam'. Unomusa uyaphana, Umhlobo wam'. Yonk' eminye imilhobo, Ingadinwa - yen' uqobo, Nguye namhla njengezolo, Umhlobo wam'.

title: Thatha Konke, NginoJesu
lyrics:
1 Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Konk' okuny' indiva nje; Kodwa' uthando Iwakhe lumi, Zolo, namhla, njalo, he. Yek' ubuhle bokumazi UMsindisi wethu lo; Yen' othando Iwakhe lumi, Zolo, namhla, njalo, bo.

2
Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Ngukuphila kwami la; Nxa ekhon' uJesu wami, Angiswelu lutho qha.

3
Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Unganele mina la; Nxa nginaye la empini, Ngokunqoba konke nya.

4
Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Engimethembayo, he. Masinyane wongibiza, Ngiyohlala naye le.

title: Unguye nanamhla
lyrics:
1
UJehova onmandla du, owenz' umhlaba lo, Okad' esiz' endulo la, abamethembayo; Akaguquki yena, qha, unguye namhla-ke, Okade ekhona endulo la, ukhona namhlanje. Unguye namhlanje, Unguye namhlanje, UJehova owasendulo-ke, Unguye namhlanje.

2
Owayemis uDaniyel' esezingonyamen', Nowabalond' abantu nxa bephonswa emlilwen'; Osiphathayo, nguye lo, 'isikhathi samanje, Okade ekhona endulo la, ukhona namhlanje. Owasandis' isinkwa-ke, abantu besehlan' Ukuba sabanela bona bezinkulungwan', Nowathulis ulwandle du, unguye njalo-ke, Okade ekhona endulo la, ukhona namhlanje

title: Masihlokomise
lyrics:
1
Masihlokomis' imbongo namhlanje, Simdumis' uJesu Nkosi, Ngal' uthando lolu olungakaya, Asithanda ngalo thina la. Haleluya! Zingelosi le Zisho: "Haleluya," Vuma, he! Kumfanel' uJesu, yena yedwa nje, Ukubongwa lapha nangale.

2
Lwash' udwendwekazi, lon' oluthe ndwe, Alubona uJohane le: "Makabongw' uJesu," nathi sisho njal', Ngoba wasifela thina la.

3
Halalani nonke! - Angathul' uba' Oluzwil' uthando Iwakhe na? Noma zidilika izintaba la, Lungephel' uthando Iwakhe, qha.

title: Umhlengi wami
lyrics:
1
Ngomdumis' uMhlengi wami, Ngob' izonno wazithwala; Wangifel' es'phambanweni, Walisul' elam' icala. Thokozani, thokozani! Sihlengiw' yigazi lakhe, El'opheli' izono zethu, Esiphambanweni sakhe.

2
Ngomdumis' uMhlengi wami, Ngob' engizuzel' ikhaya; Wangiwela, wangimela, Ngenxa yami babemshaya.

3
Ngomdumis' uMhlengi wami, Ngiyibong' İNkosi yami, Ingisiza ngimahlue USathan' isitha sami.

4
Ngomdumis' uMhlengi wami, Walinyazwa ngenxa yami, Ungihlanza ezonweni, Sengithand' uMfeli wami.

title: Ngingowakho
lyrics:
1
Hubanini bazalwane, Kuyabanga injabulo, Vuka, mphefumlo wami, Vuma nawe nant' iculo: :,: Ngingowakho, Mfeli wami, Nakho konke okukimi .:,: 

2
Ifanel' ukudunyiswa, Yon' İMvan' eyasihlenga; Sahlawulelw' igazi layo, Yebo, ngalo yasithenga.

3
Dumisan' evukileyo Ekufen' İNkosi yethu; Nanka amanxeba ayo; Linqobil' iQhawe lethu.

4
Nin' abakhe, jabulani, USatahan' uhlulekile, Kanamandla phezu kwenu, UNgqongqoshe umnqobile.

5
Unqobile, mayizwiwe, Leyondab ezweni lonke. Mhlaba, zulu, zingelosi, Dumisani nani nonke!

title: Udumo oluhle
lyrics:
1
Makuvezw' udum' oluhle, Mdumis' uJesu! Ngoba yen' unguSomuhle, Mdumis' uJesu! Yena ungumhlobo wethu, Owathwal' ihlazo lethu, Ngakho , mphefumulo wethu, Mdumis' uJesu!

2
Wakukhipha odakeni, Mdumis' uJesu! Wakubeka, edwaleni, Mdumis' uJesu! Yena unomusa wonke, Ulungisa kahle konke; Ngakho ngezinsuku zonke, Mdumis' uJesu!

3
Wena osusindiswe, Mdumis' uJesu! Uma usukhululiwe, Mdumis' uJesu! Leligama lihl' impela, Ngakho, vuma, hlabelela, Mbonge yen' owakufela, Mdumis' uJesu!

4
Uyekel' ukona, kwakho, Mdumis' uJesu! Uzelaph' izifo zakho, Mdumis' uJesu! Kukho konk' ukwenza kakhe, Siyabon' uthando Iwakhe. Ngakho bong' umusa wakhe, Mdumis' uJesu!

5
Mhla ebuya emafwini, Siyakumbona, Wosam'kela ebomini, Sobusa khona; Nxa 'bangcwele behlangana, Khona sizokhumbuzana, Simemeza Hosiyana! Mdumis' uJesu!

title: Bayethe, Nkosi Yamakhosi
lyrics:
1
Bayethe! Nkosi yamakhos', Ogama linguJesu, Lethan' umqhele wobukhos', Nimthwese wona, nithi: Nkosi yakho konke.

2
Nin' eningelukhohlwe, qha Uthando olukhulu LoMfeli wenu, zanini, Nimthwes' umqhele, nithi: Nkosi yakho konke.

3
Makuthi bonk' abezizwe, Baguqe phambi kwakhe, Bambonge bengaphezi la, Bamthwes' umqhele, bethi: Nkosi yakho konke.

4
Nami-ke, Jesu, Mhlengi wam', Sengisondele kuwe, Ngileth' okwami konke Nkos', Ngithela kuwe, ngithi: Nkosi yakho konke.

title: Jabulani Nami
lyrics:
1
Inhliziyo yami nahl' iyajabula, Ngoba ngisayikhumbul' İNkosi yam'; Loku yiy' eyangithanda, yangifela, Izihlangulile zonk' izono zam'.

2
Kwakukade nganihamb' ebumyameni, Im'cabango yami yonke yayimbi; Kwakungekho ukuthula enhlizi'weni, Zangivimbezel' izinhlupheko, ngci.

3
Ngezindaba eziningi zalomhlaba, Yayigcwele kabi inhliziyo yam'; Ukukhanya kwakungekho nakwethaba, Wawubheka phansi umphefum'lo wam'.

4
Manje sekusile kahle enhlizi'weni, Sengiluzw' uthando lukaJesu wam'. Walishiy' ikhaya lakhe ezulwini, Ngokuthanda mina moni, Nkosi yam'.

5
Jabulani nonke kanye nami namhla. Simdumise uMsindisi wethu lo; Masiguqe ngenhliziyo phambi kwakhe, Sikhulis' igama lakh' elihle, bo!

6
Unamandl' okuguqula inhliziyo, Engajatshuliswa lutho nakanci, Iphenduke, izigxume ngentokozo, Ithatshiswe ngay' uMoya, ithe Iwi!

7
Sondelani ngakho kuye, nina bandla, Agcwalis' izinhliziyo zenu, swi! Ngokubong' umusa wakhe naw' amandla, Asindisa ngawo yena yedwa, qhwi!

title: Luyisimanga uthando lolu
lyrics:
1
Luyisimanga uthando lo', Owangithanda ngalo bo. Nguye osisindisayo, Mdumiseni! Uyangimangalisa, uJesu owangisindisa. Uyangithokozisa, Mdumiseni!

2
Lona Iwahlula ingqondo yam'; Ngoba ngathandwa ngalo nam', Ngakh' utholile konk' okwam'. Mdumiseni!

3
Ngalo wathwal' izono zam'. Ngesiphambano ngenxa yam', Ngalo waqed' icala lam'. Mdumiseni!

4
Ngalo ngondliwa njalo nam', Luyavuthis' uthando Iwam'. Luyakhulis' ithemba lam'. Mdumiseni!

title: Ebenezer lami
lyrics:
1
Thixo wami onosizo, Ngiyafis' ukukubonga; Ungisiza ngeqiniso, Ungeqisa nezindonga. Sengimis' iEbenezer, Okukuthi: "Usizile." Nangomuso ungikhweze, Ungigcine ngiphilile.

2
Wangifuna ngidukile, Ngingasezwa izwi lakho, Wangicosha, ngaphukile, Wangibek' ehlombe lakho, Yek', uthando olungaka! Ngingathini ngalo mina? Kuyo yonke leminyaka, Wanginaka, wangigcina.

3
Nkosi, ngizesaba kodwa, Ngingethemb' awam' amandla, Ngiwethemba um'sa wodwa, Ngizwe njal' esakh' isandla. Thatha inhliziyo yami, Bek' uphawu Iwakho kuyo; Ngibe-nawe, ube-nami, Khon' impela nginemfuyo.

title: Indumiso
lyrics:
1
Mangiyenze indumiso, Ngimdumis' uMfeli wam'; Wangikhiph' ebumnyameni Ngokuthwal' izono zam'. Nguye owazinikela, Ngisabanjwe ezonwen', Nguye oyikhomb' indlela Eqondayo ezulwin'.

2
Ngikhumbulula lawameva, Owahlatshwa yiwo le EGolgotha, ngenxa yami, Ngisenguy' omubi nje. Wangihlenga mina moni, Ngisaqonda emlilwen', Wangikhipha osizini, Wangibeka ebomin'.

3
Ngikhumbul' igazi lakhe, Laphalazwa ngenxa yam', Ezandlen', ezinyaweni, Yalinyazw' İNkosi yam', Manje ngiyathethelelwa Konk' okubi okukim', Senginikw' impilo yona' Evelayo eNkosini'.

4
Wangizwisa izwi lakhe, Wangibiza ngom'sa nam', Senginguy' umuntu wakhe, Ngasindisw' nguMfeli wam'; Sengiyakulangazela, Ukumbon' uqobo le, Khon' ekhaya ezulwini, Yek' injabuliso, he!

title: uJesu ugumhlobo
lyrics:
1
UJesu unguMhlobo wam', Kukade wangithanda; Ngothando wangidonsa nam', Nangalo wangilanda. Ungibophile ngalo, ngqi. Sengiyamthanda nami, Nginamathela, kuthi ngci, UnguMvikeli wami.

2
UJesu unguMhlobo wam', Ophiw' amandla onke; Ulonda inhliziyo yam' Ezingozini zonke. Ungithembis' umqhele, ha. Uyangithand' impela. Sengathi ngingamkhonza la, Ngokuba wangifela.

3
UJesu unguMhlobo wam', Umnene unomusa. UMhloli endleleni yam', Nxa ngiwa, ungivusa. Sekuzokhuhlwa khona la. Mathunzi asemade, Ngingahlukana naye, qha! Nginaye naphakade.

title: Masimdumise uJehova
lyrics:
1
Simdumisa uJehova, OyiNkosi yokwahlula, Siyabonga um'sa wakhe, Selethile ukuthula. Uyawisa imibuso, Yon' ethokozel' ukulwa; UJehova uyabusa, Yena akanakwahlulwa. Makabongwe uJehova, Makabongwe uJehova, Makabongwe uJehova, OyİNkosi yokuthula!

2
Zonk' izizwe mazithule, Zimazis' uNkulunkulu, Mazibuz' intando yakhe Ohleziyo le phezulu. Uthi: "Akuyi ngamandla Nobuqhwaga nezikhali". Kuya ngaw' umqondo wakhe; Masimvume, singamali.

3
Imibuso yalomhlaba Iyazamazama, kodwa Siyambhek' uKrist' İNkosi, Ulithemba lethu lodwa. Ngakho siyacela sithi, "Mawufik' umbuso wakho Njengezulu njal' umhlaba, Uyivez intando yakho."

title: Zanini, zizwe bo
lyrics:
1
Zanini zizwe bo, Sivumelane sonke! Sizomdumis' uMntwana NguJesu oyiNkosi. Bayethe Nkosi'! EnguNgqongqoshe. Bayethe Nkosi'! Emiyo njalo. Bayethe Nkosi'! ESimakade. USomandla.

2
Vumani zizwe, bo, Guqani, hloniphani! Thobani, khothamani, Vumani - yon' İNkosi!

3
Bongani, zizwe, bo Umhlaba mawudume! Thusani, babazani, Bongan' uJes' İNkosi!

4
Thelani, zizwe bo, Ningabogodla lutho! Nizinikele kuye, Bhekani nans' İNkosi!

title: Uthando lukaBaba
lyrics:
1
Uthando lukaBaba Lunjengolwandle bo, Lubanzi lujulile, Luyazeka yini pho?

2
Lwafinyelela kimi Ngisezonweni zam', Alwaze Iwangedlula, Lwangisindisa nam'.

3
O, Baba ngiyabonga Nangenhliziyo yam', Sengiyavuma ngithi, UnguMsindisi wam'.

4
Ngizokwethemba njalo Ngisesemhlabeni, Ngizokukhonza futhi, Ngothando enhlizi'weni.

title: Masihlabelele
lyrics:
1
Masihlabelele ngentokozo Ngosindiso olungapheliyo; Abadala nezingane nazo, Masivume sonke ngenhliziyo. ENkosini yethu siyohuba. Siyibonge sisenal' ithuba, Yasihlenga ngal' igazi layo; 'Nkosi idunysw' abantu bayo.

2
Abomhlaba badumis' okwabo, Amahashi kanye nezinkomo; Ubukhulu nezimfuyo zabo, Badumis' okwabo ngenhlokomo. Pho-ke, singazithulela yini Ngokungathi asinanjabulo; Kanti intokozo eNkosini Izwakala ngawo amaculo.

3
Nabaning' abasebedangele, Bangavuswa ngokuhlabelela, Nxa siqhutshw' uMoya oyiNgcwele, Simdumis' uJesu owasifela. Nabaningi abedukileyo, Bobuyiswa ngokuhuba kwethu; Bayishiy' indlel' edukileyo, Babuyele eNkosini yethu.

title: Nxa ngikhumbula
lyrics:
1
Nxa ngikhumbula, Baba, Umusa wakho wonke, Kuveza ukwethaba Ngemihla yami yonke; Kula ngijabulela, Kubong' igama lakho, Nokuyishumayela Inndab' emnandi yakho.

2
Wasipha iNdondana Ezelwe yodwa yakho; Ngempela uyaphana. Sikhul' isisa sakho; Sisekulahlekeni, Saholw' umoy' omubi, Sishona ekufeni, Ebumnyamen' obubi.

3
Senginezibusiso, NgoJesu uMsindisi, Uqede izifiso, Azisangikhalisi; Ngob' uyanganelisa, Unami endleleni. Uyangigcwalisisa Ngothabo enhliziyweni.

4
Pho, sengikhalelani? UJesu unganele; Ngenama ngokunjani? Impela kufanele, Kuhlatshw' umkhos' omkhulu, Kubongw' umusa wakhe, Malinkethez' izulu, Lidum' igama lakhe.

title: Malenanele izulu
lyrics:
1
Lenan' izulu ngeculo lami, Ngithethelelwe izon zam'! UJesu wafa 'ndaweni yami, Izono zami zikude nam'; Njeng' enhlukano yempumalanga, Nentshonalanga, sikude le. Ushilo njalo, akanamanga, Ngithemba kuye, ngimbonga nje.

2
Sengiyahamba ekukhanyeni, Igazi liyangihlanza, qhwa. Uyangigcina nasothandweni, Ngiphathwa njalo ngomusa, dwa. Noma ngiyize la' othulini, Ngiyindlalifa yeNkosi le. Imfuyo yami isezulwini, Igcinwe kahle impela, he!

3
Nalenjabulo esenginayo Ngingeyaphucwe ngumutnu, qha! Noma ngihlezi ngizindla ngayo. Imiyalo yakhe inzima na? Uhlala kimi, ngihlala kuye, Nguyen' owenz' umsebenzi la, Kozinikela, aphathwe nguye, Uyamnqobela nezitha nya.

4
Anduba ngiyakumbona khona Ekhaya lakhe, phezulu ha. Bazokhanyis' okwelanga bona Abamlandel' emhlabeni la. Yebo-ke nawe ongakakholwa, Uyabizelw' enhlanhleni bo; Lomus' ongaka sewungatholwa, Wanele bonke umusa lo.

title: Siyabonga umusa
lyrics:
1
Sesiyawubonga umusa weNkosi, Nobude bothando namnadla engalo; Isisindisile, isikhululile, Iyakusilonda singabi-navalo.

2
Umhlaba, nolwandle, nelanga, nenyanga, Masimu, nehlathi, nomoya, nemvula, Kuyasitshengisa ngeliz' elikhulu, Amandla kaThixo ongenakudlula.

3
Siyalidumisa igama leNkosi; Thin' esasifile, isiphilisile, Ngokufa 'kaJesu esiphambanweni, Isisondezile, isibusisile.

4
Sesikhululiwe ngegazi leMvana; Sesiyathokoza impel' eNkosini. Sizoyilalela, sizoyilandela, Sizoyidumisa phakad' ezulwni.

title: Masisho ingoma
lyrics:
1
Masisho ingoma ngoJesu iNkosi, Owasisindisa sikuyo ingozi; Ngokusihlawulela wavula indlela, Singeze sibhubhe uma simlandela. Haleluya kuJesu owasikhulula! Sombonga kakhulu Phesheya komfula.

2
Noma inhliziyo igcwele ukhona, Yohlanzwa nguJesu nxa engena khona. Yen' uyozinqob' azibhuqe izitha, Nokuba zinjani uyakuzichitha.

3
Ngakho zinikele kuJes' uMsindisi, Ucashe kuyena onguMnqobisisi, Khona-ke unalo ithemb' enhliziyweni, Elingajabhisi nom' usekufeni.

title: Ngiyocula
lyrics:
1
Ngiyocula, ngiyocula, NgoMsindisi wami; Ulungisa konke, Ngezinsuku zonke, Unginaka nokunaka, UnguMhlengi wami.

2
Mawubongwe, mawubongwe, Wena Thixo wami! Wasinik' uJesu, Yena waba nesu Lokusus' izono zonke, Namacala ami.

3
Yek' inhlanhla, yek' inhlanhla, Sengiyitholile! Ngangisodakeni, Ngangisekufeni, Ngaphiliswa, ngaphiliswa, Lapho sengifile.

4
Jabula-ke, thokoza-ke! We, mphefumlo wami, Hub' ihubo lakho NgoMsindisi wakho! Unqobile, unqobile Zonk' izitha zakho.

title: Yeka uthando
lyrics:
1
Zanin' masihube kanyekanye Ngal' uthando, ngal' uthando, Anal' uYis' ebathand' abantu Enikel' iNdondana. Yek' uthando, yek' uthando Anal' uBaba elithanda izwe! Ubafuna, ubafuna Abadukile 'kuba basindiswe.

2
Ukuba sibone loluthando, Yeza yona iNdondana, Kwabalusizi nabadingayo, Ethwal' okwab ukona.

3
Uyabafun' abedukileyo, Mus' ukuthi: "Ngiyakunce." Namhl' uyabizwa obhungukileyo, Ukubuyel' ekhaya.

4
Nkosi, gcwalis' inhliziyo yami Ngal' uthando olungcwele; Khipha inzondo nenkani yonke, Ngena uhlale khona.

title: Ngihlabelele udaba
lyrics:
1
Ngiyohlabelel' udaba LukaJesu Mhlobo wethu; Walishiy' izulu lakhe, Ezothwal' ihlazo lethu. Yebo, ngiyohlabelela Ngaye owangifelayo. Ngiyohuba nabangcwele Ngomhla angigodusayo.

2
Ngangilahlekile, kepha Manje ngingotholiweyo; Wangam'kela, engigona, Senginguy' othandiweyo.

3
Ngilimele, wangelapha Ngisengothothobeleyo; Ngilusizi, ngasindiswa Min' engiphumputhekayo.

4
Ubumnyama busamboza 'Ndlela engihamba ngayo, UMsindis' unami kodwa, Nguye ongikhanyisayo.

title: Njengenyoni
lyrics:
1
Njengeyoni egatsheni, yona, Ijabul' ihlabelela khona, Njalo nami sengikhululiwe, Sengihlengiw' uMhlengi wam'.

2
Waf' uJesu ukungikhulula, Ngakho inhliziyo siyavula, 'Gazi likaJesu liqedile, Lihlangulil' icala lam'.

3
Ngakho ngiyibong' iNkosi yami, Isusile zonk' izono zami, Azisoze zibuyela kimi, Vuka-ke, limi! Huba nje!

4
Njengempumalanga yahlukene Nay' intshonalanga kungehlangane, Njal' uJes' udedisil' izono Ngowak' umkhono. Halala!

5
Seluthul' uvalo enhliziyweni, Kade lubhakuz' esifubeni, 'Jesu usindisa ngokwempela Abamvumela lokhu-ke.

6
Sengilangazela ukumbona Ezululwani, lapho eye' khona. Ngiyombonga kanye nabangcwele, Ngob' usifele ngom'sa, he!

title: Ufikile ukhisimusi
lyrics:
1
Ufikil' uKhisimusi, Sebebhek' abantu bonke Ukuphiw' iziph' ezinhle, Izingubo nakho konke. Bhekanini nas' iSipho Esaphiwa kulow'mzui, Othiwa iBetlehema, Lawaqal' uKhisimusi.

2
Ufikil' uKhisimusi, 'Kenivul' im'nyango yenu, Nisamkel' iSipho leso, EsinguMsindisi wenu. Ingelosi yayibika Leyondaba kubelusi: "Nizalelwe iNdondana." Yek' omuhl' uKhisimusi!

3
Ufikl' uKhisimusi, 'Zingelosi ziyavuma: "Indumiso eNkosini!" O, sengathi lungaduma, Lunkethez' ezweni lonke, Njengensimbi eyethusi, Balalele bonk' abantu, Sidle kahl' uKhisimusi.

4
Ufikil' uKhisimusi EAfrika kwabansundu. Wen' oleth' indaba enhle, Kwel' intaba uthi ndundu, Umemeze, bezwe bonke, Abampofu nababusi. Sikhangeze thina sonke, Siwamkel' uKhisimusi.

5
Ufikil' uKhisimusi, 'Kesibhek' umangaliso; Nang' uThixo engumuntu, Oyindlela neqinso Chaza, Moya oyiNgcwele, Vusa wena ongumvusi! Siphaphame thin' abantu, Siwuthol' uKhisimusi.

title: Vuka sekusile
lyrics:
1
Vuka, nakhu sekusile, UMsindisi ufikile! Ubumnyama bubaleka, Yikho kade bekubheka, Bakufuna ngokukhala Abangcwele bokuqala. Haleluya! Haleluya!

2
Nang' oLanga lokulunga, Naz' izazi ziyamkhunga, Ufikile uMkhululi, Wabafela abaphuli, Seliklebhukil' iveli, Livuliwe iThempeli. Haleluya! Haleluya!

3
Selithwas' elihl' ihlobo, Zizogcwala izingobo; Ngob' uJes' ungulovela, Olungasenakuphela; Uyisinkwa sokuphila, Kuphelile ukuzila. Haleluya! Haleluya!

title: Weza ukungifuna
lyrics:
1
'Jesu, 'Msindisi, wavela ngale, Wehla wazalwa eBetlehema he. Khona wabekwa emkhombeni-ke, Weza ukungifuna, Weza ukungifuna, Yeka uthando olungakaya! Weza ukungifuna.

2
'Jesu, 'Msindisi olungileyo, Wasihlawulela emthin' ethi nzo. Yeka umusa. Uqin' uthi ngo! La' wangifela mina, La' wangifela mina. Yeka uthando olungakaya! La' wangifela mina.

3
'Jesu, 'Msindisi, kunguyena-ke, Owangifuna ngidukile, he, Wangibuyisa endlelenni le, Wangibuyisa mina, Wangibuyisa mina. Yeka uthando olungakaya! Wangibuyisa mina.

4
'Jesu, 'Msindisi, wenyukele le, Uyakubuya masinyane nje; Liyakukhala icilongo-ke, Wosibizel' ekhaya, Wosibizel' ekhaya, Yeka uthando olungakaya! Wosibizel' ekhaya.

title: Halala khisimusi
lyrics:
1
Halala, nank' umkhosi! Zahub' izingelosi, Zambong' uNkulunkulu. UJesu wayezalwa Ngenkathi yokubalwa, 'Mkhululi waphezulu. Huba, Qhuba! Nans' indaba yokwethaba Yabo bonke, Ngaye uSomusa wonke.

2
UThixo wahlangana Nabantu ngeNdondana, Eyithum' emhlabeni, Ngeqiniso nomusa. Ufun' ukubavusa Abantu ezonweni. Bonga, Khonga, LeNdodana, lyaphana, 'Kuthandana Kwaba kade bezondana.

3
Wembath' ubuntu bethu UJesu ungumfowethu, Wangena osizini; Ngokusihlawulela Wasivulel' indlela Yokuya ezulwini. Ngena, Wena, Nami futhi Singaphuthi Le phezulu Emkhosini lo' omkhulu.

4
Uzel' ukusivusa, Ilanga elomusa, Alisayikushona. INkos' enkul' eyiyo. Umbus' omuhl' omiyo, Ungek' uphele wona. Mana, Mvana! Nkos' enkulu, Yaphezulu. Vez' ingalo, Usibuse njalo njalo!

title: Ukuzalwa komsindisi
lyrics:
1
Le, emzin' eBetlehema Wayezalwa uMsindisi, Lawabekwa emkhombeni, Ngobumpofu nalusizi; Abomhlaba bameyisa, 'Zingelosi zamdumisa.

2
Wayevela ezulwini, EyiNkosi yakho konke, Kepha wayezithobisa Phansi ngenxa yethu sonke. Ungowethu thin' abantu, USindiso Iwethu, nantu.

3
Wayezalwa engumntwana, Aze azwelane nathi, Waba nobuthakathaka, Ezwa ubunzima ngathi; Nasentokozweni yethu. Ungumhlanganyeli wethu.

4
Soyibona ezulwini, 'Nkosi enomus' ongaka, Owembath' ubuntu bethu, Usisiza, esinaka. Ubayisa abantwana Ezulwini. Hosiyana!

5
Khona sizombon' uJesu, Esebukhosini bakhe, Edunyiswa lonk' izulu, Liluhub' udumo Iwakhe. Khona sohlangana, bandla, Ngom'sa wakhe onamandla.

title: Sinokhisimusi
lyrics:
1
Yilowo ufanele 'Kuvuka alalele Udaba Iwengelosi; Ibika inkululo, Iletha injabulo, Nang' uMsindis' İNkosi.

2
Sesizalelw' uMntwana, Sinikiw' iNdondana. Ulele emkombeni, Uvela le phezulu, Ethunyw' nguNkulunkulu, Ukuza emhlabeni.

3
Nguyen' onguSomandla, Uphethwe ngaz' izandla, Enjeng' omuny' umntwana. Nas' isimangaliso; Useyinhlanganiso, Uqed' ukwahlukana.

4
UJes' ungumfowethu, Wembath' ubuntu bethu, UYena wosisiza. Nango onguMesiya, Akakho ongamthiya, Umbus' uyowumisa.

5
Ngakho sesimdumisa Yebo, simhalalisa Yen' oliqhawe lethu. Sifana nabelusi, SesinoKhisimusi OwoMsindisi wethu.

title: Buhle ubusuku
lyrics:
1
Buhl' ubusuku laph' izingelosi Zahlabelela iculo lezulu. Bamangaliswa kakhul' abelusi, Bawalalela amazw' amakhulu: "Makube kuNkulunkulu Ubukhosi ezulwini, Nokuthula emhlabeni, Nothandano ebantwini."

2
Yeka uthand' olukhulu impela, UNkulunkulu wayesikhumbula, Ephana ngayo iyodw' iNdondana, Igcwel' umusa, ileth' ukuthula.

3
Nathi sivume iculu elihle, Sivumelane naz' izingelosi, Sibong' iSipho, 'sikhulu kangaka, Malidunyiswe igama leNkosi!

title: Umnyaka omusha
lyrics:
1
'Suphelile lowomnyak' omdala, Nentokozo nehlupheko yawo; Kungumusa uma sesiqala 'Nyak' omusha nezinhlanhla zawo. Siyafuna ukuqala konke Egameni likaJesu, 'Nkosi; Ngoba yena unamandla onke, Wosigcina kuzo zonk' ingozi.

2
Ungubani ongabala konke Esenzelwe kuwo wok' umnyaka? Wasilinda ngezinsuku zonke, Wasiphatha kahle, wasinaka. Uma kungayanga ngom'sa wodwa, Ngabe silahlelwe ekufeni; Kodwa ngom'sa nangothando lodwa Sisekhona lapha emhlabeni.

3
Singaleth' intoni manje thina, Siwubonge lowomus' ongaka? Wasinakekela, wasigcina Zonk' insuku zawo lowomnyaka. Kufanele thina sinikele Ngemizimba nem'phefum'lo yethu, Ngenhliziyo yonke, iphelele, Siyibonge ngakho konk' okwethu.

4
Nxa sibheka nank' umnyak' omusha, Siyazicelela um'sa wakho, U'ba sibe-nokuphil' okusha, Okusifanele thin' abakho. Kumbe ngalomnyaka siyobizwa, Siyomuka siye eNkosini, Ngakho ngasifun' ukulungiswa, Sibe-nokungena ezulwini.

title: Limnandi
lyrics:
1
Igama likaJesu, he Limnandi endlebeni; Liyaphelis' usizi-ke, Limuthi enhliz'weni.

2
Liyapholis' inxeba, nya, Liluthulis' uvalo; Limana lomphefum'lo la, Lisiqinisa njalo.

3
Lidwala eliqina, ngo, Inqaba nesihlangu, Ithemba elimiyo, nqo, UMhlengi wami, nangu.

4
UJes' unguMsindisi wam', UMyeni noMhlawuleli; Indela nokuphila kwam', Umhlobo ongumMeli.

5
Kufuphi ukubonga kwam' Wen' oSomuhlekazi, Zincane izibongo zam', Wangithenga ngegazi.

6
Ngithanda ukuqala la' 'Kubong' igama lakho; Kepha ngale, Haleluya! Lukhul' udumo Iwakho.

title: Igama likaJesu
lyrics:
1
Ngazo zonk' izinsuku, Yebo, zonk' izinsuku; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam', Elakho igama.

2
Qha, ngingeze ngipheze, Ngolibonga ngifeze; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam', Elakho igama.

3
Awu, limnandi, lingcwele, Enhliz'weni ligcwele; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam', Elakho igama.

4
UyİNkosi yezulu, Uphakeme kakhulu; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam', Elakho igama.

5
Wazithobisa wena, Weza wabayiMvana; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam', Elakho igama.

6
Wazithwala izono, Woza, we-bani, shono; Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam' Elakho igama.

title: Umnayaka wenkosi
lyrics:
1
Sekungumnyak' omuhle, Sezihlawulelw' izono; Ugcwalisiw' umthetho Ngaw' umhlatshel' ongcono. Ababeyizigqili Nababenamacala, Sebekhululw' uJesu; Ngakho sithi; Halala! Makadunyisw' uJesu, Ngoba wazinikela; Ngalo igazi lakhe Yena wasihlawulela. Wawugcwalis' umthetho Ngakho ukufa kwakhe; Njalo alikh' igama Eselingangelakhe.

2
Seyivuliw' indlela, Yona eya phezulu, Singazondela manje Kuye uNkulunkulu. Esihlalweni som'sa, Abasondela khona, Nang' uMsindis' ehlezi, Uyahlangul' ukhona.

3
Njalo seniyamenywa, Nin' eninamacala, Nang' uMhlawuleli wenu, Mbhala, niyakumala? Lesisikhathi som'sa Sizakuphela sona; Shesh' umamkel' uJesu, Othethelel' ukona.

title: Limnandi kimi
lyrics:
1
Limnandi kimi lelogam', Nguyen' owangifela nam'; Ligcwele enhliz'weni yam', Igama likaJesu. "UJesu," alimnandi, pho! "UJesu," limi njalo bo! "UJesu," ngizakulisho Namanje naphakade.

2
"UJesu" - eloMfeli wam', Owazithwal' izono zam'; Oseqedil' uvalo Iwam', Ngiyamuthand' uJesu.

3
Ingekhathal' indlebe, qha, Ilizwa lelogama la; Liqed' izinyebezi nya, EloMsindis' uJesu.

4
Alikho nelilodwa, qha, Ezweni noma laphaya; Singelibonge sonke na, Elihle likaJesu?

title: Indaba emnandi
lyrics:
1
Imnandi indaba kaJesu, UMsindisi wabantu nowami; Owez' ezofela izoni, Bongani, ngizobonga nami. Indaba emangalisayo; Ayikho emnandi kunayo; Ngoyiland' ezulwini, Lendaba emnandi, Ngimbhek' uMsindis' ebusweni.

2
Wafika evel' ezulwini, Wasithenga ngelakhe igazi; Az' asikhulule ekufeni, Impel', ukubong' asikwazi.

3
Lomusa ngumfula omkhulu, Kululwandle lothando Iwakhe; Senganelisiwe kakhulu Ukungisindisa kwakhe.

title: uJesu - Nguye njalo
lyrics:
1
Kuyinsindiso inye, Igama linye nalo; Isisekelo sinye, UJesu nguye njalo. Alikh' eliny' igama, Esingasinda ngalo; Kuqala nokuphela, UJesu nguye njalo.

2
Isango linye nalo, Esivulelwe lona; Kungumhlatshelo munye Ohlawulel' ukona.

3
Khulis' udumo Iwalo, E, bafo nabodade! UJesu nguye njalo Namanje naphakade.

title: Bongani igama
lyrics:
1
Bongani igama leNkosi enkulu, Ngasesigodini naphezu kwentaba. Bakithi, qhuban' iVangeli elihle, Ukuba abantu bayizwe lendaba! Uthando IweNkosi lufana nomfula, Nomusa uhlezi, awunakudlula.

2
Bongani iMvana, yafela izoni, Yangen' ethuneni yavuk' enqobile; Yenyuka phezulu, yobuya ibuye 'Kumisa umbuso, laph' esefikile.

3
UJes' uMsindisi unibusisile, Ningabozikhohlw' izibusiso zonke; Nam'kele kuyena izinto eziningi, Ngalokho mbongeni, bakholwayo bonke.

4
Nizibonge zonke izipho ezinhle, Impilo emiyo evela phezulu; Niphiw' ukuthula nokulunga kwakhe, Ngakho nimenzele udum' olukhulu.

title: Inqaba yami
lyrics:
1
Igama leNkosi liyiyo inqaba, Ophephela khona uyakusindiswa. Ohlezi kuyona akanakwesaba, Nokuba umhlaba uzanyazanyiswa.

2
Abayokhulek' egameni leNkosi Bayakusindiswa, uyasho umbhalo. Libongwe ngabantu, libongw' ingelosi! Alikho igama elihle njengalo.

3
Igama leNkosi linika amandla, Liyawaqinisa amadolo ethu; Lisusa uvalo, linika inhlanhla, Liyasikhanyisa endleleni yethu.

4
Mhla ngiykumuka, ngishiye lomhlaba, Igama leNkosi lithikithi lami; Khona ngiyohamba, ngingenakwesaba; Ngocasha kuJesu, enguMhlengi wami.

title: Inyanga enkulu
lyrics:
1
Inyang' enkul' ikhona la, Ogama linguJesu; Umlulamis' ophansi la, Manimlalel' uJesu. Liphi eliny' igama na, Esisindiswa ngalo la? Alikh' eliny' igama, qha, ElikaJesu lodwa.

2
Uyazesul' izono nya, Manimlalel' uJesu; Nihambe niye ezulwin', Nihlale nay' uJesu.

3
Udumo lonke kuye la, Sengimethemb' uJesu. Ngiyalithanda leligam', Igama likaJesu.

4
Liyaphelis' icala lam Igama likaJesu. Liyangithokozisa nam', Igama likaJesu.

5
Wozani, bazalwane bam', Nibong' iNkosi uJesu. Bodade, nilihlabelel', Igama likaJesu.

6
Bantwana, wozanini bo, Nonk' enimthand' uJesu, Nibizwa nani namhlanje, Nibong' iNkosi uJesu.

7
Nxa senyukele ezulwin', Sibon' İNkos' uJesu, Sohlabelela futhi le, Igama likaJesu.

title: uJesu usenjalo
lyrics:
1
Nguy' uJesu usenjalo Njengomhla ehleziphansi, Ekhuluma nalomfazi Owafik' ukukh' amanzi; Embonis' izono zakhe Ngamazwana angemade; Unguyena njalonjalo, 'Zolo, namhla naphakade.

2
Nguy' uJesu owamelapha Lowomunt' odliw' uchoko; Wathi: "Nxa uthanda, Nkosi, Ungasus' ukufa lokho." Khon' uJesu wamphendul: "Ngiyathanda, hlambuluka!" Mbhala, wasehlanjuluwa, Lonk' uchoko selwasuka.

3
Nguy' uJesu esuthisa Isixuku le ehlane, Bona ababemlandela, Babe izinkulungwane. Ngaz' izinkwa ezihlanu Nenhlanzana ezimbili Wenz' inala khon' ehlane, La' ukudla kungamili.

4
Nguy' uJes' elila nabo eBethani', ethuneni, Wayemvusa uLazaru, Wamphumisa ekufeni. Nay' umame waseNain', Obefelwe umntanakhe, Ngezwi linye wayemvusa, Esul' inyembezi zakhe.

5
Nguy' uJes' osinikayo Konk' okuhle esinakho, Ukhuluma okumnandi, Sibe-siduduzwa ngakho. Welusizi emhlabeni, Uyabaz' abalusizi, Ubezwela nxa bekhala, Ungowabo uMsindisi.

6
Nguy' uJes owabethelwa, Wasifela thina zoni, Manje usesezulwini, NakuYise kananhloni. 'Kusibiza "bazalwane", Ethi: "bafo nabodade". Haleluya, usenjalo, 'Zolo, namhla naphakade.

title: Yizwani indaba
lyrics:
1
Yizwan' indaba, indab' enkulu NgoJesu Krist', uMsindisi wethu. Washiy' okuhle ngale phezulu, Wez' ukuthwala usizi Iwethu.

2
Waba sengathi akanamandla, Kanti-ke ungozithobisayo; Wasilethela enkul' inhlanhla, Wathwal' izifo zabagulayo.

3
Wavul' amehlo ezimpumputhe, Wabahambis' abayizinyonga. Owamethemba kazang' amluthe, Basizwa bonke ababemkhonza.

4
Wavul' indlebe zabazithulu, Nabashwabene wabaqinisa. Wavul' im'lomo yezimungulu, Naz' izinhlanya wazithobisa.

5
Wavusa abafileyo futhi, Nabanochoko wabaphilisa. Baningi babemdumisa, bethi: "Wenzile kahle, wasisindisa."

6
Washumayela indaba enhle Kubona abadabukileyo. Babemlandel' emahlane, endle, Wabasuthis' abalambileyo.

7
Nizokwenzani ngoJesu nina? Nangu-ke uze kithina 'mpela; Ufuna ukusisiza thina, Ubani manje ozomvumela?

title: Wabampofu
lyrics:
1
Izinyoni zinezindlu zazo Lapho zingathokomala khona, Nempungushe zinem'godi yazo, Ziyabalekela kuyo zona.

2
Kodw' İNkosi yamakhosi, yona Yayingenandawo yokuhlala; Kwathi nxa ilanga selishona, Wayeding' indawo yokulala.

3
Nom' abany' abantu sebelele Ebusuke bonke embhedeni, Wafunyanwa ebathandazele Ebusuku bonke entabeni.

4
Wabampofu ngenxa yethu njalo, 'Kuba sibenendlu ezulwini; Wayithwal' eyethu imithwalo, Siphumule thina ebomini.

5
Noma s'ngabampofu emhlabeni, Sikhumbule ubumpfou bakhe; Soduduzwa ngakho enhliz'weni, Uyezwana nathi ngom'sa wakhe.

title: Hosiyana
lyrics:
1
Vukani, bandla bo, Nimbhek' uMbusi lo! Uyeza kithi, nango, Masimvulel' im'nyango. Hosiyana, Nkosi, yethu, Nant' udumiso Iwethu!

2
Kabonakali la Umqhele wakhe, qha. Wembethe ubuphansi, Yam'kel' İNkosi, nansi.

3
Bheka İNkosi-ke, Enyuk' eBetfage, Nanso-ke ithi ndundu, Ibongwa ngamasundu.

4
Ibingelele-ke, Ngecul' elihle-hle; Iyeza ithobile, Ingathi inqobile.

5
N'engane ezinci, Ziyagcwalisa swi, Zicul' ethempelini Hosiyana eNkosini!

title: Wozanini
lyrics:
1
Wozanini, sihlangane Nazo izingelos', Abadala nezingane, Masidumis' İNkos'. Makabongwe njalo le, Owahlatshwa eGolgotha! Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya, Amen!

2
IMvana-ke ifanele Udumo lonke, he; Phuthumani, nivumele Ngembong' enkulu-ke!

3
Waleng' esiphambanweni, 'Bantu bengamazi; Ukubahleng' ekoneni Laphal' igazi.

4
Yizwani lokhu, nina-ke Enisezonweni! Seningathukululwa, he, Khon' ekuboshweni.

title: Uthini na?
lyrics:
1
Ngangena ekufeni 'Kuhlenga wena, vo. Usesebumnyameni, Uboshw' izono, wo. Ngathwal' icala lakho la; Ungenzeleni na?

2
Ngashiy' ikhaya lona Nobuhle ezulwin'. 'Kufel' okwakh' ukona Ngehlela osizin', Ngashiya konk' okuhle, wo; Ushiya ntoni, pho?

3
Ngathukwa, ngangeyiswa, Ngenziwa mubi nje. EGolgotha ngayiswa Ngecala lakho-ke. Kwenziwa ngenxa yakho la, 'Suthini ngakho na?

4
Sengingqongqotha njena Emnyango wakho la. 'Suthini manje wena, Wongivulela na? Ngakuhambela khona la, 'Suyeza kimi na?

title: Ngimkhumbula
lyrics:
1
Ngimkhumbula efayo, 'Jesu wam'. * Nkosi yam'! Mhla ehlushwa ngenxa yezono zam'. Wo! Maye! Namhla Mina sengibuhlungu, Maye! Maye! *Buhlungu enhliziywen', Ngimkhumbula efa, uJesu wam'.

2
Bhek' efelwa ngamathe ebuswen'. * Nkosi yam'! Bammukhula bamshaya emzimben'.

3
Bhek' umqhele wameva ebunzin'. *Nkosi yam'! Yekanini, bamhlek' esosizini.

4
'Siphambano samsinda endlelen'. *Nkosi yam'! Wawa naso eqhutshwa ekufen'.

5
Mhla elenga emthini khona le, * Nkosi yam'! Bameyise bamhlek' usulu nje.

6
Egebisa ikhanda ekufen' *Nkosi yam'! Wafa esedabuka enhliz'wen'. ( *Bass only)

title: Wazinikela ekufeni
lyrics:
1
Umhlaba wonke weduka nje, Balahlekile nya. Wafik' uJesu waba-nguMsindisi, Kungekh' omunye, qha. Wazinikela ekufen', Osizini la. O, Jesu, Nkosi, Mfeli wami, Sengingathini na?

2
Washiy' ubumnandi ezulwin' Nekhaya elihle le, Izingelosi, yebo, nobukhosi, Washiya konke, he!

3
Wazalwa enjengomuntu la Esitebelweni le. EnguSomandla, kazikhulisanga, Qha, wazithoba nje.

4
Emthini-ke, njengumphangi nje, Walenga khona le, Ehlushwa kabi, nom' engenacala, Wazinikela-ke.

5
Wathwal' izono-ke emzimben' Olungileyo lo, Ongenasono wabalwa nezoni, Wafa eyedwa-wo!

title: Imvana engenacala
lyrics:
1
O, Mvan' engenacala Owabethelw' emthini. Elami walithwala, Ngikhishiwe ebubini. Wathwal' izono zami Ne'qalekiso sami. Wangenz' ongenacala.

2
Khon' esiphambanweni Laphel' elam' icala. Lagqitshwa othandweni, Wakheth' ukulithwala. Waba othukiweyo, Wavum' inhlamba leyo U'ba ungisindise.

title: Esiphambanweni
lyrics:
1
Jesu, esiphambanweni Ngikubona khona, Lapho-ke usekufeni, Uthwesiw' ukona. Jesu wami, Jesu wami! Usihlenga thina. Kawunaz' izono wena, Wangifela mina.

2
Ngimi esiphambanweni, Ngibuk' amanxeba, 'Zinyaweni, ezandleni, 'Zono zakudweba. Meli wami, Meli wami! Wena unamandla Ukusul' izono zami Ngazo lezozandla.

3
Ngimi esiphambanweni, Kungimangalisa, Wen' uqob' usekufeni, 'Mphangi wamsindisa, Nkosi yami, Nkosi yami! Wawubanxusela: "Baba, abahluphi bami, Wobathethelela."

4
Ngimi esiphambanweni Ngiyacela kuwe, Ngibe-nawe ekufeni Ngokukholwa nguwe. Mfeli wami, Mfeli wami! Thath' uqobo Iwami, Ube-ngukuphila kwami, Ube 'Myeni wami.

title: Umhlatshelo wezono
lyrics:
1
Igazi lemihlatshelo Yonke yabaJuda Lalingeluqed' uvalo, Lingesus' ukona.

2
Kodwa elikaKristu wo, Elaphalazwa, ha! Lisusa zonk' izono bo, Liqed' icala nya.

3
Ngokukholwa ngiyabeka Isandla sami-ke Phezu kwekhanda leMvana, Ngivum' izono, he!

4
Sengiyamethemba lowo Owanikelwa le EGolgotha, ngezono zam', Nezabantu bonke.

5
Yilona liyithemba lam', Ngongena ngalo-ke, Ngohuba nesixuku nam', Ngibonge lona nje.

title: Thina sihlengiwe
lyrics:
1
Thina sihlengiwe, Igazi likaJesu,
Yebo sithengiwe, Igazi likaJesu;
Lona lasophela, Lapho esifela,
Lasithethelela, Igazi likaJesu.

2
Likuthula kwethu, Igazi likaJesu,
Nenjabulo yethu, Igazi likaJesu;
Amacala onke, Naz' izono zonke,
Kupheliswa konke, Igazi likaJesu.

3
Likuphila kwethu, Igazi likaJesu,
Liyithemba lethu, Igazi likaJesu;
Lapha emhlabeni, Nxa sisekulweni,
Noma ekufeni, Igazi likaJesu.

4
Balibonga bonke, Igazi likaJesu,
Indumiso yonke, Igazi likaJesu;
Yabasembusweni, Ekujabuleni,
Besho bonk' "Ameni!" Igazi likaJesu.

title: Igazi likaJesu
lyrics:
1
Igazi likaJesu ha, Lisithethele sonke,
Lihlanzisisa kuthi qhwa, Kuphel' izono zonke.

2
Kulowomthomb' omuhle hle Bayahlangana bona,
Ababonil' izifo-ke, Bayaphiliswa khona.

3
Lenhlanhla ayinkulu na? Kutholwa ukuphila,
Akangatshelw' umuntu, qha, Ubani osazila?

4
Lomthombo unguJesu-ke, Uyasimema yena:
"Wozani emanzini nje," Ningabi nakwenqena.

5
Owaphuzay' amanzi la Akayikufa futhi;
Kususwa konk' ukufa nya; Impela angumuthi.

6
Namhlanje wophangisa ha, Ithuba liyadlula;
Ngob' iHayides' alikho, qha, Nathonsi lalomfula.

title: Linamandla igazi leMvana
lyrics:
1
Mbhal' ungathand' ukwethulelwa na? Likhona igazi, lon' eleMvana.
Nobubi bonke ubungobe na? Lethembe igazi leMvana.
Linamandla, linamandla du, Lon' igazi leMvana.
Linamandla, linamandla du, Eligugu eleMvana.

2
Nolaka Iwakho lungachithwa nya, Likhona igazi, lon' eleMvana,
Yebo-ke nakho ukuziqhenya Ngelihle igazi leMvana.

3
Woza kalokhu, ube-mhlophe qhwa, Likhona igazi, lon' eleMvana.
Konk' ukungcola kuzophela nya Kosuswa igazi leMvana.

4
UMfeli wakho ungamkhonza na? Likhona igazi, lon' eleMvana.
Zonk' izinsuku ungambona na? Wohlala eduze negazi.

title: Iculo ngeGolgotha
lyrics:
1
Ngolicula iculo laseGolgotha, Ngaye lo owangifela khona,
Ngobuhlungu owayebuzwa ngenxa yam', Nangegaz' elangihlanza nami.
Osizini Iwakhe babembhinga nje; Yek' umthwal' ongaka awuthwala!
Zonk' izono zomhlaba, yebo naz' ezam' Wazithwala esiphambanweni.
Wangifela, Wangifela, UJesu unguyen' uMfeli wami.
Wangifela eGolgotha Ngize ngiye laphaya.
Ngomhlatshelo lo ngithethelelwe nami.

2
Ngiyathanda ukumdumis' uMfeli wam', Owayehlatshelw' izono zami;
Ngingekhohlwe nempela lolosuku Iwam', Nxa ngimbon' ethwel' ukona kwami.
Esethwele lonk' icala laphaya Endawen' ethiwe iGolgotha,
Bekumnyama kuthi bhuqe emhlaben', Mhla efayo esiphambanweni.

3
Nxa sidlul' isikhathi sami khona la, Nxa ngimbon' uJesu le, phezulu,
Kanye nas' isixuku esimhlophe qhwa, Nobukhosi bonke obukhulu.
Ngomdumisa, ngilihlabelel' igam': "Wangifela, Wangifela nami.
Wangithanda, wazidela ngenxa yam'. Ezulwini, nant' ihubo lami."

title: Hlengiwe
lyrics:
1
Hlengiwe - limnandi lelizwi, Hlengiwe ngegazi leMvana,
Hlengiwe ngomusa nothando; Ngenziwe sengaba umntwana.
Hlengiwe, hlengiwe, Hlengiwe ngegazi leMvana;
Hlengiwe, hlengiwe, Sengenziwe ngaba-ngumntwana.

2
Hlengiwe - o, yek' intokozo,
Ulimi lungephimisele
Lokh' engikuzway' enhliz'weni,
Kumnandi, kumnandi, igcwele.

3
Ngimkhumbul' uJesu uMhlengi,
Ngimkhumbul' amalanga onke;
Ngihuba ngihamb' endleleni
Ihubo lezinsuku zonke.

4
Ngiyazi ngombona masinya,
Ishilo kanjalo iNkosi,
Nxa eselilanda iBandla,
O, yeka, bukhul' ubukhosi!

5
Ngiyazi ikhona nem'qhele
Eyibabekele abayo;
Izowaqhelis' amaqhawe
Ngosuk' olukhul' oluzayo.

title: Masiye eGolgotha
lyrics:
1
Yizanini, bazalwane, Siyombuk' uMhlengi wethu.
Uphanyekwe eGolgotha, Ethwesiw' izono zethu.
Manibhek' iMvana yona, Nans' ethwele konk' okweth' ukona.

2
Nang' uJesu ebethelwe, Bathi: "Angezisindise,"
Kant' umphangi wamsindisa Wasemyis' eParadisi.

3
Usithanda nathi sonke Ngal' uthando olungaka.
Abavum' izono zabo, Boba-mhlophe kuthi qwaka.

4
Nang' ulenga uSomuhle, Ezithwal' izono zami;
Kodwa ngakho zisusiwe. Bonga, mphefum'lo wami.

5
Ungubani ongamlahla Okholwayo nguy' iMvana?
Keph' ubani ongammela Oyidela iNdondana?

6
Nant' ithuba len' elihle, Bantu bethu, sheshanini;
Nihlalel' omuny' uMhlengi Ozonisindisa yini?

title: Bayethe, Nkosi
lyrics:
1
O, bayethe, Nkos' engcwele
Owangithwalel' umqhele!
Lowomqhele wakuhlaba,
'Kuze ngibe nokwethaba.
O, bayethe, Nkosi yam'!

2
Wawungenasici, Nkosi,
Wawumuhle hlabahlosi,
Kepha wakudela konke
Ngaz' izono zethu zonke.
O, bayethe, Nkosi yam'!

3
Nant' uthando olukhulu
Olumhlophe, olwezulu;
Wazincoma ngokuphana
Ngobukhosi beNdonda,
O, bayethe, Nkosi yam'!

4
Lokhu kungimangalisa,
Yebo, kuyangithobisa,
Kuphelisa yonk' inkani.
Ngiyathandwa, ngingubani?
O, bayethe, Nkosi yam'!

title: Umthombo waseGolgotha
lyrics:
1
Emzini kaDavide
Kwavulw' umthombo khona;
Kuhlanzwe ukungcola,
Kuhlangulisw' ukona.
Kulowomthomb' omuhle
Sesimenyiwe sonke.
Akubandlululwa muntu,
Wabavulela bonke.
Umthombo waseGolgotha,
Umthombo waseGolgotha,
Ugobozela wena nam',
Umthombo waseGolgotha.

2
Noma usindw' umthwalo
Wesono namacala,
Sondela uzibike,
Wosuswa amabala,
Nhliziyo yoba-mhlophe,
Welashw' umzimba futhi,
Uze uvume nawe
Igama elokuthi:

3
Lomthombo wokuphila
Ungabokhohlwa wona,
Uzikhelele njalo,
Uyakwahlul' ukona.
Lamananzi woba kuwe
Umthomb' ophuphumayo,
Uze utshen' abanye:
"Uzakuphil' ozayo".

4
Sophuza kulomthombo
Sikhona emhlabeni,
Noma simuka lapha
Sidlule ekufeni
Sobona lowomfula
Wempilo ezulwini,
Sombong' uJesu njalo
Osiyis' ebomini.

title: Sesingabantwana
lyrics:
1
Jabulani, sesingabantwana
AbeNkosi, sesinofakazi.
Silubonga loluthando, Baba;
UMsindisi wethu sesimazi.

2
Bazalwane, masiye phambili,
Sizohlangabez' uMyeni wethu;
Siyoholw' uMoya oyiNgcwele,
Sizonqoba ngay' iNkosi yethu.

3
Nguy' uKristu owanqob' ukufa,
Nay' umninikufa wamahlula.
Wavuk' ethuneni, Haleluya!
Imivalo yonke wayaphula.

4
Nant' ithemba labo abendulo,
Balibheka, selaphum' obala
Njengelanga lon' eliphezulu;
Ngob' uJes' ulibo lokuqala.

5
'Jesu Krist'u ulithemba lethu,
Nokuthula uyasipha khona;
Nefa lethu ligcinw' ezulwini,
Lingethintwe amasela lona.

title: Umvikela wethu
lyrics:
1
NginoMsindisi onamandl' impela,
Uzahlulil' izitha zethu nya;
Uyasabeka nxa ezivukela,
Ebavikel' abantu bakhe la.
UyİNkosi yamakhosi,
UyİNkosi enamandla.

2
Ebanqobile bonk' omoy' ababi,
Wavuka ethuneni kahle ephila.
Abalindayo babethuka kabi,
Keph' abafundi baduduzwa-ke.

3
NginoMsindisi owalingwa naye
Njengawe nami, kulomhlaba, he.
Njalo-ke sesithol' amandla ngaye
U'ba sinqobe nxa silingwa-ke.

4
Igazi lakhe langophela mina,
Ukuz' asuse zonk' izono zam',
Unaw' amandla futh' ukungigcina,
Nokuqinisa inhliziyo yam'.

title: Ukwenyuka kwakhe
lyrics:
1
Nxa uJesu eqedile konke
Athunyelwe ukukwenza khona,
Wathi: "Sengiphiw' amandla onke,
Lawamandla nginabela wona.
Sengiyaphindela kuy' uBaba;
Ngizomthum' uMoya oyiNgcwele,
Wonisiza lapha kulomhlaba,
Hambanini ningifakazele."

2
Wabavalelisa ngokunjalo,
Eyaleza ngabafundi bakhe,
Wasinika nathi lowomyalo
'Kuhambisa yon' indaba yakhe.
Khon' uJesu waya ezulwini,
Ekhushulwa besambhekisisa,
Wasenyamalala emafwini,
Zeluliw' izandl', ebabusisa.

3
Abafundi belibala bona,
Besagqolozela ngaphezulu,
Naz' izingelosi zimi khona;
Zalubik' udaba olukhulu,
Zathi: "Njengalokhu nimbonile
Enyukela manje ezulwini,
Uzobuy' aland' abambhekile,'
Bazobusa naye ebomini.

4
Nathi masifane nabo laba
Abakholwa lesosithembiso.
Masimkhon' uJesu ngokwethaba,
Sibazis' abanye usindiso.
Simamkel' uMoya oyiNgcwele,
Sibenaw' amandl' okufakaza,
Ngakho masisuke simhambele,
Singahlali nje ngokungabaza.

title: Usehlisele uMoya
lyrics:
1
Usehlisele, Nkos' uMoya wakho,
Njengoba wenza le ngePhentekost',
Usithumel' imvuselelo yakho,
Sivuse lapho sesilele nje.

2
Usehlisele, Nkos', uMoya wakho,
Siphel' amandla, sesihlekwa nje,
Mawusizwise won' amandla akho,
Igama lakho lidunyiswe, he.

3
Usehlisel' umlilo wakho, Nkosi,
Ibandla lakho lisivivi nje.
Usikhanyis' u'ba sibon' ingozi
Yokub' uthando selucima-ke.

4
Usehlisele, Nkosi, uMoya wakho,
Sifuz' ibandla lasekuqalen'.
'Ziguli ziphilisw' amandla akho,
Kushunyayelwe ngesibindi du.

5
Livuse lona, Nkos', ibandla lakho,
Lihlwathizisw' inkazimulo la.
Sengathi livuthisw' uthando Iwakho,
Ukub' ibongw' iNkosi njalo, ha.

title: UMoya oNgcwele
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, siyacela, Moya oyiNgcwele,
Siyakuhlalela, Moya oyiNgcwele,
Vus' abadangele, nab' abalibele,
Usivuselele, Moya oyiNgcwele!

2
Hlola inhliziyo, Moya oyiNgcwele,
Uyinyang' eyiyo, Moya oyiNgcwele.
Siph' amany' amandla, uqinis' izandla,
Vuselel' ibandla, Moya oyiNgcwele!

3
Mawusiphilise, Moya oyiNgcwele,
Usizamazise, Moya oyiNgcwele.
Lamathamb' afile, futhi sewomile,
Wenz' ukub' aphile, Moya oyiNgcwele!

4
Abahlakazeke, Moya oyiNgcwele,
Benzew baqoqeke, Moya oyiNgcwele.
Mlilo wokuthanda, Oqed' ukubanda,
O, sengath' unganda, Moya oyiNgcwele!

title: Thela uMoya
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, bhek' ibandla lakho,
Uyabona selomile;
Limathise ngom'sa wakho;
Konk' okwethu kuphelile.
Thel' uMoya oyiNgcwele
Phezu kwabantwana bakho.
Vus' owakho umsebenzi,
Libatshazw' igama lakho.

2
Usizwise lawamandla
Abafundi bathenjiswa,
Silifuze lelobandla
Elaqala, labusiswa.

3
Siyavum' izono zethu,
Asikukhonzanga kahle;
Ngakho emoyeni wethu,
Nant' usizi luthi phahle.

4
USathane simnikile
Amathuba enhliz'weni;
Keph' uMoya simcimile,
Sekumnyam' emphefum'Iweni.

5
Washo: "Celanini, njalo
Nizophiw' uMoy' oNgcwele."
Sesibhek' eyakh' ingalo,
Yebo, sesikuhlalele.

6
Haleluya, siyakholwa,
Ubekil' indlebe yakho;
Lesosipho siyatholwa
Ngokwethemb' igama lakho.

title: Thuma umlilo oNgcwele
lyrics:
1
Siyakunxusa, Nkosi yethu,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Selupholil' uthando Iwethu,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Sibhek' iPhentekost', impela,
Nxa lowomlilo usehlela.
Nguwena, Nkosi, wosizwela,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!

2
O, Thixo kaEliya, sizwe,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Izinhliziyo mazivuswe,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Siyazibeka elathini,
Sibhek' umlilo ezulwini,
Sihlanjululwe ebubini,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!

3
Uthinte izindebe zethu
Ngal' ilahle lomlilo oNgcwele.
Ihlanjululw' im'lomo yethu,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Sibe-yizigijimi zakho
Zokuhambis' indaba yakho
Siholwe njalo ngezwi lakho,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!

4
Ushilo, nezwi lingephuthe;
"Ngizophonsa umlil' emhlabeni,
Sengathi lowomlil' uvuthe!"
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!
Sivuselelwe emoyeni,
Sipheleliswe othandweni,
Luvuthe njalo ebandleni,
Thum' umlilo, umlilo oNgcwele!

title: Uyamazi uMoya
lyrics:
1
Uyamaz' uMoy' oNgcwele
OnguMoya weqiniso?
Ozambul' izono zethu
Zem'sebenzi nezifiso?
Umamkel' uMoy' oNgcwele,
Ukugcwalisile na?
Khona uyophiw' amandla
Okunqob' izono la.

2
Uyamaz' uMoy' oNgcwele
Ohlanzayo inhliziyo
Ngokukhomba kuy' uJesu
Oyinhlawulel' eyiyo?
Umakel' uMoy' oNgcwele,
Ukugcwalisile na?
Yena wokungcwelisisa,
Uz' umfuz' uJesu la.

3
Uyamaz' uMoy' oNgcwele,
Ongumthomb' ophuphumayo?
Imifula, wash' uJesu,
Iyophuma komthembayo.
Umakel' uMoy' oNgcwele,
Ukugcwalisile na?
Unguyen' onik' amandla
Okumkhonz' uJesu la.

title: Iphentekoste
lyrics:
1
Kwath' iPhentekost' selifikile,
Abafundi babesendawonye;
Sekuyizinsuku becelile,
Beqinisa bonke ngenhliz'yonye.
Wehl' uMoya, njeng' uJes' eshilo
Wagcwalisa yona indlu yonke;
Nezilimi ezinjengomlilo,
Zabehlela 'bafundi bonke.

2
Sebegal' ukukhuluma ngazo,
Izilimi lez' ezisha bona,
Nesixuku sabuthana naso,
Samangala, sakhuluma sona,
Sahlekisa, sathi: "Badakiwe."
Ngoba bengaqondi leyondaba,
Kanti laba babebusisiwe,
Bemdumis' uJesu ngokwethaba.

3
Ungubani ongaqond' inhlanhla
Efikiswa ngay' uMoy' oNgcwele
Ombhathis' umuntu lawamandla
Okumel' uJesu amhambele,
Alwe noSathane, amahluele,
Ehlomil' amandla nezikhali;
Emdumis' uJesu engathuli,
Esebenza ngokungadangali?

4
Bandla likaJesu emhlabeni,
Asidingi yini ukunxusa,
Siqinise ekukhulekeni,
Kuye onamandl' okusivusa?
Wathi: Uyothel' uMoy' oNgcwele
Phezu kwabo abakhulekayo
Ngenhliziyo yonke ephelele,
Bengaceli njengongabazayo.

title: Vuthisa, Jesu umlilo
lyrics:
1
Vuthisa, Jes' umlilo wakho,
Wez' ukuphonsa emhlabeni,
Usithelel' uthando Iwakho,
Sivuthe njalo emoyeni.

2
Ikhona kumbe inhlansana
Efihlwe khona emlotheni;
Vuthela, Nkosi, lomlilwana,
Uvuthe njalo enhlizweni.

3
Uwenze lowomlilo wande,
Afudumal' osepholile;
Nezitha zethu sizithande
Ngothando esilutholile.

4
Usheshe uze kithi, Nkosi,
Siyaluding' uthando Iwakho.
Sophule, Jesu, kulengozi,
Phuthuma ngobubele bakho.

5
Sibe-namandl' okuhambisa
Indaba yakho emhlabeni.
Sengathi ungabasindisa
Abantu abasezonweni.

6
Nangomhla siyoshiy' umhlaba,
Lomlil' uvuthe elathini;
Singabi-nakho ukwesaba,
Mhla sizobizwa eNkosini.

title: Ngiqhutshwa nguMoya
lyrics:
1
Ngiqhutsh' nguMoya namhla
Ongaphakathi kwam'.
Ngiqhutshw' ukuzihlola
Ngenxa yenkonzo yam',
Ngishesha ngikhuluma
Emthandazweni wam',
Ekukhonzeni kwam'.

2
Noma ngihub' igama,
Kungath' umkhuba nje,
Ngijabulis' inyama
Ngomsind' oyize nje.
Ngisize nxa ngihuba,
Wen' oMkhumbuzi wam',
Ngikond' amazwi njalo
Ekuhubeni kwam'.

3
Ngicel' ukuba ngizwe,
Nxa ngisemthandazwen',
Ukuth' uMoy' oNgcwele
Enxusa enhliz'wen';
Mangikhonjiswe nguye
'Kukhonz' iNkosi yam'.
Ngiqhutshwe, ngikhunjuzwe,
Ekukhonzweni kwam'.

title: Nkosi, ngiyabheka kuwe
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, ngiyabheka kuwe,
Ngikunik' impilo yam',
Mangiphathwe njalo nguwe,
Uyikhomb' indlela yam'.
Makuphele konk' okwami,
Ngikufune wena nje,
Hlala enhliz'weni yami
Ngize ngikubone le.
Yebo, Nkosi, ngize kuwe,
Ngidalule konk' okwam'.
Mangizwiswe nguwe, Jesu,
Zisuliw' izono zam'.

2
USathan' ungivukele,
Kuyaliwa emoyen'.
Ngenze, Nkosi, ngibe-ngcwele,
Kube-mhlophe enhliz'wen',
Hlanza izizindlo zami
Nokufisa konke-ke,
Kube-ngukufisa kwami
Ukumfuz' uJesu, he.

3
Uma, Nkosi ungibona,
Ngisazulazula la,
U'ba ngidukisw' ukona,
Nqanda umntanakho-ke,
Nom' unqanda ngenhlupheko,
Ngokubonga laphaya,
Laph' ukona kungasekho,
Yebo, ngokubonga, ha.

title: Ngihlambulule, Mhlengi wami
lyrics:
1
Ngihlambulule, Mhlengi wam',
Khanyisa ngaphakathi kwam',
Ngomlil', ehe, angali, qha,
Kuphela zif' izono nya,
Ngicwebe emoyeni wam',
Ubongwe empilweni yam'.

2
Ngiyeke ukucenta kwam',
Ulime enhliz'weni yam',
Siphula nezimpande-ke
Zezono zami zonke, he,
Uzisiphule, zithi nya.
Zingabe zisamila, qha.

3
Ngomhla ngisekuhlupheken',
Kungathi ngisesikolen',
Ngisheshe emqondweni wam'
Ngifunde izifundo zam'.
Ngithule nxa ngihlushwa la,
Ngingayibamb' induku, qha.

4
Wahlushwa nawe, Nkosi yam',
Ezakho zazidlul' ezam',
Waphathwa kabi emhlaben'
Wavum', ehe, nasekufen'.
Ungenze ngithobeke nya,
Ngingaziphindiseli, gha.

title: Kanye nawe, Nkosi yami
lyrics:
1
Namhla ngiyaqhutshw' umoya,
'Kuthandaza, Nkosi yam'.
Ngiyacela, mangihambe
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam'.
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam',
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam',
Mangihamb' imihla yonke
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam'.

2
Angifun' eyam' indlela.
Mayiphel' intando yam',
Mangihambe mina, kodwa,
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam'.

3
Angifisi yon' imfuyo,
Ize kimi, Nkosi yam',
Ngicebile, he, kakhulu,
Nxa ukimi, Nkosi yam'.

4
Nom' indlela inohlupho,
Noma inde, Nkosi yam',
Noma iya eGolgotha,
Ngiye nawe, Nkosi yam'.

5
Lilungil' ijokwe lakho,
Awuhluph' umthwalo wam'.
Ngiyabonga ngisahamba
Kanye nawe, Nkosi yam'.

title: Ukuthula enhliziyweni
lyrics:
1
Enhliziyweni yami,
Thulisa, Jesu la,
UMoy' ogubhuzayo,
Kuthule kuthi nya.
Lapho sibhodl' isitha,
Kushon' umoya wam',
Ungikhumbule, Nkosi,
Ubamb' izandla zam'.

2
Mangisithezwe, Jesu,
Izandla zakho he,
Umoya wam' ujike,
Ubheke kuwe nje.
Ikhona ngokunqoba okubi
Konke nya,
Naz' izilingo zonke
Ezingihaqa la.

3
Masinya ngobakhona noJesu,
'Nkosi yam',
Ngizothi, kunganele,
Ngimbon' uNyemi wam'
Nenkazimulo yakhe
Nobuhle buthi pha,
Ngizoba ngikhohliwe
Izinhlupheko la.

title: Ngihlanze emoyeni
lyrics:
1
Ngingenwe emoyeni wam
Ilizwi lakho, Nkosi yam'.
Sengilambele wena nje,
Ungen' ubuse kimi-ke.
Ngihlanze emoyeni wam',
Mangibethelw' uqobo Iwam'.
Senginikele konk' okwam'
Kuwe, kuwe, kuwe.

2
'Mabala onke, Nkosi yam',
Awungcolis' umoya wam',
Ngihlanze kuwo namhlanje,
Ungenze ngikufuze, he.

3
Akukh' okuhle kimi, qha.
Wongenza ngibe-ngcwele, pha.
Ngiyakwethemba wena nje,
Sengiyancika kuwe-ke.

4
Ngingabi ngizighenya la.
Angithi, sengifile nya.
Inkambo yam' ikhombe-ke
Kuyen' owangifela, he.

5
Ngingawukhohlwa umhla lo,
Nxa satholana nawe?
Wo: Ungiqinise, Jesu wam',
Kube nguwen' impilo yam'.

title: Umuzuzu noJesu
lyrics:
1
Umzuzu nay' uJesu
Uyaguqula njalo
Usizi nenkathazo,
Uyaluxosh' uvalo.
Ngingenwa ukwethaba
Noma ngimbheka-ke,
Ubuhle balomhlaba,
Ngishay' indiva nje.

2
Umzuzu nay' uJesu
Khangel' uthand' analo,
Ngilethe njalo kuye
Usizi nemithwalo.
Noma ngidinw' indlela
Aphel' amandla nya,
Kuyongisiz' impela
Umzuzu naye la.

3
Sengathi ngibe-nawo
'Mihleni yonke yami
Umzuzu nay' uJesu
Ekhuhambeni kwami.
'Kufisa kwami konke
Impela yikho-ke:
Kuze kube-phakade
Ngihlale naye le.

title: Yiba nomusa
lyrics:
1
Baba oNgcwele, yizwa umntanakho,
Laph' eziletha ebusweni bakho
Ngokulwethemba lon' uthando Iwakho.
Yiba nomusa!

2
Noma ngonile, ngingasafanele
U'ba ngiphathwe wena oyiNgcwele,
Kodwa ngothando lon' oluphelele,
Yiba nomusa!

3
Ngoba ngothando Iwakho wangifela.
Lapho nginguy' olahlekil' impela.
Ngaloluthando ngize ukucela:
Yiba nomusa!

4
Sengiyathand' u'ba ngikulandele,
Nesiphambano ngoba ngisithwele,
Yenza umoya wami ube-ngcwele,
Ngawo umusa.

5
Nasezulwini, lapho siyoyiswa,
Nxa amagama ethu ezobizwa
Khona ngokusho: 'Mpela ngangeniswa
Ngawo umusa'.

title: Ngiyeza nginje
lyrics:
1
Ngiyeza nginje, Nkosi yam',
Akukh' okuhle enginakho;
Ngikujabhele konk' okwam',
Sengiwethemba um'sa wakho.

2
Ngiyeza, nginje, Nkosi yam',
Ngiyimpumputhe, ngilusizi;
Ngiswela konke, Thixo wam',
Ngithemba kuye uMsindisi.

3
Ngiyeza, nginje, Nkosi yam',
Ngihlanze egazini lakho.
Ngibika kuw' izono zam',
Ungiyekele ngom'sa wakho.

4
Ngiyeza, nginje, Nkosi yam',
Ngidonswa yil' uthando Iwakho,
Sengingowakho, Jesu wam',
Okwami konke kungokwakho.

title: Musa ukungidlula
lyrics:
1
Mus' ukungidlula, Jesu, Nkosi yokuthula!
Nxa ubabusis' abanye,
Mus' ukungidlula.
Jesu Kristu, Nkosi yokuthula,
Nxa ubabusis' abanye,
Mus' ukungidlula.

2
Phambi kwakho onomusa,
Nkosi, ngisondele;
Ngiyavum' izono zami,
Ungithethelele.

3
Ngiyacela ngom'sa wakho,
Mawungiphilise;
Enhliz'weni ungelaphe,
Mawungisindise.

4
Wen' ungukusiza kwami,
Angikwaz' okunye.
Emhlabeni naphezulu,
Anginay, omunye.

title: Isikhathi somkhuleko
lyrics:
1
'Sikhathi somkhuleko, 'Ligugu lamakholwa,
Kulapho, bazalwane, Amandla ayatholwa.
Nxa sisemthandazweni, Sivul' izinhliziyo,
Sibike kuy' İNkosi, Silungiselwe yiyo.

2
'Sikhathi somkhuleko, Masingakhohlwa sona;
Sizodangal' impela, Singekunqob' ukona,
Asinamandla neze, 'Sibindi singebekho,
Singasigcini kahle 'Sikhathi somkhuleko.

3
'Sikhathi somkhuleko, Siyakunjuzwa ngaso
NguMoya oyiNgcwele, Ongumholeli waso.
Usifundisa futhi Ukukhuleka njalo,
Sibike konke, konke, Singabi-namithwalo.

4
'Sikhathi somkhuleko Abanye abanaso
Ngakho bahamba kabi, Basindwa inkathazo.
Masingabi 'ziwula, Siqedwa inhlupheko,
Ngokuba siyakhohlwa Sikhathi somkhuleko.

title: Nginokhona
lyrics:
1
Sengibona nginokona.
Ungisize, Nkosi yam',
Ngiyanxusa onomusa,
Thethelel' izono zam'.
Ngihambisa othandwen',
Ngihlalise emusen'.

2
'Kuphelele. Ngimangele,
Ngoba wangifela nam'.
Wawuhlushwa, wawuqhutshwa
Ekufeni ngenxa yam'.
Wangihawukela nam',
Walisus' icala lam'.

3
Yimi Baba engethaba,
Nxa ngikuwe, Mhlengi wam',
Ngijabula ngokuthula,
Ngizikhohlwa, ungowam',
Ngihlanziwe egazin'
Ngifihliwe eNkosin'.

4
Ezulwini ngizothini
Nxa ngimbon' uMhlengi wam'?
Ngomdumisa. Ngiyofisa
Ukumnik' umqhele wam'.
Owangisindisa nam'.

title: Kuyeza ukuhlwa
lyrics:
1
Kuyez' ukuhlwa, hlala nami,
Othandekayo ngikubheke,
Uma ukimi, Nkosi yami,
Ngingaswelani, unganele.

2
Ekuhambeni kwami, Nkosi,
Ziyangihaqa izilingo.
Noma kukuhle, kungengozi,
Yiza-ke ungigcine, Jesu.

3
Nokuba namhla ngaphosisa,
Ngidabukis' uMoya wakho,
Sengiyacela, Nkosi, siza.
Ngihlanze ngal' igazi lakho.

4
Uma ngilele, yiba nami,
Noma ngivuka, ungiphathe.
Nom' ebusuku nom' emini
Ngihlale nawe, ube-nami.

title: Khanyisa, Nkosi
lyrics:
1
Baba, ngicela sekuyahlwa,
Khanyisa, Nkos'.
Kumnyama lapha, ngiyesaba,
Ngihole, Nkos'.
Wena unguye uMalusi wam'
Ngize ngifike le ekhaya lam'.

2
Kuqala ngangingesho kuwe-ke,
Khanyisa Nkos'.
Ngathand' okwami, kodwa namhlanje.
Ngihole, Nkos'.
Inkazimulo yonke emhlaben'
lyedukis', iyisa ekufen'.

3
Sengiwaswel' amandla akho,
Ngenzele, Nkos'.
Nginobuthaka, ungisize,
Ngivuse, Nkos'.
Mawube nami njalo khona la,
Ngize ngifik' ekhaya laphaya.

4
Nxa sekusile ngothokoza
Ekhaya le.
Bonk' ubumnyama buphelile nya,
Kukhanya nge.
Ngizoba ngiqedil' uhambo Iwam'
Nxa ngifikile kuwe, Nkosi yam'.

title: Ngingathola umusa na?
lyrics:
1
Ngingathol' umusa na,
Mina, angisasho, qha!
'Nkos' inganginaka na,
Ngisekhona ngani na?

2
Kade ngameyisa nje,
Ngath' uJesu ulize.
Wangincenga, ngala nje,
Noma engithanda-ke.

3
Ngisathandelwani na,
Mina, monikazi la
Ofanel' ukufa nya.
Ngingazuz' umusa na?

4
Senginxusa, Mfeli wam',
Bheka ukushona kwam',
Ungihawukele la.
Ngingathol' umusa na?

5
Wafa esiphambanwen'
Ngobuhlungu enhliz'weni;
Wangidabukela wo.
Ungahlul' umusa lo?

6
Kuphelil' ukwala kwam'
'Suthobil' umoya wam'.
Akumangaliso na,
Kangilahl' uJesu, qha!

title: Nkosi ake ukhulume
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, ake ukhulume,
Sengibek' indlebe yam'.
Bheka' nans' inceku yakho,
'Suthobil' umoya wam'.
Sengiyezwa, Nkosi yam'
Yiso isicelo sam'.

2
Nkosi, ake ukhulume,
Bona ukudinga kwam',
Mangilizwe izwi lakho
Liza enhliz'weni yam'.
Ngithulile, Nkosi yam',
Khomba ukuswela kwam'.

3
Nkosi, ake ukhulume,
Angifun' indlela yam'.
'Ntando yakho mayenziwe
Njalo empilweni yam',
Ngikhumbuze, Nkosi yam',
Hlala enhliz'weni yam'.

title: Ngethemba igazi
lyrics:
1
Thatha, Nkosi, inhliziyo,
Uyihlanzisise kahle;
Ingcolile, idukile,
Naz' izono zithi phahle.
Sengethemb' igaz lakho
Elaphalazelwa thina
Esiphambanweni sakho,
Lingihlanzisisa mina.

2
Onk' amanzi aselwandle,
Naz' ingazi zonk' ezinye,
Zingegez' izono zami,
Ngisho noma siba sinye.

3
Konke ukuzama kwami,
Ukushiya nokuyeka,
Kanye nem'sebenzi yami,
Konke lokho kohluleka.

4
Zonk' izinyembezi zami,
Ukukhala nokucela
Kungezihlangul' izono;
Azivumi ukuphela.

title: Ungihlolisise
lyrics:
1
Noma kudinga u'ba ngithotshiswe,
Nkosi, ngicel' u'ba ngihlolisiswe,
Ngiyasondela ngivul' inhliziyo;
Ngingowakho, Nkos'. Ngingowakho, Nkos'.

2
Kumb' inhliziyo ibanjw' okomhlaba,
Noma yoniwe eziny' izindaba,
Ngiyizanika ngila' phambi kwakho,
Ngingowakho, Nkos'. Ngingowakho, Nkos'.

3
Nom' isekhon' inkanuko yezono,
Veza amandla nowakho umkhono,
Phatha izembe, unqum' usiphule;
Ngingowakho, Nkos'. Ngingowakho, Nkos'.

4
Ngizithobisa, ngiguq' othulini,
Ngibhek' umlilo ovel' ezulwini.
Uyakushis' umnikel' elathini;
Ngingowakho, Nkos'. Ngingowakho, Nkos'.

5
Uma nginaw' uSomusa uqobo,
Angikhaleli ezinye' izihlobo;
Noma ngidelwa, ngihlekwa, kunani,
Ngingowakho, Nkos'.

title: Woza kweyami indlu
lyrics:
1
Woza kweyami inhliziy' eyize,
Konke okwami mawukulungise,
Thath' okukimi ukusebenzise,
O, Nkosi yami!

2
Othandekayo, mawungihambele,
Nans' inhliziyo, sengikuvulele.
Ngingodingayo, ungigcwalisele,
O, Nkosi yami!

3
Mhla ngithokoza, Nkosi ubekhona,
Nxa ngibongoza ngibanjiw' ukona,
Wongiduduza, ngom'sa wongigona,
O, Nkosi yami!

4
Mhla uzofika wehle emafwini,
Ngiyokwenyuka ngiy' ebukhosini,
Ngizokubuka khona ezulwini,
O, Nkosi yami!

title: Thixo sibusise
lyrics:
1
Thixo, Somandla, wena nasendulo
Wabangobisa abathemba kuwe,
Mawusenzele nathi inkululo,
Siyakunxusa, masihlengwe nguwe.
Thixo, sicel' u'ba usibusise,
Bus' enhliz'weni zeth' usingobise.

2
Siyasondela kuwe, Nkosi yethu,
Ngokudumisa lon' igama lakho.
Wen' ofanele lonk' uthando Iwethu;
Kade usithandile ngom'sa wakho
Thixo, sicel' u'ba usithandise,
Thela uMoya mawusivuthise.

3
Sizithulela u'ba ukhulume,
Ilizwi lakho livez' injabulo,
Nkosi, khuluma wen' ukuba kume,
Namhla njengesikhathi sasendulo.
Nkosi, khuluma enhliz'weni zethu,
Xosh' ubumnyama emqondweni wethu.

4
Siyalibala ebusweni bakho,
Usikhanyise usihlambulule.
Mawubonis' amandl' omkhono wakho,
Nqum' izibopho zonk' usikhulule.
Nkosi, sicela, usilungisele,
Silifanel' izulu, sibe-ngcwele.

title: Uyezwa, Nkosi
lyrics:
1
Uyezwa, Nkosi, lapho sibubula.
Usus' usiz' uvez' ukujabula;
UMos', mhla ekhala kuwe-ke,
Wamuzwa, wamvulel' ulwandle, he.

2
Uyezw' ukwenze lokhu bakucela,
Nxa lukhulil' usizi usondela;
Uphuthumel' osengozini la,
Awumkhohlis' othemba kuwe, qha.

3
Ushilo: "Cela kimi osizini."
Uthembekile, noma sekuthini;
Awungishiyi njengabanye, qha,
Mhla ngimukelwe konk' okunye la.

4
Kukuhle, Jesu, uma sithandana,
Nginal' ithemba nxa useduzane;
Kuwena ngingabeka konke, nya,
Ngilungiselwa kahle kuthi pha.

5
Ngakho-ke sengithand' ukukubonga,
Nezithembiso zakho ngozikhonga,
Ngokudumisa njalo khona le,
Nxa ngimukile kulomhlaba, he.

title: Ngilapha, Mfeli wami
lyrics:
1
Sengilapha, Mfeli wami,
Ngize kuwe, ngijabhile.
Siza, Jesu, Nkosi yami,
Ngiyasindwa, sengifile!
Jesu, Nkosi yami,
Ngiyacela kuwe,
Ungethul' umthwalo wami,
UMsindisi wami nguwe.

2
Sengilapha phambi kwakho,
Naz' izono ngizithwele;
Njengezithembiso zakho
Wena, ungithethelele.

3
Sengilapha, Jesu wami,
Ngiyabuka amanxeba;
Walinyazwa ngenxa yami
Naw' ameva, akudweba.

4
Sengilapha, Msizi wami,
Unomusa nobubele,
Woyekel' ukona kwami;
Ngoba wena ungifele.

title: Thatha ukuphila kwami
lyrics:
1
Thatha ukuphila kwami,
Kungokwakho, Nkosi yami;
Thata isikhathi sami,
Ngingayenz' intando yami.

2
Thatha naz' izandla zami,
Zingasebenzel' okwami;
Thatha izinyawo zami.
Zingahamb' indlela yami.

3
Thatha nank' umlomo wami
Udumis' İNkosi yami;
Thatha izindebe zami,
Zingakhulumel' okwami.

4
Thatha nans' imali yami,
Busa isikhwama sami,
Thatha ukuqonda kwami,
Kungokwakho, Mdali wami.

5
Thatha nans' intando yami,
Ugondis' ukwenza kwami;
Thatha inhliziyo yami,
Buso kuyo, Mbusi wami.

6
Thatha nant' uthando Iwami,
Lungcwelise, Myeni wami.
Ungithath' uqobo Iwami;
Ngingowakho, ungowami.

title: Yiba nami
lyrics:
1
Jesu, ulithemba lami,
Nentokozo nokuthula;
Nguw' ongukulunga kwami
Okuvez' ukujabula.
Yiba nami, ngibe nawe,
Ngiyazigabisa ngawe.

2
Im'cabango yonke yami.
Mawuyiqondise njalo;
Gcina nant' ulimi Iwami,
Ngikhulum' okuhle ngalo.

3
Nezinyawo mazihambe
Njalo endleleni yakho.
Naz' izandla mazibambe,
Zenze umsebenzi wakho.

4
Ngoba angisiy' owami,
Ngithengiw' inteng' enkulu;
Ngakho inhliziyo yami
Mayibusw' nguNkulunkulu.

title: Yifune İNkosi
lyrics:
1
Yifune İNkosi ekusithekeni,
Uhlolwe nguJesu, usemthandazweni.
Ulalele kahle 'kunyenyeza kwakhe,
Ezintweni zonke buz' intando yakhe.

2
Ubamb' isikhathi, ngoba siyadlula,
Uhlale noJesu la kunokuthula,
Ubike kuyena konke ukuswela,
Nangomcebo wakhe uyakwenezela.

3
Libala noJesu; ngoba nxa umbuka,
Yonk' im'hambo yakho iyakuguquka,
Ukuba ilunge, ifane neyakhe,
Nabantu babone uhambis' okwakhe.

4
Hamba-ke noJesu, yen' uyakuhola;
Nalokhokuhola ungabokusola.
Umlandel' eduze ezinyathelweni,
Umdumise njalo nasenhluphekweni.

5
Ube-nokuthula ngasempefum'Iweni,
Yonk' imicabango efik' enhliz'weni,
Ibuswe nguMoya okaNkulunkulu,
Uzolungiselwa inkonzo phezulu.

title: Ngikukhonze
lyrics:
1
Nkosi ngiyathokozela
Ukuzinikela kuwe,
Ngikukhonze, Mfeli wami,
Ngoba ngihlengiwe nguwe;
Kodwa ngiyabona kambe
Awuding' inkonzo yami,
Nokho mawungivumele
Ngikukhonze, Nkosi, nami.

2
Abaningi bayazula
Bedukile endleleni,
Ungithume, ngibafune,
Babuyel' esibayeni.
Nabaningi banosizi,
Nkosi, unginik' umuthi,
Ngibelaphe enhliz'weni,
Khona bojabula futhi.

3
Ungisize ngizidele,
Ngizinikelel' abanye,
Njengokuba wena, Jesu,
Wawuzinikela kanye.
Yeka, injabul' enkulu
Ukuyilandel' iMvana,
Ngakho ungisize, Nkosi,
Ngilandele eduzana.

4
INkosi, ungihole kahle,
Ngize kuwe embusweni;
Lapho ngiyakuphumula,
Ngiyoncik' esifubeni,
Ngoba lapha emhlabeni,
Ngike ngezw' ukuphumula,
Okukhona kuwe Jesu,
OyİNkosi yokuthula.

title: Ngibheka kuwe
lyrics:
1
Ngiphakamis' amehlo ami kuwe,
O, Thixo, wena onguBaba wam';
Ushil' ukuthi ngiyozwelwa nguwe;
Ngibeke kuwe imithwalo yam'.

2
Nguwena owalenz' izulu lonke,
Nezinto zonke ezisemhlaben'.
Ukwazi ukuswela kwami konke,
Ukugcwalisa, Baba, emusen'.

3
Ngiphiwa nguwe konk' engikuswela,
Ngomusa ungigcina osizin'.
Anduba uyakuz' ukungam'kela,
Ngiyakubusa nawe ebomin'.

4
Njalo-ke sekukuhle konke kimi,
NgingoweNkosi, nayo ingeyam'.
Ngakho-ke, alusekh' uvalo kimi,
Ukhathalela ukudinga kwam'.

title: Nkosi, ubhek' isiphepho
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, ubhek' isiphepho
Namaza agubuzayo,
Nezulu seliguqubele,
Amukho osisizayo.
Nkosi, senga' ungavuka,
Usisindise thina;
Ngokuba nguwen' uSomandla
Onakho okusigcina.
Nang' olalelwa amaza la,
Thula nya! Thula nya!
Noma ulwandl' olugubayo,
Nom' amademoni alingayo,
Kungesishonis' isikhebhe le,
EsinoSomandla phakathi-ke;
Uyalalelwa umoya la,
Thula nya! Thula nya!
Uyalalelwa umoya la,
Thul' uthi nya!

2
Manje osizini Iwami
Ngikhala nje kuwe, Nkosi,
Uvuk', uphuthum', ungisize,
Ngokuba ngesab' ingozi.
Naz' izilingo ezimbi
Zihluph' umoya wami,
Ngiyafa, ngiyafa, ngisize,
Ngihlenq' ebubini bami!

3
Sesithulil' isiphepho,
Lilihle-ke manj' izulu,
Ilanga libukw' emanzini,
Ikhon' intokoz' enkulu.
Ungangishiyi ngedwa,
Hlal' esikhebheni sami,
Ukuze ngifik' ezulwini,
Itheku lethemba lami.

title: Idwala lami
lyrics:
1
O, Nkosi, ulidwala lami!
Kuwena ngiyonamathela;
Usekel' umphefum'lo wami,
Angisenakuthuthumela.

2
Masengiqhuzuk' edwaleni,
Ngofana nembaza yolwandle,
Namaqobolondo ogwini,
Omile, alahlwa ngaphandle.

3
Amaza ayangikhukhula
'Ma sengihlukana nedwala;
Ngokwami ngingenakwahlula,
Masinya ngiyakudangala.

4
Anginakuphila ngokwami,
Ngifile, ngifanel' umlilo.
Ngiphelelwe ingagu yami,
Ngimunc' eNkosini impilo.

5
Ngibonga umusa nenhlanhla,
Ushilo: "Ozayo kimina
Ngomamkel', angiyikumlahla."
Haleluya, uyongigcina!

title: Jabulani Bazalwane
lyrics:
1
Jabulani, bazalwane,
ENkosini yethu la;
Sizobizwa masinyane
Ezulwini laphaya.
Nxa singena ekhaya
Ukubona İNkosi laphaya,
Sojabula sonke,
Sohlabelel' Haleluya!

2
Sogqokiswa ngalemini
Okumhloph' okuthi qhwa,
Nxa singena eNkosini
Ezulwini laphaya.

3
Abangcwele abavela
Ekuhluphekeni la,
'Zinyembezi zizosulwa
Ezulwini laphaya.

4
NoMsindisi sizombona,
Yen' owasifela la,
Naphakade sizombonga
Ezulwini laphaya.

5
Wena mngane, usuthini,
Uzohamba nathi na?
Sokubona ngalemini
Ezulwini laphaya?

title: Vumani bethu
lyrics:
1
Vumani, bethu, sohlabelela
NgeNkos' uJesu, owasifela.
Ngehubo lethu simvume, he,
Size simbone ngamehlo le.

2
Wahlawulela elam' icala,
Nezono zami wayezithwala.
Ngothando olusimanga, he,
Wayengithanda ngimubi nje.

3
Noma ngimbona nokufa kwakhe,
La engifela ngothando Iwakhe,
Kusekungathi ngiswele-ke
'Zilim' ezinkulungwane, he!

4
Nokub' ameva ngiwanyethela
Lapho ngihamba ngeyakh' indlela,
Angiwanaki, uJesu wam'
Uzopholis' amanxeba am'.

5
Sengiyaphila ngezithembiso
Engiziphiwe, ziyiqiniso.
Zingeze zingijabhise, qha,
Ziqine kunezintaba la.

6
Ezweni lapha ngiyahlupheka,
Nabasezweni bayangihleka,
Bawuzingela umoya wam',
Ngokub' uJes' uligugu lam'.

7
Ngiphiwe la ngokudinga kwami,
Nasezulwini ilifa lami,
Sengiyabonga, ngothini na,
Ngenhlanhl' engak' engiphiwe la?

title: Uthando Iwakho Iwangahlula
lyrics:
1
Ngothando Iwakho, Nkosi yami,
Ngihlulekile, Iwangahlula.
Sengizilahla phambi kwakho,
Ngenxa yokukuphika kwam'
Ngidabukile, Nkos'.

2
Igazi lakho, Nkosi yami,
Yilon' elingihlanzisisa.
Umthombo ovulelw' izono
'Zibomvu zibe mhlophe, qhwa.
Ngigeze kuwo, Nkos'.

3
Impilo yakho Nkosi yami,
lyona engiphila ngayo.
Umina wami usufile,
Kungukuphila kwakho-ke,
Esenginakho, Nkos'.

4
Ilizwi lakho, Nkosi yami,
Elingibonisil' indlela,
Liyisiban' ebumnyameni
Nalapho ngingaduka nje,
Longikhanyisa, Nkos'.

5
Umusa wakho, Nkosi yami,
Umkhulu, ngingathini mina?
Nempela, lokhu kungahlula,
'Kuchasisel' umusa lo,
Anginamazwi, Nkos'.

6
UMoya wakho, Nkosi yami,
Unami, uyangiduduza.
Ngicela nxa ngilingwa lapha
'Kuphika wena, Mhlengi wam';
Ungikhumbuze, Nkos'.

title: Bongani uJesu enimaziyo
lyrics:
1
Bong' uJes' enimaziyo,
Hub' igam' enilaziyo,
Ngemilomo nenhliziyo,
Makadunyiswe.

2
Yek' umusa low' omkhulu,
Wangazis' uNkulunkulu.
Ngathi yen' ongaphezulu,
Unolaka nje.

3
Kanti nguye osizayo,
Nguye-ke ongithandayo,
Njalo ngangikhonjiswayo,
Ngimpumputhe nje.

4
Namhla ngiyaphila ngaye,
Ezulwini ngoba-naye,
Yebo, ngizoba njengaye,
Yek' inhlanhla le.

5
Jesu, mangibe-ngowakho,
Ngenze ngokwentando yakho,
Malibongw' igama lakho,
Empilweni yam'

title: Ngineculo
lyrics:
1
Ngiyavum' umangaliso,
OkaKrist', uMfeli wam';
Wabushiya ubukhosi,
Wehla, wafa ngenxa yam'.
Ngineculo ngal' uthando
LukaKrist', uMfeli wami,
Ngimbabaz' owangihlenga.
Lalelan' iculo lam'.

2
Bheka, esiphambanweni
Wazithwal' izono zam'.
Ziyaphum' izinyembezi
Nxa ngivum' iculo lam'.

3
Ngangiduka nangempela,
Ngangingumhlupheki nje,
Weza wangihawukela,
Wangithol' ehlane le.

4
Izinhlupho zingafika,
Ungasind' umthwalo wam',
Nokho sengiphathw' isandla
SoMalus', İNkosi yam'.

5
Wongisiza, wongigcina
Kuze kube sekufen'.
Mangibe othembekayo,
Ngingamhluphi endlelen'

title: Izithembiso zeNkosi
lyrics:
1
Izithembiso zeNkosi yethu,
Ziqine zona kunezintaba.
Nxa ziwa izisekelo zethu,
Elayo izwi limi.
Izithembiso zeNkosi yethu,
Ziqine kunezintaba la.
Nokuba ziwa izinkanyezi
Zingew' izithembiso, qha.

2
Izithembiso, nxa ngihlangana
Nezinhlupheko, ngiphel' amandla,
Ishisa impi, ngizofumana
Impela zona zimi.

3
Izithembiso, nasekufeni
Ziyema zona, azijabhisi,
Kuzakukhanya, nasengcwabeni,
EzikaJesu zimi.

4
Izithembiso, ekuvukeni
'Ngcwabeni yami ngizofumana,
Zazinganela ekumukeni,
Nasezulwini zimi.

title: Ngingumhambi
lyrics:
1
Ngingumhambi emhlabeni,
Kodwa angesabi,
Ngiyalondolozw' uJesu,
Ngumalusi wami.
Ngal' uthando wangifela
Ukungisindisa.
Ngeqiniso nangoMoya
Uyangiqondisa.

2
Ngiyalizwa izwi lakhe,
Ngiyalazi lona.
Ngiyalilalela, ngiya
Laph' ethanda khona.
Emthonjeni wokuphila
Uyangiphuzisa,
Nangesinkwa sokuphila
Uyangiqinisa.

3
Ukwethaba nokuthula
Ngifumana kuye;
Naw' amandla okwahlula
Ngiyaphiwa nguye.
Noma sengihlatshw' ameva,
Ngiyehlelw' umnyama,
Umsindisi wongihola,
Angiyikwesaba.

4
Ngisahamba ngiyabheka
Kuwe, Jesu wami.
Wena onamandla onke,
Uyinqaba yami.
USathane uyafuna
Ukungibhubhisa;
Ngakho, Jesu, yiba nami,
Ukungisindisa.

5
Okomhlaba kuyadlula,
Nentokozo yawo.
Masinyane thina sonke
Siyomuka kuwo.
Kuhle uma sesaziwe
UMsindisi wethu;
U'ba phela singeniswe
Nguy' ekhaya lethu.

title: Yeka inhlanhla
lyrics:
1
Webathandwa, yek' inhlanhla
Yokukholwa nguy' uJesu,
Nokuphathw' ezakh' izandla,
Asiyise ekhaya ngale.
Kuzohlatshelelwa khona,
Basho Haleluya, Haleluya!
Njengomfula kohlokoma
Kudunyiswe iNkosi le.

2
Emhlaben' izinhlupheko
Zithulis' ihubo lethu
Kodwa lapho zingasekho,
Lophelela ihubo lethu.

3
Lapha njalo sihlukana,
Kuyavam' izinyembezi,
Kodwa lapho sohlangana,
'Zinyembezi zosulwa yiNkos'.

4
Mangabikho osalayo
Mhla 'bangcwele beyobizwa;
Nxa İNkosi ivalayo,
Angabikho ojabhayo, qha.

title: Wongigcina ngci
lyrics:
1
Mhla ngidinwa ngikhathele,
Ungigcine, Nkos'.
Mhla ithemba linciphile,
Ake ungigcine.
Wongigcina ngci,
Wongigcina ngci!
yeka ububele bakhe,
Wongigcina ngci!

2
Mhla ngihlushw' izinkathazo,
Ungigcine, Nkos'.
Mhla ngilingwa izilingo,
Ake ungigcine.

3
Nxa ngiphiwa okomhlaba,
Ungigcine, Nkos'.
Mhla ngilingwa 'kuzithemba,
Ake ungigcine.

4
Mhla ngilele ecansini,
Ungigcine, Nkos'.
Mhla ngishona ekufeni,
Ake ungigcine.

title: Themba eNkosini
lyrics:
1
Wena mngane, themba eNkosini,
Themba kuyo njengoAbraham'.
Nxa kumnyama noma sekuthini,
Wayebheka ezulwini-ke.
Yebo, mngane, themba eNkosini,
Ungesabi ubumnyama la.
Themba kuyo noma kungathini,
Awusoze wajabhiswa, qha.

2
Abangcwele abasemandulo
Babenqoba ngay' indlela le,
Yokubheka njalo le phezulu,
Noma babehlatsh' ameva la.

3
Noma ungaphucwa konk' onakho,
Kusengathi ulahliwe nya,
Yiy' iNkosi esebenza ngakho,
'Kuqondis' amehlo akho le.

4
Ngoba nxa ulahlekelw' impela
Kon okwakukuhle kuwe la,
Kuzohlum' okusha, kuzothela
Zon' ezihle izithelo-ke.

title: Bika kuJesu
lyrics:
1
Nxa usukhathele ekulweni,
Bika kuJesu, bika kuJesu,
Nom' udabukile enhliz'weni,
Bika konke kuJesu.
Bika kuJesu, bika kuJesu,
Yen' onamandla onke!
Kakh' onothando olungangolwakhe,
Bika konke kuJesu.

2
Mhla ukhala ngobuhlungu bakho,
Bika kuJesu, bika kuJesu,
Nom' udabukel' izono zakho,
Bika konke kuJesu.

3
Laph' amafu asithez' ilanga,
Bika kuJesu, bika kuJesu,
Noma sebekuqambel' amanga,
Bika konke kuJesu.

4
Nxa usab' ukufa nal' ithuna,
Bika kuJesu, bika kuJesu,
Nom' umzimba wakho usubuna
Bika konke kuJesu.

title: Umhlobo
lyrics:
1
Kakh' umhlob' onjengoJesu,
Osikhathalela njalo;
Yek' inhlanhla esinayo,
Singabeka kuy' im'thwalo!
Kodwa siyadinwa, kumbe
Zikhulil' izinkathazo,
Kanti singabeka konke
Kuy' uJesu ngomthandazo.

2
Mhla sihaqwa ukulingwa,
Nxa singenwa uluisizi,
Singaphel' amandla, kodwa,
Masibike kuMsindisi;
Kakh' umhlobo onjengaye,
Owalingwa ngakho konke,
Ngakho unamandla manje
'Kusisiza thina sonke.

3
Uma sesihlulekile,
Siding' u'ba senzenjani?
Nang' uJesu, kahluleki,
Nom' inqab' ingakanani,
Nxa 'zihlobo zisishiya,
Yena umi nathi njalo,
Uyasithwalela thina,
Izinsizi nemithwalo.

title: Abantwana abeNkosi
lyrics:
1
Abantwana abeNkosi,
Kabanzo izingozi;
Bahlez' okwenyon' endlini,
Nenkanyezi ezulwini.

2
OyİNkosi yaphezulu
Ubathanda, he kakhulu;
Ubafaka ekhwapheni,
Bangengene ekufeni.

3
'Kakh' umuntu onamandla
Okuchith' elakh' ibandla;
Yen' ungumfo weth' impela,
Usiphath' usivikela.

4
UnguBab' onobubele,
Uyabala nezinwele,
Usifunz' usigqokisa,
Yebo, usijabulisa.

5
Jabula-ke ngakho, bandla,
Uvikelwa onamandla.
Zonk' ezakho-ke izitha
Uzisusa ezichitha.

6
Noma ungashayw' uvalo
Yena unguYihlo njalo,
Into inye ayifisa
Yona: ukukusindisa.

title: Esandleni somusa
lyrics:
1
NgoMsindis' onami la empini,
Ngiyagcinwa noma kungathini.
Ungisith' esivunguvungwini
Esandleni somusa.
Esandleni somusa,
Esandleni somusa,
Ngiyagcinwa, noma kungathini,
Esandleni somusa.

2
Ungigona ngemikhono yakhe,
Ngiyathokozisw' amazwi akhe,
Ngiyalondwa ngobuqhawe bakhe
Esandleni somusa.

3
Yena akasoze angiyeke,
Ngingephucwe futhi kuye ngeke;
Ngoba ungiphethe ngesineke
Esandleni somusa.

title: Sihamba ngokukholwa
lyrics:
1
Siyahamba ngokukholwa
Endleleni ey' ekhaya,
Emanzini okuphum'la,
UMalusi wosiyisa.
Siyahamba ngokukholwa,
Siyalizwa izwi lakhe;
Uyasondla, usigcina,
UMalusi siyamazi.

2
Siyahamba ngokukholwa,
Simlandela uMalusi;
Nxa zidinwa izimvana,
Uzithwala, ezigona.

3
Siyahamba ngokukholwa,
Siyancika kuMalusi.
USomandla wosilonda,
Singethintwe oyimpisi.

4
Kunjalo-ke siyahamba
NoMsindisi ngokukholwa;
Songena-ke ekhaya le,
Nangamehlo siyombona.

title: Bala izibusiso zakho
lyrics:
1
Mhla ukhathazeka emhlabeni la,
Udiniwe, aphelil' amandla nya,
Bal' izibusiso, aziningi na?
Bong' iNkosi ngazo, ungasoli, qha!
Bal' izibusiso zakho-ke,
Uzibale-ke ngazinye, he!
Bala phela, aziningi na?
Bong' iNkosi ngazo, ungasoli, qha!

2
Uthwesiw' umthwalo osindayo na?
Siyasind' isiphambano sakho la?
Bal' izibusiso zakho, qina ngo;
Khona wobalul' umthwalo wakho, bo.

3
Nxa ubon' abanye benemfuyo he,
Bhek' imfuyo yakho ephezulu le.
Bal' izibusiso, yeka, zinhle hle!
Ifa ligcinelwe wen' ekhaya-ke.

4
Impi isashisa, qina uthi ngo,
Ungesabi, nang' uJes' unawe, bo!
Naz' izingelosi zokuphatha-ke,
Zokuyisa kahl' ekhaya lakho le.

title: Jesu, Mhlobo wami
lyrics:
1
Jesu, Mhlobo wami, Nenjabulo yami,
Dwala losindiso Iwami, Ngiyethemba kuwe.
Ungubomi bami, Nokwethemba kwami,
Mawubongwe nokubongwa Wena, Nkosi yami!

2
Ngangilahlekile, Ngabe ngedukile,
Ezonweni bengifile, Ngaphiliswa nguwe.

3
Mhla ngakhala kuwe, Ngasindiswa nguwe,
Yebo, ngalungiswa nguwe, Ngokomusa wakho.

4
Ukukhahlwa konke, Nezinhlupho zonke,
Nemithwalo yami yonke, Ngiyaletha kuwe.

5
Jesu, wongisiza Ukukudumisa.
Nxa ngifayo, wongiyisa Ezulwini lakho.

title: uJesu ulidwala
lyrics:
1
UJesu ulidwala lam', Umpheme wokuphephela.
Nguyena oyinqaba yam', Umpheme wokuphephela.
UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Ehlane la, ehlane la,
UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Umpheme wokuphephela.

2
Emini ulithunzi lam', Umpheme wokuphephela.
Empini usihlangu sam', Umpheme wokuphephela.

3
Esivunguvungwini la, Umpheme wokuphephela.
Ngihelele ngiyahuba, ha, Umpheme wokuphephela.

4
'Lidwala lami liqina, Umpheme wokuphephela.
Othembayo kajabhi, qha! Umpheme wokuphephela.

title: Siqonda ekhaya
lyrics:
1
Siqonda ekhaya, nithini na? Masingathiyeki ngalutho la! Nxa sikholwa lapha, sobona le, Sohlala noJesu, kukuhle hle. Yebo, bakithi, sombonga, he, Loduma izulu linkeneze, nke! UJes' ufanel' ubukhosi nje, Ehe, wodunyiswa phezulu le.

2
Bodade nabafo, kunjani na? Uma nikhathazwa, hubani la; Khon' im'thwalo le yobalula nje, Nobamba kalula indlela-ke.

3
Bhekani kuJes' onguMholi-ke, Nophiwa amandla nguyena, he. UJesu unathi ngoMoya la, Kepha-ke ngale sizombona, he.

title: Mbheke uJesu
lyrics:
1
Wena okhala ubuza uthi: Ngofik' imbal' ezulwini mina? Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Unaw' amandla okukugcina.

2
Ukhala futhi ngokukhohlisa Kwezono, nokudukiswa kwakho? Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Uyena-ke onguMeli wakho.

3
Ukhala ngaz' izihlobo futhi, Ngokuthi Ziyangishiya njena? Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Akakudeli nakanye yena.

4
Uyakhalela ukudla, uthi: Ngiyakudlani, ngiyophuzani? Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Uyakusiza noma kunjani.

5
La' uSathane ekusabisa Ngokufa nangobuhlungu bakho, Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Nguyena njal' onguMphathi wakho.

6
Noma kuyini othintwa yikho Ukuthokoza nokudabuka Umbhek' uJesu, umbhek' uJesu, Khona-ke awuyisakuduka.

title: Izithembiso zenkosi
lyrics:
1
Izithembiso zeNkosi Zimi phakade zona; Wakuqinisa ngegazi, Akuthembisa khona. Kodlula izulu nomhlaba, Zoncibilik' izintaba, Keph' akayikwesaba Omethembay' uJesu.

2
Yenza njengoAbrahama, Bheka ngasezulwini, Uzibal' izithembiso, Uqine eNkosini.

3
Themba nokuba kumnyama, Nxa ungasekh' unyezi; Ngoba ngaphezu kwamafu Zikhon' izinkanyezi.

4
Themba noma uzingelwa Ngenxa yenkolo yakho. Esithandweni somlilo Unaw' uThixo wakho.

5
Themba noma uyashiwa Ngabathandwayo. Ngoba Ngek' akushiye uJesu, Ngaye uyakunqoba.

6
Themba noma sekuthini, Uzonc' ushiy' umhlaba; Omthemb' uJesu elapha, Yen' akayikujabha.

title: Ngimfumene
description: This hymn expresses profound gratitude and joy for salvation through Jesus Christ's sacrifice, emphasizing redemption from sin and suffering, leading to a life of purpose and the hope of eternal life with God. The believer rejoices in the light and freedom found in Christ, striving to live actively for Him until they are reunited in eternity.
lyrics:
1
Ngimfumene uMsindisi' Osusil' izono zam'. Luphelil' olwam' usizi, Isikim' iNkosi yam'. Haleluya, Haleluya! Wazisus' izono zam', Ngihlengiw' igazi lakhe, Liphelile lonk' icala lam'.

2
'Cala lami lalikhulu, Bengishona ezonwen'; Sengifun' okwaphezulu, Ngikhishiwe odaken'.

3
Ukumkhonza sekumnandi, Ngijabula enhliz'wen'. Siza, Nkosi, ngingabandi, Ngikhuthale enkonzwen'.

4
Malibongw' igama lakhe, Sengiphila eNkosin'. Ngizombon' uqobo Iwakhe, Nxa ngifika ezulwin'.

title: Uyathanda na?
lyrics:
1
Uyathand' ukuthabatha 'Siphambano sakho la,
Nokuyilandel' iMvana, Lapho iya khona na?
Uyathand' ukuhlangana Naye uMsindisi la,
Nokuthwal' ihlazo lakhe Owakufelayo na?

2
Uyakheth' ukuzidela, Nokuphathwa kabi la,
Ngenxa yokukholwa kwakho Nangegama lakhe na?
Laph' abanye bekuyenga, Uyathand' ukuthi: qha,
Nokunqob' izitha zakho, Ngokuthanda zona na?

3
Uma usufunisisa, Ukumfuz' uJesu la,
Khona kuyakudingeka Ukulahla konke, nya.
Okungamagugu kuwe, Okuzithathile-ke
Isikhundla sikaJesu Enhliziyweni yakho, he.

4
Ngokubheka kuye njalo, Uyakuphenduka, he,
Won' umfanekiso wakhe, Kwande njalo njalo-ke.
Ukukhazimulakazi, Ube-yinkanyezi, ngqa,
Ebakhanyisela bona Abasemnyameni la.

title: Ingonyama kaJuda
lyrics:
1
NguJes' uMsindis', owalenga emthini,
Wavula indlela eqond' ezulwini;
Ngelakhe igazi esihlawulela,
Sesikhululiwe, singahlabelela;
INgonyama kaJadu yamnqob' uSathane;
Nxa simi ngakuyo sonqotshwa ngubani?

2
Mhla ngivum' izono kuMsindisi wami,
Wangithethelel' iziphambeko zami,
Wangihlanganisa nelakhe iBandla;
Kuyen' oyiNkhloko, sengithol' amandla.

3
Noma ngizungezw' izilingo zezono,
Ngimthemba uJesu nowakhe umkhono;
Noma ngihluleka, nguyen' ongimele,
Ngithol' ukunqoba ngoMoya oNgcwele.

4
Kothi sengimbona uJes' ebomini,
Ngiyomkhothamela, ngimbonge nanini;
Mhla selihlangene iBandla lezulu,
Lihube udumo lukaNkulunkulu.

title: Umholi omuhle
lyrics:
1
Nxa uJesu engihola,
Anginakho ukusola;
Ngob' amandla ngiwathola
KuMholeli wami-ke.
Laph' engiholela khona,
Laph' engiholela khona,
Laph' engiholela khona,
Ngomlandela njalo, he.

2
Nom' indlel' inobumnyama,
Ngiyethemb' elakh' igama;
Um'sa wakhe uyavama,
Unganele wona, he.

3
Noma ngingabon' indela,
Yena wongilungisela,
Lapho ngiyakunyathela;
Ngimlandela yena nje.

4
Ngakho sengibek' isandla
Esandleni 'kaSomandla;
Wongiyisa kul' iBandla
Elisezulwini le.

title: Senginengoma
lyrics:
1
Senginengoma ehle bo,
Selokhu ngakhululwa,
Ngaye onguMsindisi wam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa.
Lokhu sengikhululiwe,
Ngolibong' igama lakhe,
Lokhu sengikhululiwe,
Ngomdumisa uMsindisi wami.

2
Usenganel' uKristu wam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa,
Intando yakh' isingeyam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa.

3
NginoFakazi enhliz'weni yam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa,
Oxosh' ukwesaba kwam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa.

4
Anginakusho ukujaja kwam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa,
Kungaye onguMfeli wam',
Selokhu ngakhululwa.

5
Ikhaya sengilungiselwe le,
Selokhu ngakhululwa,
Ngizoya kuMsindisi wam'
Yilokhu ngikhulul'we.

title: Ikhwezi lokusa
lyrics:
1
Welikhwezi lakusasa,
Khanya laph' ebumnyameni,
Bakhanyis' abadukile,
Badonsel' ekukhanyeni.
Namakholwa akhanyiswe,
'Nkos' iyeza masinyane;
Soyibona emafwini,
Kuyokhonya kuthi bane.

2
Bon' abantu bokukhanya,
Bayophathw' isandla sayo,
Emanzini nasehlane,
Behambel' ikhaya layo.
Siyobhek' empumalanga
La ikhwezi lithi, bane
'Ziboniso zonke zithi,
'Nkos' iyeza masinyane!

3
Welikholwa, phuma kubo
Abomhlaba nakokwabo,
Ungahlanganyeli nabo
Em'khuben' emibi yabo.
Osathand' ukub' abizwe
Abomhlab' ukuthi: Mngane!
Uyisitha saleNkosi
Eyobuya masinyane!

4
Singabanjwa ngakh' ukona
Nemikhuba eyingozi;
Sizilungisel' usuku
Lokuhlangabez' iNkosi.
Makukhishw' insila yonke,
Singashiyi nakuncane,
Sihlukane nabomhlaba,
'Nkos' iyeza masinyane.

5
Masilulekane njalo,
Silungele lon' izulu,
Sizigcine othandweni,
Ngoba kunomvuz' omkhulu.
'Badukayo bobuyiswa,
Nxa sihlala sithandane,
Sizilinde, sisebenze.
'Nkos' iyeza masinyane!

title: uThixo uthembekile
lyrics:
1
Thixo weth' uthembekile,
Akanayo inkohliso,
Izwi lakhe liqinile,
Kasaphul' isithembiso;
Konk' ukungabaza kwethu,
Akunakh' ukumxhugisa;
Ngakho ulidwala lethu,
Elingenakujabhisa.

2
Uma nxa ngihamba ngedwa
Emhlaben' ezingozini,
Masinyane ngingaqedwa,
Ngingacashi eNkosini.
Yebo, inhliziyo yami
Ibulawe ngamakhaza,
Keph' unam' uMhlengi wami,
Wongisitha, wongiphasa.

3
Ngeny' inkathi ngiyesaba,
Ngingabon' indlela yakhe,
Nxa inkungu yalomhlaba
Ibufihl' ubuso bakhe.
Into engiyithembayo;
Uluthando njalo yena;
Ngob' igatsh' elithelayo,
Ulinaka, elithena.

4
Ngakho sengifak' isandla
