Esandleni sikaBaba,
Wongiphatha, uSomandla,
Ngakho angiyikwesaba.
Ngoba nxa ngihamba naye,
Ngizoncik' ohlangothini.
Wongilonda, oLiqhawe,
Wongiyisa ezulwini.

title: Ungesabi
lyrics:
1
Welikholwa, ungesabi
Nxa uzondwa izwe, bo!
Nans' İNkosi yamakhosi,
UMvikel' omuhle lo.

2
Imiyalo uqaphele,
Uyigcine kahle, he.
Ungabi ondlulandlebe,
Ulalel' İNkosi-ke.

3
Awaziwa abomhlaba,
Uyeyiswa yibo, ha.
Khona unenhlanhl' impela,
Uyamfuz' uJesu la.

4
Wasithwal' isiphambano,
Nawe wosithwala la;
Usebukhosini yena,
Nawe wobakhona, ha.

title: Ngijabula ngethemba
lyrics:
1
Ngethemba umphefuml' ubong' iNkosi,
Uzenyusela ngamaphik' okhozi,
Nxa ngimkhumbula yen' owaphula
Umval' wokufa, la' engikhulula.

2
NgoJesu ngifumene ukuphila,
Uyaphelis' usizi nokulila;
Nxa ngizoshona, uyongigona,
Ngizophaphama le, kungekh' ukona.

3
Ngiyahlalela lolosuk' oluhle
Nxa ngizongena embuswen' omuhle;
Yek' ukucula , nokujabula,
Kungena embusweni wokuthula.

4
Bazokhanyisa okwelanga khona,
Babon' ubso bukaThixo, bona
Abanqobile, bethembekile,
Bekhlow' uJesu njalo, beginile.

5
Ukuthokoza koba-khona njalo,
Bayakubusa bathi khihli, njalo
Ibandlakazi, lihlanzw' igazi,
Lembeth' ingub' ekhazimulakazi.

6
Uthini, uyathand' ukubakhona
KuleloBandla elilonalona?
Usumenyiwe, nengub' uphiwe,
Sheshis' ungen', isango livuliwe.

title: Vuka, mphefumulo
lyrics:
1
Vuka, mphefumlo, Ubong' uJehova kakhulu!
Bonga umusa phakeme, ungangezulu.
Wohlabelela, yena-ke uyalalela,
Yeka uthand' olukhulu!

2
Yena uyaxolela iziphambeko zakho,
Uyazelapha nezifo emzimbeni wakho.
Usekufeni, noma ekuhluphekeni,
Ukumisa isibindi.

3
Uyanelis' umphefum'lo Ngokuhl' okuningi,
'Kuze undize, upheph' izihibe zomlingi,
Uyalungisa, futhi uyakubusisa.
Uyamkhuphul' ongumdingi.

4
Uyahawukela, evama umusa ongaka,
Unobubele, kathand' ukuveza ulaka;
Lomusa wakhe ukubo abantu bakhe;
Ubakhumbul', abanake.

5
Ngengempumalanga ikude Nentshonalanga
Udedisile izono, kanawo amanga,
Lonke uvalo luphelisiwe kanjalo;
Nokho-ke asimkhonzanga.

6
Uyakhumbula ukuthi siyilo uthuli,
Akalithethi icala nje njengomahluli.
Njengob' uyise umntwana wakhe ambize
Njalo sibizw' uMkhululi.

title: Themba eNkosini
lyrics:
1
Ungakhathalel' ingom'so phela,
Ngoba ingomuso inokwayo.
Beka konke ukukhathalela
Kuy' uThixo osikhumbulayo.
Angakhohlw' inhlamvu yeso lakhe,
Nom' isandla sakhe sokunene?
Njalo angekhohlw' abantu bakhe,
Ubanaka njalo ngobumnene.

2
Yena wathembis' ukusinka
Esikudingayo emihleni;
Noma singenakho ukuqonda
Onk' amasu akhe endleleni.
Ungamthemba yena uSomusa,
Wathi, akasoze akuyeke;
Izwi lakhe liyasiphumuza,
Angeshiy' abantu bakhe, ngeke!

3
Ubusiswa oyethemb' iNkosi,
Nokholwayo njengoAbrahama;
Wayevakashelw' izingelosi;
Wayelinda noma sekumnyama,
Yebo, ukukholwa kunomvuzo,
Babetuswa ngakho abendulo.
Nathi simthembel' okwangomuso,
Usilungisel' inkazimulo.

title: Ngimethemba
lyrics:
1
Konk' ukungabaza kwami
Ngokushiya ngom'sa wakhe
Kuye uMsindisi wami,
Ngolikholwa izwi lakhe.
Ngomethemba, ngomethemba;
Izwi lakhe ngimi ngalo.
Ngomethemba, ngomethemba
UMsindisi wami njalo.

2
Zonk' izono zazibekwa
Kuy' uJesu, Mhlengi wami;
Ngal' igazi iyohlanzwa
Yonke inhliziyo yami.

3
Kuphelis' uvalo Iwami,
Kuy' uJesu, Mhlengi wami;
Nxa ukuphumula kwami
KunguJesu, yek' inqaba!

4
Nom' indlel' inobumnyama,
Ngingambon' uMholi wami,
Ngolethemb' elakh' igama;
UMalusi, 'Nkosi yami.

5
Namhla, sengishiya konke,
Izwe nenkohliso yalo;
Inhliziyo yami yonke
Ibe-ngeyeNkosi njalo.

title: Isiphephelo sejuba
lyrics:
1
Njengejuba lindizela Edwaleni, liphephela,
Njalo ngiphephela kuMsindisi wami;
Yena ulidwala lami, Ungukusindiswa kwami,
Lapho iphunyuzwa inhliziyo yami.
KuMsindisi ngiyacasha,
Lapho ngiziphumulela kahle hle,
Kunginik' amandl' amasha,
Nxa engiduduza ngomusa wakhe.

2
Nxa umlingi engicupha,
Nezilingo zingihlupha,
Nguy' uJesu oyisiphephelo sam'.
Nom' im'khonto iyaciba,
Ngizifihla, ngiyaziba,
Ngoba iqinile yon' inqaba yam'.

3
Makube eyam' indaba,
Ngizakhele kulenqaba;
Ngob' uJesu uthi: Hlala kimi la.
Khona mhla belandw' abakhe,
Logodusw' ijuba lakhe,
Lapho izilingo zingasekho, qha.

title: Ubusisiwe
lyrics:
1
Ubusisiwe osephendukile,
Izono nenkohlis' ukushiyile,
Umbuso ophezulu 'subonile,
Uqonda khona, Haleluya!

2
Ayikh' inkazimulo la emiyo,
Ingek' iyanelise inhliziyo,
Ikhon' umfuyo le engapheliyo,
Iyanelisa, Haleluya!

3
Nokub' abantu bangakuhlazisa
Kunani, nxa uJes' ethokozisa,
Uhlala nawe, uyakubusisa,
Uhlabelele, Haleluya!

4
Nokub' amafu asithez' ilanga,
UJesu Kristu akakushiyanga,
Uhamba nawe kulo lonk' ibanga,
Kashiy' abakhe, Haleluya!

5
Ungabokhathalel' ingom'so phela.
Uphethw' uMhlob' omkhul' owakufela,
Uyazi yen' ukubalungisela
Abantu bakhe, Haleluya!

6
Lulam' ubheke njalo ezulwini,
Ungadangali nom' usosizini;
UJes' uzoth' afike emafwini,
Aland' abakhe, Haleluya!

title: Ngifumene iparele
lyrics:
1
Sengilifumen' iparele
Ilona-ke selinganele;
Nginayo imfuyo enkulu,
Ngithole umbuso wezulu.

2
Kukade bengizulazula
Ngifuna, ngingenakuthula,
Ngesab' ukuthengisa ngayo
Imfuyo ekade nginayo.

3
Kanti-ke imfuyo yesono,
Ngakho-ke sekwaba-kungcono,
Selokhu sengayithengisa
Imfuyo eyangikhohlisa.

4
Iparel' engilifumene,
Linguye uJesu, umnene,
Uyayigcwalis' inhliziyo
Ngothabo olungapheliyo.

5
Minanini, enisazula.
Nifuna nje ukujabula;
Funani-ke nant' iparele
Igugu labant' abangcwele.

title: Sengiyazi İNkosi
lyrics:
1
Sengiyaz' İNkosi yami,
Yeza yona, yaguqula
Inhliziyo ngaluthando,
Sengiyazi, Haleluya!
Sengimazi uMsindisi,
Wangisiza, wanginika
Ukuthula enhliz'weni,
Sengimazi, Haleluya!

2
Sengiyaz' İNkosi yami,
'Mehlo ami avuliwe,
Ngiyabona ukukhanya
Kweqiniso nesiminya.

3
Sengimaz' uMfeli wami,
Ngomethemba nokwethemba.
Usekhona, ungimela
Kuy' uYise ezulwini.

4
Sengiyaz' İNkosi yami,
Ngodumisa, ngoyibonga,
Ngoyikhonza, ngiyithanda
Izinsuka zonke zami.

title: Nginomhlobo
lyrics:
1
Nginomhlobo onothando, Haleluya! Ngiyamazi.
Wangifel' es'phambanweni
Wangihlanza ngal' igazi.
Haleluya! Nginomhlobo,
Ungiyisa ezulwini.
Ungiphatha endleleni,
Ungigcina ekhwapheni.

2
Loluthando loMsindisi
Lukhanyis' indlela yami,
Lufuyisa inhliziyo,
Luqhelis' ikhanda lami.

3
Lowomhlob' uhlezi nami,
Yebo, enhliz'weni yami.
Nguye ongithokozisa,
Sengihuba ngaye nami.

4
Lowomhlobo unamandla,
Usehlez' ebukhosini,
Uyabus' umhlaba futhi,
Noma esesezulwini.

5
Nawe, mngane, huba ngaye,
Ngoba ungumhlobo wakho;
Nxa umncenga, uyovuma
Ukungen' ekhaya lakho.

title: Sengimfumene
description: This hymn expresses a profound sense of gratitude and love for Jesus, who, despite the singer's past of being lost and unworthy, offered salvation and unconditional love, leading to a transformation and desire for eternal union with Him in heaven. The core message highlights the transformative power of Christ's love and sacrifice, leading the singer from a state of isolation and sin to one of salvation and devotion.
lyrics:
1
Sengimufumen' uMsindisi,
Unomusa, akangijabhisi.
Okade wangihawukela;
Yebo-ke, wangihlawulela.

2
Ekade bengingamnakanga,
Ngahlala ngakholwa amanga;
Lomhlob' onguJesu ngamdela,
Ingani uyen' owangifela.

3
Kunjalo ngahlal' ezonweni,
Ngabanga kuphel' ekufeni,
Ngasindisw' isandla seNkosi;
Ngakhishwa kwenkulu ingozi.

4
Ngabona uthand' olukhulu,
Luphakeme phezu kwezulu,
Lwafudumalis' inhliziyo;
Luthando olungapheliyo.

5
Kumanje-ke sengiyamthanda,
Masisha uyakungilanda.
Msukwana efik' emafwini
Ngoyiswa phezul' ezulwini.

title: Okwaphezulu
lyrics:
1
Sengiyaqond' okwaphezulu,
Ngokomethemb' uNkulunkulu,
Ngishiya konke okomhlaba.
Ngibang' ekhaya likaBaba.

2
Angikhalel' ukuhlupheka 'Kwendlela,
ngoba ngiyabheka
KuJesu, onguMholi wami,
Namandla nenjabulo yami.

3
Nxa inkathazo ingehlela
NgoJesu ngiyahlabelela;
Kuvusa ukukholwa kwami
Ukudumis' İNkosi yami.

4
UJesu uyilanga lami,
Nomthunzi, nesihlangu sami,
NguMalusi wam' omuhle,
Onginikayo konk' okuhle.

5
Zanini, bazalwane nonke,
Sihambe kanye thina sonke,
Size sifik' ekhaya lethu,
Simbone uMsindisi wethu.

title: Uyinjabulo yami
lyrics:
1
Injabulo yenhliziyo yami
Inguwena, Jesu, Mhlobo wami.
Um'sa wakh' umnandi enhliz'weni,
Kunemfuyo yonke emhlabeni.

2
Mawungiphe ukuqonda kwakho
Zonke izinsuku, ngibe nakho;
Ngenjabulo noma ngezinsizi
Ngisondezwe kuwe, O, Msindisi!

3
Ngiyathanda ukukulalela
Ngenhliziyo yonke yam' impela;
Kepha kudingeka ungisize,
Nangamandla akh' ungiqinise.

4
Mhla ngiyakumuka emhlabeni
Ngingeniswe ekujabuleni;
Lapho kanye nabangcwele bonke,
Ngikubonge ngenhliziyo yonke.

title: Njengendluzele
lyrics:
1
Njengendluzele inxanela
Emfuleni ocwebileyo,
Njalo nami ngiyakomela,
Wena Thixo, ophilileyo.
Uphelis' izinxanelo,
Ichichim' indebe yami;
Ugcwalisa-ke izinswelo,
Uthulisa umoya wam'.

2
Sekukade ngazulazula,
Ngahlanyiswa ukoma kwami;
Ngakhonjiswa-ke kulomfula,
Wabuyisa umoya wam'.
Sengakhil' eduze nawo,
Ngifumene ukuthula,
Nganeliswa, amanzi awo,
Yeka, kuhl' emfuleni lo.

3
Nina enisagijimela
Ukuphuz' emaxhaphosin',
Yizwanini, ngiyonitshela
Ngalamanzi anikw' iNkosi;
Ayakunijabulisa,
Nogba yon' ishil' ukuthi,
Lowo engiyakumphuzisa,
Yen' akasayikoma, qha!

title: Qhubekela phambili
lyrics:
1
Qhuba phambili, wen' olikholwa,
Ungadangali noma usolwa.
Qhuba phambili, woba-nombuso,
Mhla uMsindisi eza nomvuzo.
Quba phambili, bhek' ezulwini;
Nxa udangele, cel' eNkosini,
Qhuba phambili, az' akubize,
Uyophumula eParadisi.

2
Qhuba phambili, funa uhlehle,
Emva ukhangwa ntoni-ke enhle?
Qhuba phambili; namp' abaningi
Belwa njengawe bahlul' umlingi.

3
Qhuba phambili, impi isasha,
Land' eNkosini 'mandla amasha,
Qhuba phambili ebungcweleni,
Landel' uJesu enyathelweni.

4
Qhuba phambili, ungaboqhuka,
Kuyakhombis' ukuth' uyagula,
Qhuba phambili, ungohambayo,
Bayathuthuka abaphilayo.

5
Qhuba phambili, ukuphumula
Kuyobamnandi. Yek' ukuthula!
Qhuba phambili, siyahlalelwa,
Masiqinise singavalelwa.

title: Umoya wezwe
lyrics:
1
Ngasilandel' abany' abantu nje,
Siphuze, sidle, sinjengabo.
Basuka basho njal' abantu-ke,
Baholw' izinkanuko zabo.
Bayalandela la' uholela
Umoya wezwe omubi,
Abaqondanga, ababuzanga,
Ukuthi: Kuholelaphi?

2
Ungalandel' umoya wezwe, qha,
Uyashonisa ekufeni.
Awukamthol' uMoy' oNgcwele na?
Osiholel' ekuphileni.
Uma umntula, shesh' ukuvula
Umnayngo wakho wenhliziyo,
Uyoba-nalo ithemba njalo,
Elingakujabhisiyo.

3
Ubek' isandla egejeni na?
Ungabobhek' emuva njalo,
Ubizwa khona ezulwini, ha.
Uyoba indlalifa yalo,
Ngakho qinisa nokuqinisa
'Kubizwa kwakho okungcwele.
UJes' uyeza ukubakhweza
Abakhe, abamukele.

title: Thabatha izandla zami
lyrics:
1
Thabath' izandla zami, Ungihole.
Qondis' indlela yami.
Mangithole Amandl' okulandela
Ley' eyakho.
Ngisiz' ukulalela Izwi lakho.

2
Enjabulweni yami, Ngiphathe, Nkos'.
Ebuhlungwini bami Ngisize, Nkos'.
Njengob' ingan' ifika Kunina-ke,
Kunjalo sengincika, Nkosi, kuwe.

3
Nokub' indlela yami Yofiphala,
Kuphel' amandla ami, Wongithwala.
Thabath' ezam' izandla, Phatha zona.
Khona ngawakh' amandla Ngokubona.

title: Busa, Nkosi yami
lyrics:
1
O, Msindisi, Jesu Kristu,
Nguwe oyiNkosi yam'.
Yebo manje mawubuse
Phezu kwakho konk' okwam'.
Busa, Nkosi yam', Busa, Nkosi yam',
Ngeqiniso ngisavuma UyİNkosi yam'.

2
Kade ngazinika kuwe,
Wazihlanz' izono zam'.
Namhla ngiyaphinda, ngithi,
Wena uyiNkosi yam'.

3
'Zandla zami nezinyawo,
Kanye nal' ulimi Iwam'.
Nezimpahla nani nani,
Thatha konke, Nkosi yam'.

title: Izwi lokuphila
lyrics:
1
Lihlabelele futhi-ke,
Ilizwi lokuphila,
Ngoba lona lilihle hle,
Ilizwi lokuphila,
Lisisiza lona,
Ukungob' ukona.
Ilona-ke, limnandi, he,
Ilizwi lokuphila.

2
Liyasimema sonke la,
Ilizwi lokuphila,
Niyalalela nonke na?
Ilizwi lokuphila.
Nibizelw' izulu
Nonke, nosithulu.

3
Yebo, lona limnandi-ke,
Ilizwi lokuphila,
Lithi, singasindiswa, he!
Ilizwi lokuphila,
Liyasingcwelisa
Lisijabulisa.

title: Ngithanda indaba endala
lyrics:
1
Ngithand' indab' endala,
Yon' esikhumbuzayo
NgoJesu nom'sa wakhe,
UMhlob' osithandayo.
Ngithanda leyondaba,
Iqinisile yonke,
Iyakugcwalisisa
'Kuswela kwami konke.
Ngithanda leyondaba,
Isusa ukwesaba,
Ibanga ukwethaba,
'Vangeli likaJesu.

2
Ngithanda leyondaba,
Iyangimangalisa;
Kungenjengokomhlaba,
Okunokukhohlisa.
Lendab' isebenzile
Kweyami inhliziyo,
Yon' ingibusisile,
Ngithokoziswa yiyo.

3
Ngithand' ukuyiqhuba,
Imnandi enhliz'weni;
Ikhula ngokuphindwa,
Makholwa, iqhubeni!
Baningi kulomhlaba
Abangakezwa lutho,
Ngalokho qhub' indaba,
Nin' eningamabutho.

4
Ngiphinda leyondaba,
Imnandi nakubona
Abathi, sesiyazi,
Bayazisise yona.
Noma sohub' igama
Eslisha ezulwini,
Lyon' indab' endala,
Yoduma ebomini.

title: Umkhumbi
lyrics:
1
UBaba osezulwini
Wakhile umkhumbi,
Kuwona simenywe sonke
Ukuthol' igumbi.
Emkhunjin' ikhon' indawo,
Ngena nje, shesha-ke,
Emkhunjin' ikhon' indawo,
Ikwanenle wena nam'.

2
Lomkhumbi-ke uyini, pho,
Ungatholwaphi na?
Unguye uJesu Kristu,
Ukhona nathi la.

3
Kwavulw' umnyang' onhlangothin',
Lapho babemhlaba;
Siphepha khona ekufen'
Kuyona lenqaba.

4
USim'yoni ewubonile
Lomkhumb' omuhle hle.
Wavalelis' umhlab' ethi: Ungimukise-ke!

5
Nomphangi esekufeni
Wachasha kuwo-ke;
UJesu wamthembis' ethi: Uyoba-nami le.

6
Ngena-ke kungakavalwa,
Ubengaphandle, wo!
Phangisa nxa usamenywa,
Uyosindiswa, nzo.

title: Umhlobo wakho
lyrics:
1
'Jesu ungumhlobo wakho,
Uyamthanda na?
Uyafun' uthando Iwakho,
Woluthola na?
Wakuthanda ekufeni,
Wakufel' es'phambanweni,
Wokukhipha ezonweni,
Uyavuma na?

2
Unamandla unomusa,
Uyambonga na?
Uyafun' ukukuvusa,
Uyathanda na?
Yena akabiz' imali,
'Muthi wakhe ubukhali,
Uyelapha engamali
Nom' ubani, qha.

3
Yena wanikela konke;
Unikani na?
Yena unesisa sonke;
Akashiy' abantu bakhe,
Abathemb' igama lakhe;
Ubagcina abanake,
Akukuhle na?

4
Walinyazwa ngenxa yakho,
Uyakholwa na?
Wazithwal' izono zakho,
Uzivuma na?
Wayekheth' ukub' adelwe,
Ngenxa yakho abethelwe
'Kuze wen' uthethelelwe,
'Suyamthanda na?

5
Ku'kuphila ukumazi,
Uyamazi na?
Um'sa wakhe usuwazi
Ngokwempela na?
Lom'sa ungakufundisa
Ube-nakh' ukuphikisa
Konk' okungakukhohlisa.
Ufundile na?

6
'Jesu, Mhlobo wesifuba,
Usunaye na?
Khon' impela ungahuba,
Ujabule la.
Akusekho ukulahlwa,
Ngom'sa wakhe uzophahlwa,
Noma wena uzokhahlwa
Abomhlaba la.

title: Kuphelele
lyrics:
1
Yizwanin' udab' oluhle
Oluvel' eGolgotha,
Laph' uJesu, 'Mhlob' omuhle,
Emnqob' uSathane nya.
Kuphelele, kuphelele,
Washo khon' eGolgotha.
Kuphelele, kuphelele,
Washo khon' eGolgotha.

2
Wayeleng' es'phambanweni
Ekuthwel' ukona kwam',
Ubuhlung' emanxebeni,
Konke kwakungenxa yam'.

3
Lelogazi lentethelo,
Liphelis' uvalo nya;
Linamandla lona lelo,
Ukuzwile lokho na?

4
USathane angembambe
Othand' ukumshiya la,
Kodwa uyalinga kambe,
Kepha uhluliwe nya.

5
Phumanini nonke, phlea,
'Kuboshweni kwenu la;
Nihlengiwe, wanifela,
Usilungisele, pha.

title: Woza kuJesu
lyrics:
1
Woza kuJesu, uMfeli wakho,
Wothethelelwa izono zakho.
Yizwa umemo IweNkosi yakho,
Oluthi: Woza kimi!
Yebo, woza kuMsindisi wakho,
Wobusiswa ekuzeni kwakho;
Wokukhulul' ezonweni zakho,
Woza kuyena manje.

2
Mus' ukuhamba ngaleyondlela
Eshonisayo kabi impela;
Buyela kuye , owakufela,
Woza kuyena manje.

3
Yiyo İNkosi isakubiza,
Iyanxanela ukukusiza,
Uma ufika yokuphilisa,
Ngakho-ke woza manje.

4
Uma unqaba ukulalela
Uyakubhubha kabi impela;
Uyakushona ngaleyondlela
Eya esihogweni.

title: Lifikile iVangeli
lyrics:
1
Lifikile iVangeli Esizweni sakwaZulu,
Lilethile ukukhanya
Nezinhlanhla ezinkulu.
Imikhuba yobumnyama lyaxoshw' ikhwezi leli;
Siyabingelel' ukusa,
Lifikile iVangeli.

2
Lifikile iVangeli, Balileth' abafundisi;
Beza basishumayeza
Ngay' uBaba, uMsindisi,
Olithanda izwe lonke,
Wehla yena waba 'Mfeli;
Siyahalalis' impela,
Lifikile iVangeli.

3
Lifikile iVangeli, Lona lisitshel' ukuthi
Masilahle zonk' izono,
Ngoba zona ziwubuthi.
Sesimaz' uMoy' omuhle,
UngoMhlengi, unguMeli.
Siyabonga nokubonga,
Lifikile iVangeli.

4
Lifikile iVangeli, Sesinal' ithemb' impela,
Sinekhaya le phezulu,
Lapho soziphumulela,
Mhla simuka kulelizwe,
Sesinaye uMholeli.
Haleluya! Haleluya!
Lifikile iVangeli.

title: Uyamazi uJesu yini?
lyrics:
1
Uyamaz' uJesu yini, OyİNkosi noMsindisi,
Onothando, onomusa,
Uyamaz' uJesu na?
Mfun' uJesu, uMsindisi,
Nguye owakufelayo,
Nxa umfuna uzomthola,
Usindiswe namhlanje.

2
Wayesezulwini lakhe,
EnoYis' uNkulunkulu,
Edunyiswa njalonjalo,
Ngamabandla aphezulu.

3
Kepha laph' ebon' abantu
Bedukile njengezimvu,
Wabahawukel' impela
Ngal' uthando olukhulu.

4
Ngakh' ukusithanda kwakhe
Weza lapha emhlabeni,
Ezukusibuyisela
Thin' abantu endleweni.

5
Awumuzwa ekubiza,
Ethi: Moni, woza kimi,
Usindiswe ezonweni
Ube-ngumlandeli wami.

6
Yebo, Jesu ngiyavuma,
Singiyeza kuwe, Nkosi,
Ngisindise ungigcine,
Ngilandele wena njalo.

title: Ungamncishi indawo
lyrics:
1
Ungamncish' indaw' uJesu,
Wazithwal' izono zakho;
Nang' usemi engqongqotha,
Mon' uzomngenisa na?
UyİNkosi yobukhosi,
Shesh' ulalel' izwi lakhe,
Umvulele inhliziyo,
Thana: Ngena, Nkosi yam'!

2
Uvumela okomhlaba,
Keph' uKrist' obethelweyo
Kanandawo yokuhlala
Enhliz'wen' afela yona.

3
Konje awunasikhathi?
Nang' uJesu usabiza,
Namhla isikhath' esihle,
Ingomuso alifiki.

4
Dela konke, dela manje,
Olwomusa luyadlula!
Masinyane uzokufa
Akungabi ezonweni.

title: Mabutho esiphambano
lyrics:
1
Mabuth' esiphambano,
INkos' iyanibiza,
Nilalel' izwi layo,
Nans' impi isashisa!
Iwahol' amabutho,
Ayakunqoba ngayo;
Izitha zizobhuqwa
Ngamandlakazi ayo.

2
Mabuth' esiphambano,
Yizwani icilongo!
Yimani isibindi,
Niqine, ninomongo.
Yibani amadoda,
Nilwel' İNkosi yenu.
Izitha zigunyile,
Ziged' amandla enu.

3
Mabuth' esiphambano,
Nohlom' amandla ayo;
Awenu angesize,
Fak' izikhali zayo,
Nilinde nithandaze,
Nithembe nokwethemba;
Noma İNkosi isho,
Nikhokhe izinkemba.

4
Mabuth' esiphambano,
Nonce nithol' umvuzo!
Kubanjw' inkemba namhla,
Niyoqheliswa ngom'so.
Lab' abaqinisayo
INkosi bayilwela,
Bobusa nayo futhi,
Baphiw' umvuz' impela.

title: Sophatha izinyanda
lyrics:
1
Tshala ekuseni, Tshal' imbewu yezwi,
Tshal nasemini, Tshala ngokuthanda.
Ubhek' ukuvuna, Mhla sobizw' İNkosi,
Ngomhla wenjabulo, Sizophath' in'yanda.
Sizophath' in'yanda, Sizophath' in'yanda,
Ngomhla wenjabulo, Sizophath' in'yanda.

2
Tshala emthunzini, Tshala elangeni.
Ungasab' amafu, Noma angabanda;
Sonce sigoduke, Kuphel' umsebenzi,
Ngomhla wenjabulo, Sizophath' in'yanda.

3
Nom' izinyembezi
Zomathis' imbewu, yomila kahle,
Yebo, iyakwanda.
Zinyembezi zakho
Ziyosulw' iNkosi,
Ngomhla wenjabulo, Sizophath' in'yanda.

title: Yimani isibindi
lyrics:
1
Yimani isibindi, Mabutho akaJesu,
Umkhosii niwuhlabe, Ngayengangotshwa, qha.
Enqob' uyakunqoba Esabahol' abakhe,
Izitha wozinqoba, Abus' indawo zonke.

2
Yimani isibindi, Imbande nans' ikhala!
Yiyani ekulweni Kuseyinamhlanje
Yibani amaqhawe, Nilwel' İNkosi yenu;
Igwal' alingabikho, Yimani nithi ngo!

3
Yimel' uJesu Kristu, Yim' emandleni akhe;
Ingalo enye ize, Neyenu ingesize,
Hlomani izikhali Zenkosi yamakhosi,
Nilinde nithandaze, Nizodl' umvuzo wenu.

4
Yimani isibindi, Sekuzophel' ukulwa;
Umsindo wempi namhla Kobongw' iNkosi ngom'so.
Kobongwa namaqhawe, Aphiwe nemiqhele.
Abuse njalonjalo, NeNkosi yobukhosi.

title: Uyamuzwa uMsindisi?
lyrics:
1
Uyamuzwa uMsindisi Ez' ukukubiza? Kamukanga, qha, usemi,
Umvulele, umvulele! Izwi likaMoya Lithi: Umvel' uJesu, 'Nkosi noMsindisi.

2
Nakh' ukufa kusondela Khon' ekhaya lakho.
Kokufuna, wena bani, Yebo, kumb' okwakho.
Mnik' uJesu inhliziyo, Unganqabi nayo.
Nxa umdela, koba njani Ngom'hla lo ozayo?

3
Khon' abanye bazakuthi: Nkosi, sivulele! Qha', ithuba balilahle,
Ngek' ibalalele. Manje lisekhon' ithuba,
Shesh' umamukele. Ungavali, bhek' isemi, Isakuhlalele.

title: Indaba emnandi
lyrics:
1
Imnand' indaba yaphezulu, Iliqiniso elikhulu,
NgeMvana le kaNkulunkulu, Yon' indaba kaJesu.
Landa futhi ngoJesu, Landa futhi ngoJesu,
Ngize ngimaz' Ongithanda kangaka, Landa futhi ngoJesu.

2
Kunyamalala okomhlaba, Kunjengenkungu yezintaba,
Ziguga zonke izindaba, Qha, indaba kaJesu.

3
Nxa ungibona nginosizi, Ngiding' ukuzwa ngoMsindisi;
Nguyena yedwa, kajabhisi, Landa futhi ngoJesu.

4
Noma ngile ebukhosini, Ngabelw' indawo ebomini,
Ngoyenamiswa ezulwini Ngay' indaba kaJesu.

title: Usuzwile
lyrics:
1
Usuzwile izwi lakhe, izwi loMsindisi lo, Onothando olungaka, Ungamali, woza bo! Woza, manje, yebo, manje, Woz' ukholw' uJesu la! Woza manje, yebo, manje, Wosindiswa khona la!

2
Elokufa alitsheli. Ngakho woza namhlanje, Ngalo lona lelilanga Lisekhon' ithuba-ke.

3
Usuzwile izwi lakhe, Uzokholwa nini na? Iminyaka iyadlula, Woza, moni, guqa la.

4
Mus' ukusho: Ngonce ngize, Uzilandulele nje. Asilazi langomuso, Woza nakalokhu nje.

5
Uth' uJes': Ozayo kimi Angiyikumlahla, qha!' Noma ungumonikazi Mhlobo wami, guqa la!

title: Ivangeli elidala
lyrics:
1
LiVangeli elidala Linganela mina, du.

2
Labanel' abaphostoli, Linganela mina, du.

3
Balifel' abokuqala, Linganela mina, du.

4
Lingishumayez' uJesu, Linganela mina, du.

5
Lithi wazifel' izoni, Linganela mina, du.

6
Lokhu mina ngiyisoni, Linganela mina, du.

7
Ngiyakholwa yilo manje, Linganela mina, du.

8
Liyangithandis' iBhayibhel', Linganela mina, du.

9
Ngiyalithokoza kabi, Linganela mina, du.

10
Livumeni nina nonke Lonanela nani, du.

title: Icilongo leVangeli
lyrics:
1
Icilongo leVangeli Livuthelw' ezweni lonke. Liyabika insidiso Enikezw' abantu bonke. 'Thixo walithanda izwe, Wanik' iNdodana yakhe, Bonke abakholwa yiyo, Banedaw' ekhaya lakhe. Icilongo leVangeli Livuthelw' ezweni lonke. Icilongo leVangeli Libamem' abantu bonke.

2
Icilongo libizela Edlini laphezulu. Ningadel' umemo lolu, Nxa nimenyw' uNkulunkulu? Wozani ekudleni, Nina enilambileyo, Nidl' ubisi nezinyosi, Konke okulungileyo.

3
Icilongo limxwayisa Ohambayo ezonweni. Lithi, ongalaleliyo Uyashon' ekulahlweni. Balek' usinde, moni, Suk' ufulathel' ukufa, Ungahlali eSodoma, Lizoshiswa ngesolufa.

4
Liyabika intokozo Kubo bonk' abakholwayo. 'Kuthi, bayathethelelwa Ngaye owabafelayo. Ngibik' indaba enhle, Nizalelwe uMsindisi OnguKristu Nkosinkulu. Luzophela lonk' usizi.

title: Indaba endala
lyrics:
1
Ngitshel' indab' endala Ngombuso ophezulu. NgoJesu nobukhosi, Nothando olukhulu, Ngicasisele kahle. Nginjengengan' encane, Nginobuthakathaka, Ngikhohlwa masinyane. Ngitshel' indab' endala, Ngitshel' indab' endala, Ngitshel' indab' endala, Yothando lukaJesu.

2
Ngitshel' indaba enhle, Ukuze ngiyiqonde, Yokungihlenga kwakhe, Ukuba ngiyilonde, Yiphinde futhifuthi Ingen' esibilini, Ingabi njengenkungu Enyamalal' emini.

3
Ngitshel' indaba enhle Nxa unovalo ngami Lokuthi okomhlaba Kwedus' umoya wami. Usheshe uze kimi, Uqhub' indaba njalo Yothando lukaJesu, Ngiyakuvuswa ngalo.

title: Ngikunxusela
lyrics:
1
NginoMsindisi osebukhosini, Kakhohlwa abakhe njengabanye la, Namanje uyangimelela ezulwini. Uzoba owakho loMsindisi na? Ngiyakunxusela, Ngiyakunxusela, Ukuba usindiswe namuhlanje.

2
SenginoBaba okhona ezulwini, Ungilungisela ikhaya laphaya; Ngobizwa masiny' ukumbona ebomini. Ungehambe nami siye khona na?

3
Senginengubo engibekelweyo, Lyabengezela imhloph' ithi qhwa; Nangalolusuku engiyam'kelayo, Uzophiw' ingubo enjalo-ke na?

4
Nginokuthula okungakaziwa Abantu abangamthand' uJesu la; Kungaye kuphel' ukuthula kuphiwa. Uzophiwa nini lokuthula na?

5
Nginaw' umqhele okhazimulayo, Engizohlotshiswa ngawo khona le Sengathi-ke ngalolosuku oluzayo Uhlotshiswe nawe ngomqhele onje!

title: Sekusile
lyrics:
1
Ubusuku budlulile, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami, Amathunzi aphelile, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami. Sekusile, sekusile, Sekusile enhliz'weni yami. UJes' ungukukhanya kwami, Sekusile enhliz'weni.

2
Wazisul' izinyembezi, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami, UMsindisi ulikhwezi. Kwasa enhliz'weni yami.

3
Kade ngangiyisigqila, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami, Ngakhululwa, sengiphila, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami.

4
Nxa ngiyenz' intando yakhe, Kusa enhliz'weni yami; Kawusind' umyalo wakhe, Kwasa enhliz'weni yami.

5
Wena osenobumnyama, Woza naw' ekukhanyeni, Uzophiwa ukwenama Nokukhanya enhliz'weni. Kuzokhanya, kuzokhanya, Kuzokhanya enhliz'weni yakho. Vum' izono, vul' umnyango! Kuzokhanya enhliz'weni.

title: Nanto udaba
lyrics:
1
Nanto udaba, udaba lukaJesu, Udaba oluhl' oluthokozisayo. Bamenywa aboni, sheshani, sheshani! Sabela-ke manje, nguwen' obizwayo. Sabel' uyabizwa, Sabel' uyabizwa, Ubizw' uMsindisi Ubizwa manje.

2
Nanto udaba, udaba lukaJesu; Waqhutshwa uthando ukuz' emhlabeni; Ethanda aboni, ezobasindisa, Abamvumelayo angene enhliz'weni.

3
Nanto udaba, udaba lukaJesu. Lalela, phenduka wen' ohlubukayo. Akhuhlwanyelayo umuntu wovuna, UThixo kahlekwa ngumuntu ohlekayo.

title: Buya, mngane!
lyrics:
1
Wena, mngan' olahliweyo, Buya-ke! KuMalus' olungileyo, Buya-ke! Kuy' uJes' osakhalela 'Bantu bakhe abamdela, Usathand' ukubam'kela. Buya-ke! Woza, egameni lakhe, KuYihlo onguMdali; Welula izandla zakhe. Sabela manje, ungamali.

2
Ak' usuk' ebumnyameni, Buya-ke! Uze manj' ekukhanyeni, Buya-ke! Ulahliwe ezonweni, Uyaqonda ekufeni, Phendukel' ekuphileni. Buya-ke!

3
'Sundiniwe ezonweni, Buya-ke! Suka ezingulubeni, Buya-ke! Ungakasho: Thethelela, Nang' uYihlo wokwam'kela, Akanakh' ukukudela, Buya-ke!
4
Mngane, ungabolibala, Buya-ke! Inhliziyo iyakhala, Buya-ke! Ungumuntu onosizi, Uyamdingaa uMsindisi; Nang' uJesu, uMphilisi, Buya-ke!

title: Umthimba
lyrics:
1
Ikhon' indawo emthimben' omkhulu, Ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu. Ngena, ngena! Indawo isekhona.

2
Sekuntambama, seliyakushona, Nank' amathunzi asemade wona.

3
Indlu yomthimba isivunuliwe, Isiyagcwala, ngena, umenyiwe.

4
Umnyango nanku usuvulekile, Sheshis' ungene, sebekubhekile.

5
Lomkhos' ongaka uhlatshelwe wena, Owabhunguka, usubuya njena?

6
Namp' abasezulwini bakuqhweba, Basinga, yebo, nampo bayageba.

7
Osadelayo, maye, uzokhala, Usivulele, Nkosi! lyakwala. Maye, maye! Indawo ayisekho!

title: Uthini ngoJesu?
lyrics:
1
Wemhlobo, uyakwenzani NgoJesu okuthandayo? Ikhanda lakhe lopha, Ngameva alihlabayo. Washaywa ngemivimbo Eyafanela wena. Uyakwenzani ngaye? Sabel' uyabizw' uyena! Uzophendul' uthini? Uzophendul' uthini? Uyakwenzani ngaye Owakufel' emthini?

2
Wemngane, uyakwenzani NgoJesu owakhokhela Icala lakho lonke. Ukhetha ukumdelela? Wethwesw' izono zakho, Wayenosizi Iwakho. Uyakwenzani ngaye Lomhlobo noMhlengi wakho.

3
Usuyakwenzani ngaye UJesu okubizayo? Ukulibala futhi Kuyinto esabekayo. Namhlanje uyabizwa Qaphel' ithuba lakho Lokumam'kel' uJesu, Abe-nguMsindisi wakho!

title: Mvulele uJesu
lyrics:
1
Vulela uJes' inhliziyo, Udele umhlaba nokona; Wothola uMhlob' ongafiyo. Nethemba elilonalona.

2
Wemhlobo, odlal' ezonweni, Uhleka amazw' eluleko, Khumbula uqond' ekufeni, Kulapho ithuba lingekho.

3
Uchith' isikhathi somusa, Ngezono nezint' eziyize; Ukuhlwa koshesha ukuza, Ilanga ungek' ulimise.

4
Mawubalekel' enqabeni, UJesu usekuhlalela, Uyokukhulul' ezonweni Ngegazi elakuconsela.

5
Ungem' emkhathini embili, Sheshisa, ukhethe namuhla. Awusayikub' isigqila; Ubomi bezul' uzobudla.

title: Phenduka namhla!
lyrics:
1
Soni, esinenhliziyo Eyoniw' isono, wo! Woza kuMsindisi wakho, Wosindiswa nguye lo! O, pheduka namhlanje! Uyabizw' İNkos', ehe! Uyabizwa namhlanje.

2
'Jesu othobekileyo, Useduze manje la, Uyakumvulela nini LowoMhlobo wakho na?

3
Mus' ukulibala futhi, Bamb' ithuba lelike! Ngoba awuyikubizwa Njalo njengalokho nje.

4
Ngenhliziy' ephukileyo, Guqa ngamadolo la, Vum' izono zakho kuyo, Yozisusa zonke nya.

5
Awumuzwa enhliz'weni Ukuthinta kwakhe na? Mvumele, wokuhlanza Ube-mhlophe uthi qhwa.

6
'Zingelosi ziyafisa Ukubika khona le, Uma ususindisiwe, Ziyoshay' ihlombe, he.

title: Buya, mntwana
lyrics:
1
Wen' ondinda kude Phandle kwesibaya, Yizwa izwi lithi: Buyel' ekhaya! Buya, mntwana, buya, Ubuyel' ekhaya! Mus' ukulibala, Buyel' ekhaya!

2
Izwe osukulo, Linendlel' enkulu, Woza ekudleni Kombus' wezulu!

3
Shiy' indlela embi Ephambukisayo, Kuyo unosizi oluhlabayo.

4
Wena usathandwa, Uhlalelw' ekhaya, Sebekubhekile abalaphaya

title: Phaphamani bazalwane
lyrics:
1
Phamphamani bazalwane bakaKristu! Vukanini! Sekusile bo! Hlomanini izikhali, bazalwane, Nisakwelwa ubuthongo, wo! Vukanini, bandla bo! Anibon' izitha na? Hlomanini izikhali zokukholwa, NgoSomandla sizonqoba, ngo!

2
Ubutshwala, namanyala, bazalwane, Akuzon' izitha zethu na? USathan' usivukele, bazalwane, Somvumela yini? Ngeke, qha!

3
'Zinkanuko, yek' ihlazo, bazalwane! Sesikwelwa amahloni, wo! Ziyaqed' ibandla lethu, bazalwane, Akusil' icala lethu, pho?

4
Qhubekani, qinisani, bazalwane, Ningahlehli, ngisho nakanci. Ningabheki ngasemuva, bazalwane, Yimanini isibindi, ngqi!

title: Usaphila na?
lyrics:
1
Woza mngane, ngikubuze; Usahamba kahle na? Usho: Yebo, incosana,Mbhala, uphilile na? Ngiyabuz' impilo-ke kuwe la. Usahamba kahle nje wena na?

2
Usaphila lo'kuphila OkuseNkosini na? Usuzelwe ngokoMoya, Usu'munt omusha na?

3
Kumbe usahamba wena Ezonweni zakho na? Khon' uhlezi ekufeni, Kulandel' izono, ha.

4
Hlolisisa inhliziyo, U'ba iphilaphi na? Cel' uJesu akuvuse, Uz' uphile kahle la.

title: Nangu mina, Nkosi
lyrics:
1
Yizw' uJesu uyabuza, Ziphi 'zisebenzi zami? Amabuya nank' amhlophe, Vukanini, bandla lami! Isho njalo 'Nkosi yethu, Soholelwa kahle yiyo, Ovumayo ma'sabele, Nangu mina ngenhliziyo.
2
Nom' ungenakuya kude NeVangeli losindiso, Ubatshel' abaseduze Ngezindaba zothabiso. Nom' ungenikel' urandi, Unganik' isenti lakho; Nom' isitsha nje samanzi, Sokhokhelw' iNkosi yakho.
3
Ungemfuze uPawulu, Ngenkulum' enjengodosi, Ungafakazel' uthando Nobubele-ke beNkosi. Ungevuse izikhulu, Ubahlul' abaphikisi, Ungahola abantwana, Beze bona kuMsindisi.
4
Nom' ungebe 'mlindimkhulu Odongeni IweZiyoni, Ememez' esixukwini, Phendukani nina, zoni! Ungasiza ngomthandazo, Uqinis' izandla zabo, NjengoHuri noAroni. Babemphas' umholi wabo.
5
Mbhal' uyosho njengoKa'ni: Ngingumlindi womfowethu? Yebo, sinecala thina, Maluvusw' uthando Iwethu. Ngokwempela kufanele, Nxa ngibizw' uMfeli wami, Ngisabele: Nangu mina, Ungithume, NKosi yami!

title: Amandla oMsindisi
lyrics:
1
Bhekani nibone amandl' oMsindisi Abonakaliswa ngoSawul', umFarisi, Owayezingela ehluph' amakholwa Esesendleleni, ngonyazi wafolwa. Simhalalisela uJes' unamandla, Sengath' anganqob' abaningi nanamhla.
2
USawul' esebuz': Ungubani-ke Nkosi! Waselizw' ilizwi kungathi udosi: Nginguye uJesu waseNazaretha; Sukum' ulalele, ngoba ngakukhetha.
3
Waholwa ngesandla, engena emzini, 'Zinsuku zintathu wanxus' eNkosini. Phezulu kwathiwa: Nang' uyakhuleka. Iqhawe lokulwa, nanto, langobeka
4
USawul' waphenduka ikholwa impela, Ehamba noJesu lapho emholela; Waqala masinya ukufakazela Umusa kaJesu, owamhawukela.

title: Yiba yiqhawe
lyrics:
1
Yib' onhliziyo eqinisileyo, Yiba yiqhawe emandleni akhe! Yilwa ukulwa okulungileyo, Yiba namandla othandweni Iwakhe! Qhuba udaba, udaba lukaJesu, Yiba iqhawe leVangeli lakhe.
2
Yib' onhliziyo eqinisileyo, Uzinikele impel' eNkosini; Mawusebenz' ube-ngokhutheleyo, Gcin' imiyalo, wonqoba empini.
3
Yib' onhliziyo eqinisileyo, Bheka kuJesu, uz' umhluphekele; Wakhuthazela engohluphekayo, Ngakho uThixo wamnika umqhele.

title: Sengikhishiwe odakeni
lyrics:
1
Ngangibhajiwe odaken', Ngicish' ukufa ezonwen'. Manje sengimi edwalen' ElinguJesu, Nkosi. Sengikhishiwe odaken', Sengikhishiwe ezonwen', Ngibonga, ngimi edwalen', Ngomusa nje ngisedwalen'.
2
Ungikhiphile osizin'. Sengisusiwe ebubin', Ngingenisiwe ebomin', Ngomusa wakho, Nkosi.
3
Wazinikela ekufen', Wahlushwa esiphambanwen'. Izipikili ezandlen', Nasenyaweni, Nkosi.
4
Mangime ekuthembeken', Ngikhuthazele endlelen' Kuze kube sekuphelen', Ngamandla akho, Nkosi.

title: Webani, yizwa!
lyrics:
1
Webani, yizw' indaba yami: Ngangisekulahleken', Kodwa wehla uMhlengi wami, Wangikhipha ekufen'. LoMhlengi ungubani na? NguJes'; amukh' omunye, qha! Wenzani na? Wehla wafa, Uphi namhla? Wavuka, ha! Usesimel' ezulwini.
2
Wabudel' ubukhosi bakhe, Wehla wafa emhlaben'. Igam' elinguJesu Kristu, Malibongwe ezizwen'.
3
Lendaba isahamba njalo, Ivus' abasekufen', Yebo, ivez' imvuselelo, Isiqhuba endlelen'.
4
Wena-ke, woz' uzinikele Usabizwa, vuma he! Nawe uthole nans' inhlanhla, Usindiswe namhlanje.

title: Wonke othandayo
lyrics:
1
Wonke othandayo, Yizwanini-ke. Wonke othandayo, Qhuba izwi le. Nimemez' indaba Yonk' indawo la, Ningashiyi muntu, qha. Yizanini bo! Senithini, pho! Woza, bani bani KuMsindisi lo. Uyabizw' uBaba Noma unguban', Akakhethi muntu, qha!
2
Wonke othandayo, Alilihle na? Wonke othandayo, Akakhethi, qha! KunguBaba wethu, Nkosi yamakhos'; Animuzwa yini na?
3
Wonke othandayo, Ulalele bo! Wonke othandayo, Akunguwe, pho! Uyabizwa nawe, Vuma uth', ehe, Woza phela usenje.
4
Wonke othandayo, Mbik' omuhle hle. Wonke othandayo. Ngowanamhlanje, Qaphelani nonke, Kuyovalwa, wo! Khona nothi: Maye bo!

title: Phenduka
lyrics:
1
Wemhlobo wethu, osewudlala Nokufa, wo! Phaphama manje ungabolala, Uzofa, bo! Uyoshonaph' ekufeni na, Lapho ubizw' ukumuka la?
2
Umuzw' uJesu, usakubiza, Uze unje; Ngomusa wakhe wokusindisa. Lalela-ke! Libamb' ithuba lanamhlanje, Ngomusa ungaliswela, he!
3
Phenduka-ke endleleni yakho; Phenduka, dwa. Uhlanzwe nguye umoya wakho; Ukuthi qhwa! Umnike yonk' inhliziyo-ke, Ungabomncisha indawo, he.
4
Uash' uJesu: Ukholwe yimi Okunye qha! 'Nhliziyo yakho ingagijimi Lapho na la. Ukheth' inkos' ibe-yinye la. Ungewakhonz amabili, qha!

title: Uyathanda ukungena na?
lyrics:
1
Wena uyathand' ukungen' ezulwin'? Konje, wongena kanjani? Uma usathanda impilo yala', Uyosindiswa ubani? Ingumcingo yon' indlela eya le, Nal' isango lona lincinyane nje. Mngane, ubodela im'hambo yala', Um' uzongen ezulwini.
2
'Mpela kulukhun' ukugen' ezulwin', Ngob' uSathan' usithiya; Kungengene 'bani othando izon' Engavum' ukuzishiya. Yahlukana nazo namhl' ukuthi nya. Nqum' intambo zon' ezikubopha la. Ngikunxus' impela, lalela-ke, mngan', Vuk' uzishiye izono!
3
Ngeke uvulelwe ungen' ezulwin', Usazifihla izono; Ngek' ufinyelele uphik' uthi-ke: Eyami indlela ingcono. Leyondlela yakho yoshonaphi, Pho? Lyoshona kabi KwaSathane, wo! Ngakho ngikunxusa ngegama le-Nkos', Vuka-ke, Mngan, uphenduke.
4
Bonke bamenyiw' ukungen' ezulwin', Konje-ke wen' uyenqena? Uma sekuvalwa umnyango ngale, Wobungenile-ke wena? Namhla uyabizwa usekhona la, Usuthini kodwa, wosabela na? Nxa usamalela wokhal' uthini wo! Anginandaw' ezulwini!

title: Yizwani, bandla
lyrics:
1
Yizwani-ke, bandla, Ngizovum' igama Ngendaba yothando LoMsindisi wam'; Ngicula ngoJesu Oweza emhlabeni, Owafa emthini, EnguMfeli wam'. Wozani kuJesu! Wozani kuJesu! Wozani kuJesu! Wozanini manje!
2
Yebo-ke, uJesu NguMsindisi wami, UMhlengi omuhle, Nithini-ke na? Uyangisindisa Ezonweni zami, Imihla ngemihla Ngigcinwa-ke la.
3
Namhlanje ngithand' Ukuba nina nonke, Nisheshe nifike, Ningaphuti bo; Yizan' nivume, Yizani nimbonge UMhlengi omuhle, OnguJesu lo.

title: Ngingene na?
lyrics:
1
UJes' usemi namhlanje Ngasenhliz'weni yakho-ke. Ngothando olungakaya Se'buza-ke: Ngingene na? Ngisemi ngingqongqotha, he, Ngingene enhliz'weni le? Uthini wen' odinw' izono. Ngingene na? Ngingene na?
2
Khumbul' ameva lawaya, Ayengihlab' eGolgotha. Ngathwal' icala lakho khona, 'Suthini, pho? Ngingene na?
3
'Nhliziyo yakh' emnyama mbe, Ngoyenza ibe-mhlophe ndwe. Ngokupha ukuthula kwami, Uthini-ke? Ngingene na?

title: Umalusi olungileyo
lyrics:
1
O, Malus' olungileyo, Siholele emthonjeni, Siphuzis' amanzi awo, Usiyis' emadlelweni, O, Malusi! O, Malusi! Uwalus' umhlambi wakho. O, Malusi! O, Malusi! Uwalus' umhlambi wakho.
2
Wasithenga; wasihlenga Endleleni yonke yethu. Sibuyise nxa siduka, Wen' unguMalusi wethu.
3
Usithembisile thina 'Kuthi uyosivikela; Engozini wosigcina, Yebo, uyakusilwela.
4
Sifundise ukufuna Lowombuso ophezulu. Ukulunga nokukholwa Sikufise, he, kakhulu.

title: Yeka inhlanhla
lyrics:
1
Yek' inhlanhla esinayo Nxa sithol' ukubuthana ENkosini, nezwi layo, Namakholwa ethandana. Thula manje, wenhliziyo! Sengifun' ukulalela Izwi leli elimiyo, NgoMsindis' owangifela.
2
Sesibeka ngomthandazo, ENkosini enomusa, Lonk' usizi nenkathazo, Yona iyasiphumuza.
3
La uJesu esitshela Ngal' uthando olukhulu. Wasihlenga, wasifela, Usimela le phezulu.
4
Yizw' amazwi futhi athi; Ngizobuya masinyane; Asisazi isikhathi; Njalo masivuselane.

title: Izihlambi zomusa
lyrics:
1
K'othelw' izihlambi zomusa Phezu kwabakhulekayo. 'Nkosi iyasithembisa Njalo encwadini yayo. 'Zihlambi zomusa Ngaphezu kwabomileyo; Sesiyakufunisisa Esikuthenjisiweyo.
2
K'othelw' izihlambi zomusa, Ngenxa yesakhe isisa. Ozithobay' ekhangeza, Yen' uyakumchichimisa.
3
K'othelw' izihlambi zomusa, Ngaye uMoya oNgcwele; Abafileyo bovuswa, Nab' abasebedangele.
4
K'othelw' izihlambi zomusa, Ngaphezu kwabavumayo Ukukhucuza izono, Konk' okuvimbezelayo.

title: Nguye uJesu
lyrics:
1
Siyamshumayel' uJesu, Yena unguMhlengi wethu; Wasifel' esphambanweni, Wahlawulel' izono zethu. Nguy' uJesu, nguy' uJesu, Yen' ungukulunga kwethu; Wasithenga, wosihlenga, Nguye olitehmba lethu.
2
Siyamshumayel' uJesu, Yen' unguMalusi futhi; Usalusa singaduki, Yebo, siyahub' ukuthi;
3
Siyamshumayel' uJesu, Ophakeme ezulwini; Usimela kuy' uYise, Usophula osizini.
4
Siyamshumayel' uJesu, Uzobuya masinyane' Ukulanda amakholwa. Sizothini-ke, bangane?

title: Nkosi sihlangene
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, manje sihlangene Ukulizwa izwi lakho; Uyamphatha ngobumnene Othobayo phambi kwakho. Olukhuni, umthambise, Nowileyo mawummise, Nowomile umphuzise; Siyacela ngom'sa wakho.
2
Usisize, siqaphele Lokhu ositshela khona. Nkosi, usikhanyisele Endleleni eyiyona. Uyihole inhliziyo Ngom'sa low' ongapheliyo, Naluthando olumiyo, Nkosi, sesicela khona.
3
Kulenkathi yokubizwa, Usisize, silalele; Siyadlula, simukiswa, Sonce siziphendulele. Ngakho konk' ukwenza kwethu, Nawo amathuba ethu. Ithin' impendulo yethu Enkosini eyingcwele?

title: Umalusi omuhle
lyrics:
1
Woza, Malus' omuhle, Walus' izimvu zakho, Uzikhombis' okuhle Emadlelweni akho. Ziyise emthonjeni, Ziphuze emfuleni Amanzi okuphila.
2
Lukhul' uthando Iwakho; Lungangolwandle lona; Wanik' umzimba wakho, Kuhlawulel' ukona. Sigcine othandweni, Sihole endleleni, Sikulandel' eduze.
3
Vul' izindlebe zethu, Silizwe izwi lakho. Vus' inhliziyo yethu, Siland' unyawo Iwakho. Sifune nxa sizula, Usiwelis' umfula, Sifike ezulwini.

title: Sinomalusi
lyrics:
1
SinoMalusi, uyasithanda. Akuyinhlanhla enkulu yini; Wasibuyisa ngokusinqanda, Mhla sadumela ezingozini.
2
SinoMalusi, kumnand' impela. Usiholela emadlelweni, Izimvu zakhe uyazimela, Azinavalo nasekufeni.
3
SinoMalusi, uyazizwela. Izimvu zakhe lapho zikhala, Uxosh' impisi nxa isondela, Namazinyane uyawathwala.
4
SinoMalusi, ogama lakhe, NguJesu Kristu, uMfeli wethu; Wasibekel' ukuphila kwakhe, Ufuna ukusisungubeza.
5
SinoMalusi, usizungeza. Ngomusa nangobubele bakhe. Ufuna ukusilondoloza, Singene esibayeni sakhe.

title: Sesibuthene, Baba
lyrics:
1
Sesibuthene, Baba, Ukuzwa izindaba Zokusihlenga kwakho, Nothand' oluhle Iwakho.
2
Qoq' inhliziyo zethu, Nemicabango yethu. Ukuba silalele Indaba eyiNgcwele.
3
Ngelizwi nezibongo Buxoshwe ubuthongo, Mawusivuselele NgoMoya oyiNgcwele.
4
Nesingenakubona Ukuthi kungukona, Usiqondise kahle, Ukuba sikulahle.
5
Uyithambis' inkani, Nokuba ikubani, Sidel' intando yethu, Nokuzithanda kwethu.
6
Usiph' umqondo wakho Siyenz' intando yakho; Usibonis' indlela, Sikulandel' impela.

title: Yeka uthando
lyrics:
1
'Kenibhek' uthando Iwakhe, Asinike lon' uYise, Sesithiwe abantwana, Futhi usamukelise 'Moya wakhe enhliz'weni. Oysibambiso sethu, Ufakaza emoyeni, Ulikhomba ifa lethu. Yek' umusa! Yek' uthando! Sesingabantwana bakhe. Yek' umusa! Yek uthando! Siyizindlalifa zakhe.
2
'Kenibhek' uthando Iwakhe, Wanikela ngeNdondana, Eyayithandeka kuye, Ezelweyo iyodwana; Yeza yona yasisiza, Yabonis' uthando Iwayo, Yasibekel' ukuphila Esiphambanweni sayo.
3
'Kenibhek' uthando Iwakhe, Ngob' usikhethile futhi Sibe-ngamanxusa akhe, Sibatshele bonk' ukuthi: Okholwayo loluthando Wosindiswa ezonweni; Kodwa odelayo lona, Uyoshona ekufeni.

title: Sesizwile
lyrics:
1
Sesizwile izindaba Zombuso omkhulu, Masidele okomhlaba, Sam'kel okwezulu.
2
Thina sonke simenyiwe Ukuz' edilini, Nengubo siyinikiwe, Ivel' eNkosini.
3
Masingabi namazaba, Sizilandulele, Sam'kele ngokwethaba, Umem' olungcwele.
4
Ngoba uma sesinqaba Ukuz' emthimbeni, Idlule kithi lendaba, Imem' ezizweni.
5
Iyogcwala indlu yakhe, Kuvalwe emnyango. Owudele um'sa wakhe, Uphandle kwesango.
6
Lapho bazokhala, bethi: Nkosi sivulele! Kepha yophendula ithi: Dedani, niye le!'

title: Emva kwenshumayelo
lyrics:
1
Nkosi yethu, sisizwile Izwi lakho elikhulu; Liqondile, lilungile, Noma thina sizithulu.
2
Izwi lakho, Nkosi yethu, Liduduza inhliziyo, Livuthis' uthando Iwethu, Thina esilam'kelayo.
3
Makahlal' uMoya wakho Enhliz'weni zethu zonke. Sifundis' intando yakho Ngezinsuku zethu zonke.
4
Masihlale sithandaze Emakhay' emsebenzini, Simkhumbul' osithandayo, Osimela ezulwini.

title: Sesilapha emanzini
lyrics:
1
Sesilapha emanzini Ukubhapathiza khona Abakholwa eNkosini, Nabalahla konk' ukona. Yiba nathi, Baba wethu, Qoq' izinhliziyo zethu, Vusa ukuqonda kwethu Ngezwi elilonalona.
2
Wena Jes' uqobo Iwakho, Weza khona emfuleni Ukunik' umzimba wakho, Ngokungathi ekufeni; Wawusikhombis' indlela, Lapho wena wazidela; Manje singakulandela, Nkosi, ezinyathelweni.
3
Baba, malivulw' izulu, Asehlel' uMoy' oNgcwele. Lon' uphawu olukhulu, Lusho 'kuthi, usam'kele. Makumbelw ' umunt' omdala, Konk' okwethu kokuqala; Zonk' izono namacala, Nkosi, usithethelele.
4
Usink' amandla, Baba, Ukugcin' im'yalo yakho, Sihlangane nabo laba AbaseBandleni lakho. Masihlale sithandane, Kuhle okwabazalwane Ngokugcina sihlangane Khon' ebukhosini bakho.

title: Umbhapathizo
lyrics:
1
Simi lapha, Nkosi yethu, Emanzini phambi kwakho; Msize ozobhapathiswa, Imkhanyel' indlela yakho.
2
Makambelwe nawe, Jesu, Ngaw' umbhapathizo namhla; Njalo makavuke nawe, Mawumzwis' amany' amandla.
3
Nxa evuma njalo, Nkosi, Phambi kwakho, nal' ibandla. Ngakh' ukufa nokuvuka, Makasizw' esakh' isandla.
4
Abe-nguy' omiyo, Nkosi, Njalo othandweni Iwakho; Nangenkambo yonke yakhe, Kudunyisw' igama lakho!

title: Malusi, butha abakho
lyrics:
1
WeMalusi, buth' abakho NgaseSithebeni sakho; Nguwe onjabulo yabo Abathand' igama lakho. Baluzwis' uthando Iwakho, Bagcwalisw' uMoya wakho, Nangezibusiso zakho. Babusise manje, Nkosi.
2
Nkosi, usihlole njalo, Mawusivivinye sonke, Ingabikho inkohliso Ekwenzeni kwethu konke. Sifafazw' igazi lakho, Thethelela ngom'sa wakho, Usihlanganise sonke, U'ba sib' inhliziyonye.
3
Amagatsha onk' emthini Ayaphuz' amanzi awo; Oyithand' iNkosi njalo, Uyoqina futhi ngawo. Uyisiqu wena, Nkosi, Inhliziy' ayithokozi Uma ingahlali kuwe. Wena olivin' impela.

title: Sesihlangene
lyrics:
1
0, Nkosi, sesihlangene lapha Ukudla eSithebeni sakho, Nokukhumbula uthando Iwakho, Nokufa kwakh' esahlengwa ngakho
2
Sondela, Nkosi, hlangana nathi, Uzidalule wen' oyiMvana Eyahlatshelwa izono zethu, Mawufuthele ukuthandana.
3
Mawubusis' iziphiwo lezi, Isinkwa esisihlephulayo, Nesitsha ses'vumelwan' esisha, Sikukhumbule nxa siphuzayo.
4
Yithina sonke sihlangene, Simzimba munye ngenxa yokuba Sisidl' isinkwa esinguJesu, Odlayo sona kayikubhubha.
5
Sengathi sonke esihlangene ESithebeni, sibe-nhliziyonye, Sibuye futhi sizobuthana', Nasezulwini, sibe-ndawonye.
6
Ngalolosuku uJes' uqobo Uyoziboph' asikhonze thina, Sikhanye nab' abangcwele bonke Lapho-ke mangingaphuthi mina.

title: Nkosi, sifunze!
lyrics:
1
Nkosi, funza wena ubusise Nank' umhlambi omcinyane wakho. Usinik' imana, uqinise Inhliziyo othandweni Iwakho.
2
Ulambile, sewomil' umhlambi, Wena wedwa uyasanelisa. Usithele ngaso isihlambi Som'sa wakho, kuyasidelisa.
3
Singephile ngas' isinkwa sodwa Kepha ngaw' amazwi akho, Baba. Siqiniswa ngawo khona kodwa, Singabamb' indlela ngokwethaba.
4
Yiba khona ekuhlephuleni Lesisinkwa sakho, Nkosi yethu' Futhi sidle naw' esithebeni, Ngomhla sibuthen' ekhaya lethu.

title: Ukuvula indlu yesonto
lyrics:
1
Sibuthene namhla, Baba, Ukuvula indlu yakho; Siyabonga, siyethaba Nxa sisebusweni bakho. Wena onamandla onke, Ungumthomb' womusa wonke. Mawusibusise sonke, Silalele izwi lakho.
2
Jesu, Nkosi, siyacela, Yiba nathi lapha njalo; Ngoba wena wasifela, Lokho kuphelis' uvalo. Siqinise othandweni, Sivuthise emoyeni Ngezwi lakho embhalweni, Mawusilungise njalo.
3
Nkosi, onguMoy' oNgcwele, Wena onguMsizi wethu, Siza, usichasisele Konke ukudinga kwethu. Sibhekise eNkosini Yon' eyasifel' emthini, Esimela ezulwini, Yona elithemba lethu.
4
Lendlu siyakhele yona, Simakade, Thixo 'mkhulu, U'ba udunyiswe khona, Sikuqonde okwezulu. Libusise izwi lakho, Nazo izithunywa zakho, Nabo bonke' abantu bakho, Ngobusiso olukhulu!

title: Funda iBhayibheli
lyrics:
1
Fund' iBhayibheli - igug' elikhulu Lisikhombisa umthomb' wokuphila, Lisitshengisa indlela yezulu, Lapho-ke kuyakuphel' ukulila. Fund' iBhayibheli, fund' iBhayibheli, Liyisibani nomholi omuhle.
2
Fund' iBhayibheli uyoba-nomongo, Gcina amazwi nem'yalelo yalo. Lisangulis' abahlushw' ubuthongo, Lisiphephis' ekufeni kanjalo.
3
Fund' iBhayibheli nxa udabukile, Liyamduduza ohamb' osizini. Ungalideli, nom' uthokozile, Lithandisis' uliphath' ekhukhwini.
4
Fund' iBhayibheli nalapho ugula, Lokukhombis' uDo'thela omuhle; Lisus' uvalo, linik' ukuthula, Lisifundis' ukuhamba okuhle.
5
Lingumluleki kuyen' osemusha, Li'nkanyiselo endleleni yethu; Nakwabadala libuyis' ubusha, Nasekufeni ludondolo Iwethu.
6
Fund' iBhayibheli imihla ngemihla; Ngob' umphefuml' ungesuth' okomhlaba, Kodwa nelizwi leNkosi wolidla, Khon' uzochuma ube-nokwethaba.

title: IBhayibheli, yeka imfuyo
lyrics:
1
iBhayibheli lami, yek' imfuyo! Liyadlul' okunye konke; Lineziqondiso nemiyalo, Longihol' indela yonke. iBhayibheli - masifunde lona. Siliphiw' uBaba wethu; Likhanyis' inkambo yethu yonke; Malibe igugu lethu.
2
IBhayibheli lisithokozisa Mhla sehlelwa izinsizi; Lisitshela ngay' uJesu Kristu, OnguMhlobo noMsindisi.
3
IBhayibheli li'sikhali sethu Sokunqob' izitha zonke. Liyachitha impi kaSathane, Namacebo akhe onke.
4
IBhayibheli liyiMana futhi, Londla umphefum'lo njalo; Nxa sidinwa endleleni yethu, Siyathol' amandla ngalo.

title: iBhayibheli lami
lyrics:
1
Njengekwezi likhanya ekuseni, Njengelanga iBhayibheli lami. Likhanyisa, lihola elndleleni, Ngisheshise ukufik' ekhaya lami. Bhayibheli lami, Bhayibheli lihle! 'Sipho sikaThixo, isibani sami, Ngiyonamathel' eBhayibhelini, Ngisakhawuleza endleleni yami.
2
Li' nkanyezi ehlane lalomhlaba, Li'sibani kohambayo ngalo; Lisenyusa emzini wokwethaba, Njengelanga ekukhuphukeni kwalo.
3
Liyilizwi loMhlob' onami njalo Osizini nasenhluphekweni; Mhla ngisekufen' anginavalo, Wongihola, angiyis' ekugcineni.
4
Liyakuma likhanye iBhayibheli, Mhla izulu nomhlaba kuyodlula, Lizofakazela izwi leli; Nguy' uJesu ungukuphila nokuthula.

title: Ezinyaweni zakhe
lyrics:
1
Usasiphilisa ngezwi lakhe, Liyasifundisa ngomkwempela. Sesihlal' ezinyaweni zakhe, SinjengoMariya elalela.
2
Lesabelo singephucwe sona, Usho njal' uJesu, 'Mhlobo wethu; Nom' umhlab uzamazama wona, Izwi lakhe liyingaba yethu.
3
Liyasikhanyisa izwi lakhe, Liqinisa amathambo futhi; Siboniswa ngalo um'sa wakhe, Emehlweni ethu lingumuthi.
4
Yebo, Nkosi, vul' amehlo ethu, Siwubon' umangaliso wakho. Yehla, uze la phakathi kwethu, Usithinte ngaw' amandla akho.

title: Emthimbeni
lyrics:
1
Emthimbeni waseKhana Bemmemil' uJesu futhi Kanye nabafundi bakhe Nang' unin' ebik' ukuthi; Nant' iwayini liphelile! Yebo, kuyaphel' okwethu; Ngakho sikumema, Jesu, Ube-yinjabulo yethu.
2
Sibuthene lapha namhla, Abomthimba nabayeni. Nang' umyeni nomakoti, Babusis' emphefum'Iweni. Ubanik' uthando Iwakho, Ngob' olwabo luyaphela, Bangehlalisane kahle, Njengomyalo ubatshela.
3
Ubuhlanganise, Nkosi, Ubenze babe-nyamanye, Bathandane, basizane Kukho konke kanye kanye. Khona-ke ikhaya labo Lob' inqaba yokuthula, Libiyelwe ngal' uthando, Lapho bayakuphumula.

title: Ngiyadlula
lyrics:
1
Nginguye odlulayo la; Indlela emhlabeni, Nokuba inhle, noma qha. Iqonda ekufeni; Ngingekuvimbe la Ukufa kwami, qha; Nokuba ngibhekaphi-ke, Ngiqonda ekufeni.
2
Omethembay' uJesu la. Uya ezulwini. Noma ephila , noma qha. Nokuba kungathini; Akakwesabi la Ukuf' uqobo, qha. Ohamba nay' uJesu la. Uyaya ezulwini.

title: Uyadlula
lyrics:
1
Uyadlula ngokushesha; Konje ubangephi na? Uyayaz' indlela lena Osahamba ngayo na? Uyadlula, uyadlula, Uya ezulwini na?
2
Uyadlula ngokushesha; Lingemisw' ilanga, qha, Liyaphuma, liyashona, Awuyikushona na? Uyadlula, uyadlula, Awanakuhlala la.
3
Uyadlula ngokushesha; Uyadlulelaphi na? Ezulwini ungengene, Ungaphendukanga, qha. Uyadlula, uyadlula. Wophenduka nini na?
4
Uyadlula ngokushesha; Kusondel' ukufa, ha! Akumang' ungenathuna. Uyophepha wena na? Uyadlula, uyadlula, Akukheth' ukufa, gha.

title: Siyadlula
lyrics:
1
Ukuphila kwethu lapha, Njengenkungu kuyaphapha, Kuyadlula, kusobala Kub' abasha nabadala.
2
Masinyane siyakhula, Ngokunjalo siyadlula; Njengekhowe liyamila, Kufushane ukuphila.
3
Siyafana naw' amanzi, Won' ashona ngasenzansi; Akank' ukukhuphuka, Njalo nathi siyenyuka.
4
Nezinyanga zihluleka, 'Kuzelapha kunqabeka, Nab' odokotela futhi Bafa bawushiy' umuthi.
5
Pho-ke, singasizwa yini, Singashoni ebubini, Mhla simuka emhlabeni, Samukelw' ekuphileni?
6
Isu linye elimiyo, Zinikele ngenhliziyo KuMsindis' owakufela, Yena uyokwamukela.

title: Nina enisebasha
lyrics:
1
Nin' abash' eniqondayo Ekulahlekeni kwenu, Nikhohliswa njal' ukona, Imbi leyondlela yenu. Aniboni yini nina, 'Kuthi niya ekufeni? Mbhala, nina nizogcina Ngokulahlw' ebumnyameni? Manimfune uSomandla, Esenokutholakala; Nxa nimuzwa engqongqotha, Ningaval' umnyango mbala?
2
Nin' abash' enidlalayo, Khumbulani kodw' ukuthi, Lokhu akuhlwanyelayo 'Muntu uyovuna futhi. Izimvalo nen'yembezi Zolandela imidlalo, Cing', imbali inameva, Azohlaba wena njalo.
3
Nin' abasha ningachithi Isikhathi sen' esihle, Nisiphiwe son' iNkosi, Nant' ithuba len' elihle. Nxa nifuna ukuphila Nokujaja, yizwanini, Yikhethen' iNkosi namhla! Nin' abasha senithini?

title: Ezinsukwini zobusha
lyrics:
1
Ngezinsuk' ezimnandi zobusha, Ngimfumen' oligug' elikhulu; KunguJesu, ongisindisayo. Unginik' injabulo yezulu.
2
Ngangifuna nje ukuphumula, Inhliziyo ide iyaluza; Ngangikhohlwa loMhlobo owathi: Woza kimi, ngiyakuphumuza.
3
Njengenyoni engansidleke, Ngangizula ngindind' emhlabeni, Nans' indawo, sengiyifumene Emthunzini wases'phambanweni.
4
Inhliziyo yila ifumana Ubumandi bothando nomusa. Nawe, mngane, uJes' usabiza; Woza kimi, ngiyokuphumuza.

title: Ebusheni bami
lyrics:
1
Yek' ubuhle bokukholwa NguMsindisi wam'. La bungakadlul' Ubusha bami; Ngisemusha, ithambile Inhliziyo yam', Iyamthanda yen' uMhlobo wami. Yek' ubuhle bokumazi Ebusheni bam', Ukumthand' uJesu, UMsindisi; Nxa ngimdala kudlulile Konk' okuhle kwam'. Umi nami enguMthokozisi.
2
Yek' ubuhle bokumkhonza Ebusheni bam'. Ukumsebenzel' uNkulunkulu; Akadeli nokumkhonza Okuncane kwam'. Kepha wonginik' Umvuz' omkhulu.
3
Yek' ubuhl' ukumlalela Ebusheni bam'. Ubudala bungakangehleli; Angiyikushayw' uvalo Enhliz'weni yam', Ngiyamthemb' uJesu, UnguMeli.
4
Yek' ubuhle bokumbheka Ebusheni bam'; Nxa ebuya, Uyakungam'kela. 'Inyembezi wozisula Emehlweni am'. Wonginika konk' okuhl' impela.

title: Uyangithanda
lyrics:
1
Ungithand' uJesu wam', Kusho iBhayibheli lam'; Wabagona kahle-ke Abalethwa kuye, he! UMsindisi wam' Uyangithanda, Uyangithanda, Uyangithanda nam'.
2
Ungithand' uJesu nam', Owathwal' izono zam', 'Kuze zipheliswe dwa, Ngibe-mhlophe ngithi qhwa!
3
Ungithand' uJesu nam', Yena unguMhlengi wam'; Nxa ngimthanda khona la, Ngoba naye laphaya.
4
Ungithand' uJesu nam', 'Khaya lakhe lingelam'; Futhi masinyane nje, Wongilanda ngiye le.

title: Ngiyothemba muphi
lyrics:
1
Intombazan' ethile Ilele embhedeni. 'Bazali babekhala, Ngob' isisekufeni. Bebon' izobashiya, Ibizw' uMdali wayo, Simbelwe ethuneni 'Sidumb' esihle sayo.
2
Uyise walomntwana Wamphik' uNkulunkulu Edela um'sa wakhe, Nekhaya lephezulu. Unina wayekholwa KuJes', uMhlengi wakhe, Wab' eyifundisile Lentombazana yakhe.
3
Ngoluny' usuk' uyise Ehlezi yedwa nayo, Yazam ukukhuluma', Lincane izwi layo. Yathi: Sengonishiya, Uyaf' umzimba wami, Kepha-ke woyangaphi Umphefumulo wami?
4
Niyangingabazisa, Ngiyakukholw' ikuphi? Niyaphambana nina, Ngiyakwethemba muphi? Umam' ungitshelile Ngekhaya lephezulu, Ubab' uphika izwi NgelikaNkulunkulu.
5
Wayesekhal' uyise, Ngosizi eyitshela: Wokholw' akush' unyoko, Uqinisile yena. Khona intombazana Yathol' ukujabula Ethemba kuy' uJesu, Yayisiwel' umfula.
6
Wayefuman' uyise, Noma esenosizi, Umusa nokuthula KuJesu uMsindisi. Wabona konk' okunye Kuyinkohliso yodwa. Ilizwi elimiyo NgelikaJesu lodwa.

title: Niyabizwa
lyrics:
1
Nang' uMsindisi uyanibiza, Nina bantwana wonibusisa; Nguye othanda ukunisiza, Uthi: Zanini kimi!Yek' inhlanhla, yek' umusa bo! Siyabizwa, singanqaba, pho! Sesisondela kuMsindisi lo, Osibizele kuye.
2
Bon' abezayo bayosindiswa, Bayolungiswa, bayofundiswa, Bayakugcinwa, bojabuliswa, Bonk' abezayo kuye.
3
Yeka umemo, luhle kakhulu, Niyakuthol' umbuso wezulu, Olungisiwe nguNkulunkulu. Nize kuJesu manje!

title: Sitholile uMhlobo
lyrics:
1
Sitholil' uMhlob' omkhulu, Owavela ngaphezulu, Uyalaz' igama lakhe yini na? Lingu Jesu, mninimusa; Washo kub' ababekuza: Ningabanqabel' ukuza kimi, Qha! 'Mbus', wezul' owabantwana. Nant' iculu, lihle, hle! Ngingamshiy' uJesu na? Ngiyokhonz' ukona, qha! Ngiyathanda lowombus' omuhle le.
2
Abantwana wabaphatha, Ebathand' ebasingatha, Iph' iNkosi enomus' ongaka na? Wababek' izandla zakhe, Ebabel' umusa wakhe, Kadelanga ubungane babo, qha!
3
UMalusi weth' omuhle, Uyasipha konk' okuhle, Nani anithand' ukuza kuye na? Yena wobagcin' abakhe, Wobaphath' uqobo Iwakhe, Bangebhubhe abaphathwa nguye, Qha!

title: Bayajaja
lyrics:
1
Bayajaja abantwanyana Abamthanday' uJesu oyiMvana; Bayesaba ukuxabana, Behlalisana ngokumnandi nje.
2
Babusiswa labobantwana, Abamfunay' uJesu, bemfumana, Abahlala ngokuthandana, Imhlophe inhliziyo ithi qhwa.
3
Nay' uJesu wayengumntwana, Waphan' uThixo ngayo iNdodana; Ukub' asuse ukuzondana, Ngokusifela kwakh' eGolgotha.
4
Uzithwala izimvanyana, Zingakhathali, zingabi-kudana. Ngom'sa wakhe zizohlangana Nomhlambi wakh' omkhulu khona le.

title: Yizwanini
lyrics:
1
Yizwanini, emkhathini Kuzwakele ukucula! Bayaqhuba ukuhuba, 'Kudumisa okomfula. Vumanini, 'Gam' elihle eNkosini! Vumanini, 'Gam' elihle eNkosini! Ho, ho! Igam' elihle! Vumanini!
2
Bantwanyana, nohlangana, Ukubong' Nkosi yethu! Ningathuli, ningaphuli, Nilichith' ikhwaya lethu.
3
Ukucula kuyasula 'Zinyembezi kwabaningi; Kuyamphasa, osakhasa, Esawiswa nguy' umlingi.
4
Masinyane sohlangana Nal' ibandla laphezulu. Kuzogcwala, kothalala Ukubong' uNkulunkulu.

title: Mayibongwe iMvana
lyrics:
1
Niyamthand' uJesu yini? He, bantwana, senithini? Nizokuya ezulwini Ukumbon' uJesu na? ABANTWANA: Yebo, siyamthand' uJesu, Wasifel' emthin' uJesu; UnguMhlobo weth' uJesu, Uyasihlalela le. KANYEKANYE: Mayibongwe yon' iMvana, Mayibongwe yon' iMvana, Mayibongwe yon' iMvana, Yon' eyasihlenga, he! UTHISHA:
2
Wayevum' ukusifela, Manje usihlengezela, Yebo, yena uyindlela Esiyis' ekhaya le. ABANTWANA: Yebo, unguMholi wethu, Uqondis' inyawo zethu. Sizobon' ikhaya lethu, Ngobubele bakhe, he! UTHISHA:
3
Masizam' ukumdumisa Yena owasisindisa, Sisizane 'kubabiza, Abaningi beze, he! ABANTWANA: Yebo, sizohlabelela NgoMsindis' owasifela. Sithi, sizomfakazela Simdumis' uJesu, he!

title: Isontaskole
lyrics:
1
Ngithand' iSontaskole, Kula ngifunda khona NgoMhlobo wabantwana Ukuthi wabagona. Ngithand' ukusondela, Ngiluzw' uthando Iwakhe. Sengathi angiphathe Nxa ebusis' abakhe.
2
Ngithand' iSontaskole, Kula ngicula futhi Ngomusa woMsindisi, Nami-ke ngingaphuthi. Ngimbong' uJesu nami, Owangihlawulela Ngegaz' eliyigugu, Lapho-ke wangifela.
3
Ngithand' iSontaskole, Ngifund' ukulalela Nxa abazali bami, Besuka bengitshela. Ngithand' ukuthembeka, Ngibe-ngumntwan' omuhle. Baqonde bonk' ukuthi, Ngifundisiw' okuhle.
4
Ngithand' iSontaskole, Nabafundisa khona; Sengathi ngingahamba, Ngibalandele bona; Siye ekhay' elihle Phezulu eNkosini; La' sizoncinca njalo, Sibuse ebomini.

title: Sibheka ezulwini
lyrics:
1
Ngihlanganisa izandla zam', Ngibheka ngasezulwini, KuThixo, 'Mdali, İNkosi yam', Okhona ebukhosini.
2
Kumnandi ukukubonga la, Nomoya wami uvuma, Ngiyazi uyakuqonda dwa, Uyezwa nxa sikhuluma.
3
Ngiyisithombo 'sincane nci, Ositshalil' emhlabeni; Ngilondoloze ngomusa, swi, Ngikhule ekulungeni.
4
Ngakho-ke, Baba, ngiphathe-ke Ngesandla sakho somusa, Ngilungiselwe izulu le, Lapho kukhon' ukubusa.

title: Umuzi wami
lyrics:
1
Enmiziyweni yami, Ngilangazela le, 'Jerusalem' umuzi wam' La zinhlupheko zami Ziyakuphela, nya. Enhliziyweni yami Ngilangazela lo.
2
Kuwona lowomuzi, Kakh' olilayo, qha! Emzini le, kukuhle hle, UJesu unguMbusi, Esasimkhonza la, Kuwona lowomuzi, Kakh' olilayo, qha.
3
Indlela yona kodwa, Ngoyitholaphi na? Yokuya pho, emzini lo? Sekubumnyama bodwa, Nxa ngibhekaphi la. Indlela yona, kodwa, Ngoyitholaphi na?
4
UJes' ukhomb' indlela Yokuya laphaya. Nguyena-ke, o'ndlela le, Engingayilandela, Ngisinde ngayo la. UJes' ukhomb' indlela Yokuya laphaya.

title: Ngizobona ubuso bakhe
lyrics:
1
Ngizobon' ubuso bakhe, Nxa ngifika khona le; Amanxeb' amev' anawo, Nokh' ubuso buhle hle. Ngizombon' uqobo Iwakhe, Mhla bembonga ebomin' Bethi: E, bayethe, Nkosi! Yek' udumo ezulwini'.
2
Kusengathi ngiyambona, Mhla bemfel' amathe le; Yayihlekw' usule 'Nkosi, 'Mqhele way' ameva nje.
3
Ngizobon' izandla zakhe, Mhla ngifika ezulwin', Zon' ezazingenacala, Nokho zabethelw' emthini'.
4
Yeka, zinhle nezinyawo, Mangizange zona nam'. Mazigezwe yimi futhi, Ngisho nge'nyembezi zam'

title: iJerusalema elisha
lyrics:
1
Nxa siged' ibanga lethu, Lokuhamba lapha-ke, Nezinsizi nehlupheko Kuphelile, Sohlangana nabangcwele Abasandulele le, EJerusalem' elisha. Kuzohlatshelelwa khona nxa 'Bangcwele sebe le, EJerusalema, eJerusalem'. Bayohalalisa bethi: Madunyisw' iMvana he! EJerusalem' elisha.
2
Nom' indlel' inenkathazo, Uhluphek' umoya wam', Ngizolondoloz' isandla SoMsindisi. Ngijabula ngimethembe, Aqondis' indlela yam'. EJerusalem' elisha.
3
Nxa kuvaleliswa lapha, Usuhamb' umoya wam', Ne'nyembezi nokukhala Kungasekho, Ngiyombona yen' uqobo, Osusil' izono zam', EJerusalem' elisha.
4
Nabakade besempini, Benqobile ngay' iNkos', Sobonana nabo, NoMsindisi wethu, Siyohuba sithokoze Kanye naz' izingelos', EJerusalem' elisha.

title: Lihle ikhaya lami
lyrics:
1
Alikho emhlabeni Ikhaya lami, qha. Nginguye ohambayo Ngizulazula la. Ikhaya lami nanto, Lisezulwini, ha! Alikho la elinje nalodwa. Khaya lam', lihle hle! Muzi wam', muhle-ke! Ikhona sizohuba sithi: Haleluya! Bheka le, buso bam'! Yizwa-ke, ndlebe yam'! Ikhaya lami nanto phezulu.
2
Kungabayini manje Ezongibamba la? Ngifuna inhliziyo Emhlophe ithe pha; Ngokuba kungengene Ekhaya leliya Into engcolileyo nayodwa.
3
Mhla sobasingenile, Sibon' umuzi le, Nay' uMsindisi wethu Nobuhle buthe hle, Sokhipha nant' igama Ngokumangala, he: Angitshelwanga noma inxenye.
4
Sengiyacela, Nkosi, U'ba ngiphiwe-ke Lamandl' engiwadinga U'ba ngifike le, Ngokuba izilingo Zingihaqile, he, Ngiyohluleka uma ngingedwa.

title: Siyeza Isikhathi
lyrics:
1
Siyeza isikhathi leso, Nxa sizothol' ukuphumula, Sihlale le eParadisi, Lapho sizojabula. Masinyan' sesile, Yek' ukujabula he! Masinyan' sesile, Yek' ukujabula he!
2
Sinokwethemba okumiyo, Okusekelwa nguMsindisi. Sinefa elingapheliyo; UJesu 'kajabhisi.
3
Sihamaba kanyekanye sonke, Siholwa nguMsindisi wethu. Osinqobel' izitha zonke, Zisendleleni yethu.
4
Uma sinzim' isiphambano, Nomthwalo sithi usahlula. Kuyakuphela masinyane, Sothol' ukuphumula.

title: Ngizomazi uJesu
lyrics:
1
Mhla ngiged' umsebenzi Ngiwelele khona le, Kungasekho inhlupheko eya la. Ngizombona uJesu nobukhosi, Buthe hle, Nabo bonke abangcwele laphaya. Ngizomazi unguJesu, Nxa ngimbona ekhanya, ethi nge! Ngizomazi unguJesu, Ngamanxeb' ezandleni zakhe, he!
2
Yek' inhlanhla engaka Yokwaziw' nguJesu wam', La ekhona ukungamukela-ke. Ngizobon' amanxeba, Walinyazwa ngenxa yam' Sengindwebelela ukumbona le.
3
Ngizobon' abangcwele Abangadulele le, Bangiqhweba, bangibheka Khona nam'. Ikhakhulu impela ngiyalangazela-ke, Ukumbon' uJes OnguMsindisi wam'.

title: Ikhaya elihle
lyrics:
1
Yek' ikhaya elihle nantiya! Silibona ngamehl' enhliziyo. Masinyane siyakulishiya Izwe elingajabulisiyo. Khaya lam', lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale! Khaya lam', lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale!
2
Sizombona uJesu phezulu, Nabalwile, benqobe ukona, Basilangazelela kakhulu. Ngokukholwa sesiyababona.
3
Bonke abanethemb' elinjalo, Bayazihlambulula impela; Bayalahla izono nem'thwalo, Nakho konk' okubabambezela.
4
NgoMsindisi owasifelayo, Singagena ekhaya phezulu, Thina sonke esimlandelayo, Siyothol' intokozo enkulu.

title: Siyakuma eNkosini
lyrics:
1
Siyakuma eNkosini, Soyibona ezulwini, Masinyane, masinyane! Ngaphesheya khona le, Sodumis' İNkosi-ke, Masinyane, masinyane! Siyakuma eNkosini, Soyibona ezulwini, Siyibonge ebomini, Haleluya, Haleluya! Siyakuma eNkosini.
2
He, bakithi, yizwanini, Sobakhona eNkosini, Masinyane, masinyane! 'Zinhlupheko, lezi-ke Zoba ziphelile le, Masinyane, masinyane!
3
Vuka, mphefumulo wami, Uyakuma eNkosini, Masinyane, masinyane! Uyikhung' iNkosi-ke, Uyofana nayo le, Masinyane, masinyane!

title: Obani labo
lyrics:
1
Obani labo abambeth' ingubo, 'Zimhlophe qwa, behub' amahubo? Yek', ubuhle bemi kubo! Behlanzw' igazi leMvana. Ngenjabul' enkulu bongena esangweni, Bayodumisa oyiMvana, Ngenjabul' enkulu bongena esangweni, Behlanzw' igazi leMvana.
2
Yibona labo besesebusheni Bemkhonz' uJesu bevuth' emoyeni Noma beyisw' ekufeni, Bethemb' igazi leMvana.
3
Yibona labo nxa besosizini, Bathol' amandla njalo eNkosini; Babenqoba la empini Ngalo igazi leMvana.
4
Yibona labo ababezingelwa, Ngenxa kaJesu babezindlekelwa, Konke kwakuthokozelwa, Ngalo igazi leMvana.
5
Nampo behlezi kahle ezulwini Sebaneliswa khona ebomini, Bathokoza eNkosini, Bebong' uJesu, iMvana

title: Ngaphesheya
lyrics:
1
Ngom'sa wakh' omkhulu, uyosiholela Embuswen' wezulu, ngaphesheya; Nom' indlela yakhe idin' umntanakhe, ly' ehaya lakhe, ngaphesheya. Ngaphesheya, ngaphesheya, Siyakuphumula, siyakujabula, Ngaphesheya, ngaphesheya, Nxa sifik' ezweni ngaphesheya.
2
Nom' usiholela nasehlan' elibi, Wosiphumisela ngaphesheya. 'Mlilo ukhanyisa, nefu lisithisa, Konke kusiyisa ngaphesheya.
3
'Nkosi yamakhosi iyosiholela, Kwelivam' inyosi, ngaphesheya. Siyokudl' emthini, siphuz' emanzini, Sohub' eNkosini, ngaphesheya.
4
Sesithemba, sithi: Uyosiholela, Size kwelakithi, ngaphesheya; 'Jesu wosophula mhla sowel' umfula, Khona sizocula, ngaphesheya.

title: Kuyintando yeNkosi
lyrics:
1
Kuyintando yeNkosi kusinde isoni, Esikholwa uJesu noma singamboni. Haleluya, kwenziwe! Ngikholw' iNdondana; Ngisinde ngegazi, 'Lothiwa iMvana.
2
Nom' indlel' ingumgcingo, zikhona nengozi, Pho, uJesu angeze asilondoloze?
3
Babaning' abathandwa asebe phezulu, Benamile, bahlezi neNkosi ye zulu.
4
Nabancane ngibona eduze neNkosi Ibabheka ngothando, benezingelosi.
5
Nabezizwe bakhona, basinde ngeMvana, Abasoze bajabhe, kukhon' ukuzwana.
6
Nawe, nami sohuba sihlangene nabo, Ngoba nathi sahlengwa ngoMsindis wabo.

title: Ukulangazelela izulu
lyrics:
1
Ngililangazel' izulu, Nobukhosi obukhulu, Buthenjisw' nguNkulunkulu Kub' abakhe.
2
Yek' usuku nxa ngiyoma Lapho eJerusalema. Sizwe izwi lisimema: Ngenanini!
3
Izihambii zophumula Zisemzini wokuthula. Kodumisa okomfula: Haleluya!
4
Khon' uJes onkazimulo, Ukukhanya nenjabulo, Ngomdumisa ngamaculo Ngabangcwele.

title: Ngingumfokazi
lyrics:
1
Ngingumfokazi laph' emhlabeni, Ngifun' izulu, ikhaya lam', Nom' inkathazo isendleleni, Ngophumelela ngoJesu wami': Useceleni eduze nami, Ebheka njal' ukuhamba kwam', Uzongisiza nasekufeni, Angingenise ekhaya lam'.
2
Noma ngigqok' amanikiniki, Ikhon' ingubo emhlophe qhwa. Icolekile ngizoyembatha, Mhla ngiqedile ibanga la. Nxa nginosizi nezinkathazo, Ngihlekw' usulu, ngidelwa nje, Kolunga konke nxa ngingenile Ekhaya lami elihle hle.
3
Noma ngithwele isiphambano, Sinzima sona, ngisindwa la; Ngizowuthola umqhele lapho, Okokuphila Haleluya! Ngimbone yena ongithandayo, Ngihlale naye uMfeli wam'. Ngihube khona igam' elisha Lokudumisa İNkosi yam'.

title: Nxa ebizwa amagam
lyrics:
1
Nxa ebizwa amagama elizweni laphaya Ekuseni okungayikuhlwa, qha; Baphelele abeNkosi khona lapho ekhaya. Ngothi: Yebo, Nkosi, nangu mina la. Nxa ebizwa amagama, Nxa ebizwa amagama, Nxa ebizwa amagama, Elizwen' elikhanyayo laphaya.
2
Ngalo lona lolusuku bevukile abeNkosi, Behlotshiswe ubukhosi bayo le; Sebebuthwa abakhethwa bengeniswa ekhaya. Ngothi: Yebo, Nkosi, nangu mina la.
3
E, mawushe umsebenzi yonk' imihla ngise la, Mangishumayele zona ezeNkos'! Khona kothi nxa ngiqede, sengilizw' igama lam' Ngothi: Yebo, Nkosi, nangu mina la

title: Kuyadlula isikhathi
lyrics:
1
Kuyadlula isikhathi, Bayadlula nabakithi, Nani, nami, siyashesha, Siya elibeni.
2
Siyashesha, mina, nani, Ukuqonda elibeni, Kuseduze ukushona Kwethu thina sonke.
3
Nibhekis' umoya wenu Kuye lo owanenzayo. Manimfune, nisindiswe, Laph' uJes' ekona.
4
0, Msindis wethu, Jesu, Ongumbumbi wakho konke, Uzusikhumbuze manje Into esiyiyo.
5
Sikhumbul' imvelo yethu, Nokuqonda kwethu lapho Kulelozwe lamathunzi Esingalaziyo.
6
Kobakhona ukuncinca Nokumnandi kwaphakade. Khathi simbe ukukhala Okungapheliyo.

title: Lalelani izwi
lyrics:
1
Lalelani, nant' ilizwi, Izwi loMsindisi wethu: Bheka, ngiza masinyane, Ngiza nokuvuza kwami.
2
Izelan' İNkosi, yethu? Iza ukwam'kel' abayo, Babenayo laph' ikhona, Babon' ubukhosi bayo.
3
Bayomiswa phambi kwayo, Bazilande bonke kuyo Ngawo onk' amazwi abo, Nem'sebenzi yabo futhi.
4
Obehamba ngenhliziyo Ephelele eNkosini, Om'sebenzi wakhe umi, Uyobongw' iNkos' avuzwe.
5
Keph' obengahambi kahle, Engahlali eNkosini, Uyolahlekelw' umvuzo, Ahlupheke njalonjalo.
6
Nkosi, siza ngom'sa wakho Sikubheke, sithandaze, Sihambis' okwakho njalo, Sikubone ngokwethaba.

title: Ngiyisihambi
lyrics:
1
Ngiyisihambi la emhlabeni, Ngiyadlula, ngiy' ekhaya lami le. Makungabikh' okungithiyayo; Ngiqond' ezweni elikhanyayo. Ngiyisihambi laph' emhlabeni, Ngiyadlula, ngiy' ekhaya lami le.
2
Ngiyasinga lelozw' elihle, Laph' ilanga lingayikushona qha. La kulelizwe zigcwel' ingozi, Ngakho-ke mawungiphathe, Nkosi.
3
Kulomhlaba kayikh' indawo, La ngihlala isipholi khona, qha. Kepha ekhaya, ngale kwengcwaba, Bembuk' uJesu, benokwethaba.
4
O, Malusi ngicela lokho, Ungigcine, ngiye nawe laphaya; Ngize ngibuke ubuso bakho, Ngigonwe nguwe ngem'khono yakho.

title: Sobonana na?
lyrics:
1
Yek' okuhl' ekhaya! Abahle he! Nampaya, Bahlez' ekubuseni Naz' izingelosi; Baqedil' ibanga labo, Luphelil' usizi Iwabo, Sebethokoza njalo Beyibong' İNkosi.
2
Yek' okuhl' ekhaya! 'MaKristu alaphaya. Sengathi ngibe-nawo Kubo ubukhosi. Lolosuku luzofika, Icilongo liyobika; Ngenanini, zihlobo, Noqhelisw' iNkosi.
3
Yek' okuhl' ekhaya! Naso-ke isibaya. Zophumula kahl' izimvu Azisenangozi. Ayingen' impisi khona, Abanay' indlala bona, Sebanelisw' impela, Beyibong' iNkosi.
4
Yek' okuhl' ekhaya! Azisayikushaya Ziphepho zokulingwa, Nokuhlab udosi. Buphelile ubuhlungu, Asisekho nesizungu Behlezi izipholi Beyibong' iNkosi.

title: Izwe elihle
lyrics:
1
Ngiyalazi izwe le, Ngililangazela, he! Yebo, linekhaya lam' Khona kuMsindisi wam'. Khaya lam'! Lisezulwini lona. Khaya lam'! Ngiyophumula khona Khaya lam'! Sengililangazela; Lapho ngombona uMhlengi wam'.
2
Ngizibuza khona la, Ngiyofika mbala na? Ngilibon' ikhaya lam' Ngiwuthol' umqhele wam'?
3
Ngogqokiwa khona na, Ngezingubo 'mhlophe qhwa? Ngizohlabelela nam', Ngidumis' İNkosi yam'?
4
Yebo, ngawo um'sa nje, Ngithenjiswe khona-ke; Zihlanziw' izono zam' Ngay' uJes', uMfeli wam'.
5
Lapho ngikhululwe nya Kuzo zonk' insizi, ha! Ngoyibon' im'hlobo yam' Khona le, ekhaya lam'.
6
Akumangalelwa, qha, Uma ngidinwe la; Ngilifun' ikhaya lam', Ngiphumule kulo nam'.

title: Masokhele izimbhaqa
lyrics:
1
Iyofik' İNkosi yethu, Icilongo liyobethwa, Bonk' abantu boyibona, Namakholwa azokhethwa. Masokhele izimbhaqa, Sihlalel' İNkosi njalo! Luhpelel' uthando Iwethu, Lona luyaxosh' uvalo.
2
Ulungele, ngiyabuza, Ukumhlangabez' umyeni? Uyamkhonz, uyamthanda Ngokuvutha emoyeni?
3
Wena othi ulikholwa, Mbhal' uzelw' uMoya yini? Ufundile, ugqokile, Kungesize muntu ndini.
4
Ohlalel' İNkosi yakhe, Unenhlanhla ngokwempela; Iyakumqhelis' İNkosi, Yebo, iyakumklomela.
5
Nkosi, ungigcine njalo, Ngikulinde mhla ubuya, Ungam'kele ezulwini, Khona ngosho: Haleluya!

title: Bhekani phezulu
lyrics:
1
Jabula-ke, wena mhlambi omncinyane, Umkhiwane nank' usuyahluma; Uyabik' ihlobo, seliseduzane, AmaKristu ayavuma: Bhekanini, bhekanini, Bhekanini ngaphezulu, ezulwin'! Ngobukhosi obukhulu!
2
Abaningi bathi: Nkos' iyalibala.Bayamhlek' umuntu onenkolo; Bayaphuza, badla, bakha, bayendiswa, Njengosuku lozamcolo.
3
Nangokuziqhenya basho njengoFaro: Bani 'Nkosi esoyilalela?Bangahleka baleyise izwi layo, Bokhuleka mhla evela.
4
Zizohlukanisw' izimvu nezimbuzi Mhla İNkosi iz' ukusilanda, Bhekanini, umkhiwan' usuyahluma, Phakamisan' amakhanda!

title: Busa Nkosi emhlabeni
lyrics:
1
Bhekanini, nang' uJesu! Uzovela ezulwin'. Zonk' izizwe zohlulelwa, Uzobusa emhlaben'. Woza, Nkosi Jesu! Woza, Nkosi Jesu! Busa, Nkosi, emhlaben'! Busa, Nkosi, emhlaben'! 'Ntando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni la. Busa, Nkosi, emhlaben'! Busa, Nkosi, emhlaben'! Busa, Nkosi, emhlaben'!
2
'Mbuso wakhe uzofika Emhlabeni ebantwin'. 'Ntando yakhe yokwenziwa Lapha njengasezulwin'.
3
'Zingonyama nezimvana, Zindawonye edlelwen'; Bozalusa abantwana. Yek' inhlanhla emhlaben'!
4
Zonk' izizwe zothandana Zingasayikulwa, qha! Izikhali zizokhandwa Zibe amageja, ha!

title: Kuyothula du
lyrics:
1
Ngiyabonga ukuthula Engiphiwa nguJesu; Kunganele, makabongwe; Sekuthula, du! Ngangishukunyezw' omubi, Njengamaza aselwandle, Kodwa namhla ngoSomandla Kuyathula, du. Ngiyabonga ukuthula Engiphiwa uJesu. Kunganele, makabongwe! Sekuthula, du.
2
Mhla ekhala uMariya NgoLazaru ethunen', Waduduzwa nguy' uJesu, Emvus' ekufen'. Ngalomhl' amgcob' uJesu Ngaw' amakh' ezinyaweni, Nom' abanye babemsola, Kwathul' enhliz'wen'.
3
Abagwedli eGalile, Mhla behlushwa emkhunjin'. 'Nkosi yathi kul' ulwandle: Thula, uthi du! Nomhlupheki eGadara, Owakhal' emathuneni, 'Mademon' esekhishiwe, Wasethula, du.
4
Yiza, Nkosi yokuthula, Yiz' ubuse emhlaben'! Izwe lonke malithule, Liyothula, du. Zonk' izimpi ziyophela, Neziphithiphithi zonke, Buya, Nkosi yamakhosi, Kuzothula, du.

title: Iyeza İNkosi yezulu
lyrics:
1
iyeza, iyeza İNkosi yezulu, Isiyeza ngamafu ivela phezulu. Phaphamani! Phaphamani! Nina bantu bayo, Mazokhelw' izimbhaqa, Nihlomele yona.
2
Ngiyeza masinya, ishilo İNkosi, Ngalokho-ke lindani, ningaze nazunywa.
3
Imband' izokhala ihlalu-ke İNkosi, Abasemathuneni bavuke baphile.
4
Esikade sinyevuzwa singaziwa umhlaba, Sohlotshisw' ubukhosi bosihlengileyo.

title: Kungabangovivi
lyrics:
1
Kungabangovivi kumpondo zankomo, Mhlawumbe kusasa ilanga liphuma, UJes' uzofika ngobukhos' obukhulu, Abathath' emhlabeni abakhe. Kobanini-ke, Nkos', Sibonge sihlabe, umkhos'? Ubuyile, Nkosi yethu, Haleluya! Amen. Haleuya! Amen.
2
Kungaba emini, mhlawumbe kusihlwa, Mhlawumbe kovel' ebusuk' obukhulu, Ukukhany' okukhulu kobukhosi bakhe Laph' uJesu ebathath' abakhe.
3
Lapho amabandla evel' ezulwini, Ebonga iNkos' ngentokozo enkulu, Ngomusa omkhulu ahlotshiswa ngawo, UJesu wobathath' abakhe.
4
Kunga-yintokozo, efika sikhona, Kungekho kugula nosizi novalo, Sihlithwe, sihlangabez' iNkosi phezulu, Laph' uJesu ebathath' abakhe.

title: Mhla ezayo
lyrics:
1
UJes' usedeliwe, Umhlaba awumfuni; Baningi bamnyevuza Ngamazwi alukhuni. Keph' uMsindis wethu Wofika ngobukhosi, Mhla ezayo, 'kubahlwith' abakhe. Luzofika lolosuku, Aluphuthisi, qha. Nxa İNkosi yethu Iqhamuka ngobukhosi, ha. Yek' injabulo yabo, Ababethemba kuyo, Mhla ezayo 'kubahlwith' abakhe.
2
Izulu lothi cwazi. Nokho-ke abangcwele Bahlule ngobucwazi Baphiwe nemiqhele. Bombuk' uJesu 'Nkosi, Bamfuze yen' impela Mhla ezayo 'kubahlwith' abakhe.
3
'Buhlungu buphelile Kakukh' ukulingoza, Usizi lungasemva, Phambil' ukuthokoza, Nxa sizombon' uJesu. Sihlal' eduze naye Mhla ezayo 'kubahlwith' abakhe.
4
Masihlalel' usuku Lokuza koMkhululi, Simfakazele futhi Ngothando, singathuli. Silungiselw' usuku, Nxa sizothol' umvuzo Mhla ezayo 'kubahlwith' abakhe.

title: Ukuzithiba
lyrics:
1
Xwayani ubutshwala, 'Zinhlobo zabo zonke! Konk' okudakisayo Uhlobo lunye konke. Bunjengenomfi bona, Acupha ngab' umlingi Babhajwe, bafe khona Abantu abaningi.
2
Ungalibhek' iwayini: Lohlab' okwebululu. Ilizwi lisho njalo Elika Nkulunkulu. Oyiphulul' inyoka, Wokhala, ethi: Maye! La' ipheqez' ikhanda Isuke-ke imshaye.
3
Isiga sisho futhi: Isala ukutshelwa Sobona-ke ngomopho Ozenza kakhalelwa. Ehene, uyahlekwa Umuntu odakwayo; Wenzile ngamabomu, Nguyen' ozidlisayo.
4
Buyamaphuc' umuntu Imfuyo yonke yakhe; Buphehl' umongo wonke, Buqed' umqondo wakhe. Zidakwa zingelidle Ilifa laphezulu. Liyanqamula juqu Elika Nkulunkulu.

title: Ukuvalelisana
lyrics:
1
Sesiyahlukana nani, Kumbe singasabonani, Hambanini kahle kahle, Um'sa wakhe uniphahle.
2
Inhliziyo idabuka, Ngoba nina niyemuka; Kepha asinakunqaba, Kuhlukanwa kulomhlaba.
3
Lapho senihamba khona, 'Nkosi ibe-nani yona, Inilonde endleleni, Inigcine esandleni.
4
Masikhumbulane njalo Ngomthandazo ngokombalo Sihlungane emoyeni, Nxa sihlala othandweni.
5
Naphakade sobanana, Abangcwele bohlangana Mhla uJes' ebuth' abakhe, Khona ezulwini lakhe. Siyaphinda sisho futhi, Lelizwi elokuthi: 'Hambanini kahle kahle, Um'sa wakhe uniphahle.

title: Ihubo lokuvuna
lyrics:
1
Silima, sihlwanyela Imbewu emhlabathini; Kunguy' uNkulunkulu Olinda ezulwini. Ufudumez' umhlaba, Oleth' imvula futhi Kumila kahl' ukudla, Simbonga njalo sithi; Zonk' izipho lezi, Zivela ngaphezulu. Ibongw' İNkos', Ibongw' iNkosi, Ngothando olukhulu!
2
Nguyenza onguMenzi Wezinto, noma ziphi; Uyahlobis' imbali, Wokhela ucwazibe, Amaza amlalela, Uzondla izinyoni. Kakhul' abantu bakhe. Bangayiswela ntoni?
3
Sesikubonga, Baba, Ngezint' ezinhle zonke, 'Kutshala, nokuvuna, Nokudla, nakho konke, Zam'kel' izipho lezi, Kuncan' esikuphayo, Thath' inhliziyo yethu, lyon' oyifunayo.

title: Sekusile
lyrics:
1
Vuka-ke nakhu kusile, Bonga umusa weNkosi; Yiyo ibikugcinile Yon' inguMlondolozi. Cul' amahl' amaculo, UJesu uyulalela, Ikufanel' injabulo, Kuhl' ukuhlabelela.
2
Ukujabul' eNkosini Kuyasinika amandla, Kuyasophul' osizini, Kuziqinisa izandla. Vuka, mphefuml', ukhumbule Ungabomkhohlwa phela! Yisho igama ucule Ngaye owakufela.
3
Bonga, ubhek' ezulwini, Laph' uzovel' uMsindisi, Uyosihlwith' ebubini, Uzophelisa usizi. Kuyothulisa uvalo, Alusayikushaya, Sombon' uJesu njalo, Yeka, kukuhl' ekhaya!

title: Nxa lishona
lyrics:
1
Yek' okuhle nxa lishona, Kuphel' im'sebenzi yonke. Silalele izwi lona ElikaSomandla onke. Anduba silale kahle, Siyalondolozwa nguye Sinambith' amazw' amahle, Siphumule kahle kuye.
2
Ukuphum'la kuhl' impela Kumphefumul' okhutheleyo, Futhi kusihlumelela Emzimben' odangeleyo; Kuyasikhumbuza futhi Ngokuphum'la ezulwini, Emthunzini walow'muthi Wokuphila ebomini.
3
Yebo, kuhl' ukuphumula, Nxa izono ziyekelwe; Sesinakho ukuthula, Yebo sesilungiselwe. Nxa sivuka, nxa silala, Iyathula inhliziyo; Kuphelile ukukhala, Sinethemb' elingafiyo.

title: Umsa omkhulu
lyrics:
1
UJes' uthini namhla na? Uyazibiz' izoni la, Zibomvu kodw' izono zam', Zizohlangulwa zonke nya. Ngiyakuhlanzwa ngani na? Ngegazi likaKristu, ha.
2
Zisenamandl' izono la, UJesu wazahlula nya. Ngingakhululw' ubani na? UJesu; kahluleki, qha! Ukuphum'la ngotholaphi? Othandweni lukaKristu.
3
Isiphephelo siphi na? Ubalekele eNkosin'. Ngongena, pho, kanjani na? Ngegama likaJesu, ha! Umoya uvunguza, Wo Inqaba iqinile bo.
4
Keph' uSathan' udlova la, UJesu wamahlula nya. Ngikhangw' inkazimulo la, Akakwnael' uJesu na? Ngivama ukweduka nje; Vumel' uJes' ahole-ke.
5
Ngombona nin' uJesu na? Usuku lusondela, ha. Uyakufika nini-ke? Wobuya masinyane nje. Khona sompompoloza, ha. Haleluya! Haleluya!

title: Esiphambanweni
lyrics:
1
Entaben' ekude kwem' isiphambano. Esinobuhlungu nehlazo; Ngisithanda sona, ngob' uJesu wami Wabethelwa kuso ngenxa yam'. Ngakho ngisibabaza sona, Ngize ngibeke phans' umthwalo, Ngizobambelela kusona Ngize ngizuze umqhele wam'.
2
Leso siphambano esadelwa yizwe. Siyangimangalisa njalo. Ngoba ngenxa yaso 'Jesu weza lapha Asithwalele eGolgotha.
3
Esiphambanweni l'ophi igazi lakhe. Elimangalisayo kimi. Ngoba ngenxa yami 'Jesu wafa khona. Angithethelel' angihlanze.
4
Esiphambanweni ngiyakuqinisa, Ngithwal' ihlazo ngenjabulo; Wongibiza mina khona ekhaya lam', Angiqhelise ngomqhele wam'.

title: Uma uthokoza
lyrics:
1
Uma uthokoza, Bonga, bonga! Njengenyoni enhle, Hlabelela! Nxa uqhutshw' uMoya, Shesha ulalele; Xwaya ukhuleke; Hlabelela! Ukuhlabelela Kuyamthokozisa Odabukileyo, Hlabelela!
2
Nxa umbhek' uJesu, Bonga, bonga! Bong' umusa wakhe; Hlabelela! Wasiz' ohlushwayo, Evus' ofileyo, Esifela thina, Hlabelela!
3
Nxa udabukile, Bonga, bonga! Kuyajabulisa, Hlabelela! Zonk' izingelosi Ziyay'bong' İNkosi, Bonga, bonga, nawe; Hlabelela!

title: Uphi umhlobo onjengoJesu?
lyrics:
1
Uphi umhlobo onjengoJesu? Kakho, qha; kakho, qha. Ongaphilisa izifo zethu? Kakho, qha; kakho qha. Uyazaz' izinsizi zethu, Ngaye ziyakuphela nya. Uphi umhlobo onjengoJesu? Kakho, qha; kakho qha.
2
Kakh' onjengaye nangobungcwele, Kakho, qha; kakho qha. Nozithobisa okwakh' impela, Kakho, qha; kakho qha.
3
Ngeke amshiye omethembayo, Kakho, qha; kakho qha. Ngek' amalele nophendukayo, Kakho, qha; kakho qha.
4
Kakho omunye osindisayo, Kakho, qha; kakho qha. Nasezulwini osam'kelayo Kakho, qha; kakho qha

title: Vukani, bandla-bo
lyrics:
1
Vukani, bandla-bo, nilaleleni na? Anikamuzwa yin', uMoy' omuhle lo? Usemhlabeni la; somthola nini na? Nang' uMthokozisi. Nempel' usemhlaben', wavela ezulwin'. Uyakuhlanza konke okusenhliz'ywen'. Siyoba-mhlophe qwa sohlanzwa yebo la! Nang' uMthokozisi.
2
O, sekusile-bo, kwaqala khona le; Lapho ngePentekost' kwakhanya kwathi nge; Kwath' eJerusalem' babonga, bath', ehe, Nang' uMthokozisi.
3
Yebo, ukhona lo, nakhona lapha-nje, Size sinqob' izitha zethu zonke nya; Masigcwaliswe swi, sigcinwe sithi ngci, Nang' uMthokozisi.
4
Nanamhla umi nqo, usenamandla nya, Uyasihlanzisisa sibe-mhlophe qwa. Phaphama, wena, mnang', umzuze masinyan', Nang' uMthokozisi.
